product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with The Ritual of Hammam - Purifying Treat Small Gift Set from Rituals. Housed in luxurious packaging, the kit combines two of the brand's favourites to cleanse and clarify from top to toe.
Hammam Purifying Body Mud (70ml)
An exfoliating micro-scrub with natural grains that leave skin looking fresh and supple. The purifying body scrub contains mineral-rich Rhassoul Clay and refreshing Eucalyptus to revitalise and refine. Can be used as a deep-cleansing mask by leaving the lotion on dry skin.
Hammam Delight Foaming Shower Gel (50ml)
Deeply infused with aromatic Eucalyptus and Rosemary, the fragrant, calming properties of the formula bring in reminiscences of Turkish baths and saunas, where a full cleansing experience is provided. Made in an enriching gel-to-foam formula, the salve turns into a heady lather when put into contact with water, allowing the body to be fully endorsed and covered.
name: The Ritual of Hammam - Purifying Treat Small Gift Set

product_description:
使用Sukin 草本沐浴露，刺激您的感官、喚醒身體活力。這款沐浴露內含具有柔嫩功效的荷荷巴油、鱷梨和玫瑰果油，可滋潤、淨化肌膚，盡顯柔嫩美肌。 
不含SLS 和SLES 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA

product_description:
Containing extra skin conditioners and protective antioxidants, this dark bronzing lotion gives a deeper, rich and streak free tan. Suitable for pale or dark skin, this bronzing lotion will react with your unique skin tone to give you natural colouring. This lotion also contains aromaguard technology that eliminates that tell tale sign of self tanning.
Directions of use:
name: TROPEZ SELF TAN BRONZING LOTION - DARK (200ML)

product_description:
Introduce yourself to FOREO’s innovative oral-care line with the FOREO ISSA Play Toothbrush; a revolutionary toothbrush that encourages healthy teeth and gums, whilst adding a playful pop of colour to the bathroom.
The ISSA Play utilises the same intelligent technology as the previous ISSA toothbrushes, yet arrives as a battery-powered model. The toothbrush combines sonic pulse technology with a unique, hybrid brush head, which is effective in eliminating plaque, preventing cavities and discouraging tartar build-up. Delivering 9000 high-intensity pulsations per minute, the toothbrush thoroughly cleans and visibly whitens teeth, whilst comfortably massaging gums to promote strong and healthy results.
The ISSA toothbrushes are safe and ultra-hygienic as they harbour considerably less bacteria than regular nylon brushes. The ISSA Play boasts a hybrid brush head, which is crafted using antibacterial silicone bristles to the outer and PBT polymer bristles to the centre. The silicone bristles gently massage gums to prevent damage, whilst the polymer ones provide a more vigorous clean.
Easy-to-use, the ergonomic toothbrush is ideal for daily use and the lightweight design ensures it is travel friendly. The Swedish-designed brush is completely waterproof, which allows for easy cleaning and even in-shower use, which is ideal for those with busy lifestyles. Cost-effective with no changeable brush heads, the ISSA Play is the perfect introduction into the ISSA range. Discover a new kind of clean.
name: ISSA Play Toothbrush - Pink

product_description: 使用 Embryolisse Lait-Crème Fluid，实现柔软水嫩的肌肤。这是一款拥有天鹅绒般质感的多功能乳液。 这款乳液适用于所有肌肤类型，可用作补水保湿霜、卸妆水、剃须后护理液、婴儿护理液，或用于舒缓日晒后的肌肤。 这款易于吸收的乳液采用方便的泵瓶盛装，便于涂抹。 E.N.
name: Lait-Crème Fluid (500ml)

product_description:
这款小蜜蜂小麦杏树婴儿油富含多种维生素，令婴儿肌肤柔润光滑。
蕴含杏树和葡萄籽、小麦胚芽和葵花油，为娇嫩肌肤提供天然的营养护理。 
在热洗澡水中加入一瓶盖，或在宝宝洗澡时轻轻按摩。
name: Bees 小蜜蜂小麦杏树婴儿油 (4 fl oz / 115ml)

product_description:
這款天然奢華按摩手套採用60% 的亞麻和40% 的純棉製成，去除肌膚角質和肌肉刺激物，進行深層的皮膚清潔。用後全身肌膚煥發光彩，讓您感覺倍棒。 
本品可溫和清潔肌膚，去除角質。亞麻和棉質材料能讓肌膚煥發光彩，閃耀動人。特別適合沖涼或沐浴時使用。

product_description: Freshen up with the Men Expert Hydra Power Shower Gel from L'Oréal Paris. The 3-in-1 wash is suitable for the face, hair and body and is designed to leave skin feeling clean, refreshed and thoroughly hydrated. Bursting with a woody fragrance, the gel cleans and cleanses without leaving skin dry or tight.
name: Paris Men Expert Hydra Power Shower Gel 300ml

product_description: 用这款Crabtree & Evelyn Citron, Honey and Coriander Hand Therapy 给予您双手应有的关注，它可以滋养肌肤，每次使用后肌肤都明显变得更光滑。 这款深层滋润护手霜蕴含澳洲坚果油、牛油果油和护理性的柠檬、胡荽和蜂蜜提取物，其配方不含月桂烷硫酸酯、矿物油、苯甲酸脂类或丙二醇，意味着它可以提供轻柔的保护。 - E.D
name: & Evelyn Citron, Honey and Coriander Hand Therapy (250g)

product_description:
Nourish and replenish dry skin with Megamama Super-Rich Omega Body Lotion from Mama Mio.
Harnessing the powers of Organic Shea Butter and an antioxidant-rich blend of Coconut, Chia Seed and Sweet Almond Oils, the quick-absorbing cream locks in moisture and hydration as it defends against environmental stresses for long-lasting comfort.
Pregnancy and breastfeeding safe, the lightweight, non-greasy lotion utilises a Multi-Fruit Complex to improve skin tone and texture, whilst boosting radiance and leaving the body feeling smooth, supple and moisturised. Imparts the brand's signature fragrance that smells delightful to even the most sensitive noses.
name: Mio 水润身体乳

product_description:
Preen and perfect brows with the Rubis Classic Magnifying Tweezers. Handmade in Switzerland from surgical stainless steel, the high-quality tweezers feature slanted tips and an 8-fold magnifier for precise touch-ups at home or on-the-go.
Crafted with superior calibrated tension and perfectly aligned tips that close evenly and firmly for advanced pulling power, you can grip even the smallest of hairs for a professional, airbrushed finish. Acid-proof, anti-magnetic and rustproof.
name: Classic Magnifying Tweezers

product_description:
Elemis 舒缓肌肉活性身体护理油，内含活力成分，尤其适用于经常锻炼之人，及腰酸、风湿或关节炎患者。  可缓解肌肉紧张、促进肌肉放松。
本品非常适合作为健身计划的一部分，这是一款海藻芳香治疗的全身精油，由下列成分混合而成：刺激肌肤的沿海松树、沙棘、海茴香、迷迭香等，以帮助缓解肌肉痉挛及受压的关节。
使用说明：
name: 舒缓肌肉活性身体护理油（100 ml）

product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the Tattoo Sponge, a 100% naturally sustainable product specifically designed for cleaning your new tattoos without causing irritation or damage.
Delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water, the innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to eliminates dirt, blood and plasma whilst soothing the area and helping to prevent scabs forming.
It won’t strip skin of natural oils, and aims to soothe and nourish the delicate new skin that forms without causing any further irritation. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the perfume-free sponge is super hygienic and easily sterilised between uses by popping into boiling water for a couple of minutes. Make sure your new masterpiece looks its best and keep skin in pristine condition with this all-natural cleansing alternative.
name: Konjac Sponge Company Tattoo Sponge

product_description:
Envelope skin with the Invigorating Home Spa Massage Cream from PUPA. The rich, velvet-smooth formula effortlessly melts into skin, perfect for an indulgent massage with aromatherapy benefits.
A delicate blend of Orange, Bergamot and Neroli oils seek to reduce muscle tension with an uplifting citrus scent, while Mint and Eucalyptus bring an invigorating freshness.
Enriched with nourishing Brown Alga extract, skin feels moisturised, replenished and sumptuously supple while the mind feels a sense of wellbeing.
name: Home Spa Massage Cream - Invigorating 250ml

product_description:
每日舒緩保護肌膚。富含草本萃取物和維他命A、C 以及E，這款含70% 有機成分的乳液能提亮膚色，保護肌膚。 
混合天然原料，包括蘆薈全葉，甘菊，向日葵籽油，能讓肌膚保濕、潤滑、豐盈。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森芦荟 84% 保湿乳 (113G)

Featuring an uplifting fresh aroma of crisp May Chang, sweet Roman Chamomile and delicate Sandalwood, the hand lotion works to intensively hydrate dry and chapped skin whilst working to reduce inflammation and soreness. Hands are left feeling nourished and smooth with a refreshing scent.

豐富泡沫，內含具有治療功效的澳大利亞茶樹油，能深層保濕軟化肌膚。性感的香氣令您活力煥發，讓沐浴更加充滿樂趣。 
本品中含具有治愈功效的茉莉花萃取物、橙花萃取物、桉樹萃取物、天竺葵萃取物和維他命E，配合保濕潤膚成分共同起效，讓肌膚深層保濕，呈現柔軟質地，魅力無窮。讓肌膚享受純天然精華的滋養。

name: 杰森茶树沐浴露 (900ml)

The invigorating shower gel is enriched with a host of active ingredients and moisturising agents to leave skin feeling cleansed and refreshed. Transforming into a rich lather, the concentrated wash delivers Pro Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E to keep skin soft and protected, and expertly sloughs away dirt and impurities to ensure the body feels clean and ready to go. Infused with a spicy, fruity fragrance to energise the senses.
name: Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel 100ml

product_description:
Experience an invigorating cleanse with AromaWorks Inspire Body Wash, an energising blend of essential oils that work in synergy to help clean and refresh your skin.
Infused with an uplifting and warming scent powered by Black Pepper, Lime and Bergamot, the body wash gently cleanses away impurities whilst delivering therapeutic benefits. Skin feels fresh and smells decadent.
name: Inspire Body Wash 300ml

product_description:
Pamper skin with the Rebalancing Home Spa Massage Cream from PUPA. The velvet-smooth, emollient-rich formula quickly melts into skin, ideal for an indulgent massage with aromatherapy benefits.
Fortified with precious extract of Tiarè Flower, the cream cocoons skin in a harmonic veil of moisture and nutrients, leaving skin feeling refined and smooth. An aromatic balance of Lemon, Lime and Orange Oils leave a refreshing, zingy scent. Skin feels intensely softened and supple while your senses feel calm and relaxed.

product_description:
Nourish your skin with the Verdure Conditioning Body Scrub from Malée Natural Science. Inspired by Africa’s wetlands, the formula envelops skin in a fresh forest green fragrance that guarantees to uplift and revitalise with warm and earthy notes of Citrus, Mint and Patchouli.
Boasting a dual, salt and sugar texture, the scrub exfoliates the skin and sloughs away dead skin cells. The hydrating formula is enriched with an array of skin-loving oils such as Avocado, Sunflower and Grapeseed, alongside Cocoa and Shea butter. After use, skin feels revitalised, nourished and touchably soft.

product_description:
Dr Botanicals   高名气护手霜 ，可保护滋养双手。 这款护手霜内含很多活性成分，保护双手，使之全天都丝般柔软。
该保湿护手霜富含多种植物成分，包括：富含欧米伽3、6、9和维生素E的覆盆子籽油，可滋润调理肌肤、使肌肤饱满充盈； 白茶，具有很强的抗氧化性，可提亮肤色； AQUARICH（黑色燕麦提取物），可在肌肤表层形成一层保湿膜。 – E.W.

product_description:
Indulge your skin with the Cocoa Noir Sensuous Dark Shea Butter Cream from Dr Botanicals. Rich in nourishing botanical ingredients with a sweet and sumptuous dark cocoa hit to treat the skin, the butter cream is designed to visibly firm skin, whilst moisturising and smoothing.
Enriched with Shea Butter and Seabuckthorn Fruit oil, the vitamin rich, vegan friendly cream provides hydration and a soothing feeling for skin. Irritated skin is left feeling calm and visibly youthful and nourished.
name: Botanicals Coco Noir Sensuous Dark Shea Butter Cream 100ml

product_description:
The Neroli Reviving Bath Oil from Dr Botanicals is an aromatic blend of essential oils brimming with minerals and vitamins, working to pamper skin and boost your mood as you bathe.
Created using only the finest natural extracts, the main ingredient of Neroli Oil boasts an uplifting fragrance that helps relieve anxiety and stress, whilst Sweet Almond Oil soothes and moisturises skin. With Jojoba Oil adding intense hydration, simply add a few drops to your bath and unwind.

product_description:
Experience a luxurious, spa-inspired exfoliating ritual with the Natural Spa Factory Gold Body Scrub; a shimmering formula that utilises quality ingredients to soften and smoothen the entire body.
Harnessing the powers of vitamin-rich Caviar Extract, Grapeseed Oil and golden Jojoba, the cane sugar scrub polishes the skin's surface, effectively buffing away dead, dull skin, whilst enveloping the body with a sensuous Amber fragrance.

product_description:
Catering for energetic, active lifestyles, the L-Glutamine Powder helps to strengthen muscles and aid post-workout recovery.
After physical and mental exercise, the supplement restores essential amino acid levels that are lost during your training sessions, whilst supporting tissue repair and the immune system.
name: Powder - 150g

product_description:
Achieve enviably smooth skin with the Serenity Body Oil from AromaWorks. The uplifting formula is designed to leave skin with a visibly supple finish.
Enriched with a pregnancy-friendly combination of Coconut oil and Evening Primrose, the oil seeks to nourish the skin and deliver intense hydration. The spa-like treatment will leave skin touchably soft.
name: Serenity Body Oil 100ml

product_description:
The Moroccan Rose Restoring Senses Bath Oil from Dr Botanicals is a delicate blend of essential oils brimming with minerals and vitamins, working to repair and pamper skin as you bathe.
Created using only the finest natural extracts, the main ingredient of Moroccan Rose Oil boasts high levels of Vitamin C to minimise the appearance of fine lines and imperfections, whilst providing a delicate and calming aroma. Vitamin-rich Argan Oil is bursting with essential fatty acids to help soften and protect skin, plus Jojoba Oil adds intense hydration. Simply add a few drops to your bath and lie back and relax.
name: Botanicals Moroccan Rose Restoring Senses Bath Oil 30ml

product_description:
Drench dry skin with the Nourish & Vitalise Body Oil for Dehydrated Skin from You & Oil. Forming a delicate blend of five organically farmed essential oils, this all-natural treatment works to condition and replenish skin while soothing the senses.
Vitamin-rich Apricot Kernel Oil supports cell regeneration and deflects free radical damage, as well as helping to boost fatty acids Omega-9 and Omega-6 for an improved skin structure, plus Sweet Almond Oil improves water retention. The aromatic additions of Ginger Lemongrass and Lavender soothe irritations and help relax the mind. Suitable for sensitive skin, it leaves skin feeling smooth and supple with a restored luminosity.
name: & Oil Nourish & Vitalise Body Oil for Dehydrated Skin 100ml

product_description: Anthony 品牌的 Glycolic Exfoliating and Resurfacing Wipes。 这款湿巾采用乙醇酸专门配制而成，可去除表层的死皮细胞，清除污垢和杂质，令肌肤保持水润；清爽的薄荷能镇静肌肤。 舒缓的芦荟具备肌肤愈合特性，可减少刺激感；抗炎洋甘菊可舒缓肌肤，保持持久舒适。 便捷、易于打开的包装袋非常适合在旅途中使用。 E.N.
name: Glycolic Exfoliating and Resurfacing Wipes

product_description: Pamper dry and wanting skin with Mizon’s Enjoy Fresh-On Time Black Bean Hand Cream. Based upon an emollient-rich Shea Butter formula, it seeks to replenish moisture levels and smooth the appearance of callouses and cracks with a layered infusion of Hyaluronic Acid and nourishing raw Black Bean. The lightweight treatment rapidly absorbs to leave skin feeling smooth, softened and protected.
name: Enjoy Fresh-On Time Black Bean Hand Cream 50ml

product_description:
Experience an exhilarating soak with the Elemis Life Elixirs Embrace Bath and Shower Elixir; an uplifting bath and shower oil that boasts a sensual blend of heady aromatics that condition and fragrance skin.
Combining 11 pure essential oils, including Vetiver and Rose Pepper blended with Amaranth and Bacuri Oil, the stimulating fragrance encourages you to fall in love with the sense of liberation. Simply apply to running bath water, or to the body whilst showering and the silky oil will evoke uplifting thoughts.
Skin is nourished and delicately scented.
name: Life Elixirs Embrace Bath and Shower Elixir 100ml

product_description:
Experience a massaging cleanse with the Spongellé Body Wash Infused Buffer in 'Coconut Verbena', a flower-shaped cleansing buffer enriched with an invigorating, time-released body wash.
Utilising Proprietary Infusion Technology that offers a guaranteed number of washes (over 14), the saturated buffer expertly cleanses, moisturises and rejuvenates skin; extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver work in synergy to lift away impurities whilst softening and hydrating from head to toe. Its unique surface changes as you squeeze, from a gentle exfoliator to a soft, silky sponge with rich and creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth, purified and revitalised. Infused with a Coconut Water, Lemon Verbena and crisp Bamboo fragrance. Housed in a gift box with hanging ribbon.
name: Boxed Flower Body Wash Infused Buffer - Coconut Verbena

product_description:
Treat dry skin in need of TLC to the Nourish & Nurture Hand Oil from You & Oil. Delicately balancing a selection of exquisite essential oils, the treatment infuses skin with moisture, nutrients and vitamins to help heal and soften.
Rice Kernel helps to alleviate soreness and combat free radical damage, with fatty acid-rich Sweet Almond Oil creating the perfect environment for cellular renewal. Imbuing an uplifting fruity aroma with Bergamot, the non-greasy formula leaves hands, nails and cuticles feeling soft, supple and refreshed.
name: & Oil Nourish & Nurture Hand Oil 50ml

product_description:
Cleanse and nourish your skin with Elizabeth Arden Mega Size Shower Cream, an ultra-hydrating formula infused with a luxurious, empowering fragrance.
Gently cleansing away impurities whilst deeply moisturising, the velvety cream lifts away dirt and grime whilst softening skin and imparting a fragrance powered by the natural beauty and energy of Sunflowers.
name: Arden Sunflowers Mega Size Shower Cream 500ml

product_description:
Pamper hardworking hands with the Leighton Denny Best Defence Hand and Nail Cream; a hydrating formula with a limited edition Summer Dreams fragrance.
Harnessing the hydrating powers of Glycerin, the rich moisturiser envelops the hands and nails in a veil of essential moisture, which nourishes and softens skin. Hibiscus Flower extract works to improve skin’s elasticity to reveal a firmer-looking finish, while White Mulberry Bark extract reduces the appearance of dark spots and blemishes.
Finished with a crucial dose of Cucumber Seed extract, the hand and nail cream is rich in Vitamin C, which offers a soothing sensation to skin and ensures it is free from irritation. Skin is silky soft and comfortably hydrated.
name: Denny Best Defence Hand and Nail Cream - Summer Dreams 75ml

product_description: Envelope skin with the Michael Kors Body Lotion; a rich, creamy moisturiser to pamper and smooth. The sumptuous emulsion melts into skin to enhance moisture levels and leave it feeling silky soft and imbued with the Michael Kors Women scent with warm notes of Tuberose, Incense and Cashmere Wood. A sophisticated and sensual treat for skin and the senses.
name: Kors Body Lotion 150ml

product_description:
Bioglan益生菌巧克力球（30粒） 浓缩于每一颗黑巧克力球，是天然有效、极具创新的维生素补充剂系列产品之一。 产品通过GMP认证，由专业疗养人士配方，确保全家人能够在日常饮食中摄取益生菌，而且口感极佳。
每一颗巧克力球都是由口感浓郁的黑巧克力制成，仅不到14卡路里，却富含30亿益生菌，包括品牌专属的Rosell乳杆菌、Rosell双歧杆菌和菊粉。 它能够补充膳食纤维与钙质，而且得益于"免冷藏技术"，本产品无需存放在冰箱，可以储存在壁柜中或放入包中随身携带。 - K.N
name: - 黑巧（30粒）

product_description:
Respect your shaving brush with the men-ü Chrome Shaving Brush Stand.
It's recommended that you dry your brush by hanging on a stand. This is because the bristles should always dry facing down, rather than up into the handle. Not only is it more hygienic, but is also helps prevent the bristles from falling out. - K.N.
name: Chrome Shaving Brush Stand

product_description:
使用 Crabtree & Evelyn Rosewater Body Cream，体验玫瑰花瓣的柔软。 该产品拥有经典和天然成分的混合，呵护您的双手并赋予奇妙柔和的香味，把平凡的瞬间转变成黄金时刻……
Crabtree & Evelyn Rosewater Body Cream 是一款呵护需调理肌肤的精华霜，采用古玫瑰香水、甘油、琉璃苣油和必要的蜂蜡配制而成，有助于滋养和滋润肌肤，同时赋予美妙、熟悉的气息。 这款精华霜适合在淋浴或沐浴后使用，令肌肤如玫瑰花束一样柔软，散发芳香。
使用说明：
name: & Evelyn Rosewater Body Cream (200g)

product_description:
Avoid cluttering your bathroom with your essential grooming products; the candy striped men-ü Toiletry Bag offers a capacious interior for storing all your gear in one place whether you are at home, playing sport or on your travels. Lightweight, compact and stylish, the toiletry bag also includes a separate internal compartment for your razor and toothbrush, ensuring you are kept sharp and fresh wherever you are. – L.R.
Dimensions: H: 18.5 x W: 25 x  D: 4.5cm
name: Stripes Toiletry Bag

product_description:
Give babies a fresh start with the Sweet Memories Gift Set with Keepsake Photo Box from Burt's Bees Baby Bee range. Bringing together a collection of gentle, naturally-derived skincare treats, the set provides everything a newborn needs for skin that feels healthy and replenished without irritation or discomfort. Presented in keepsake photo box, it makes a wonderful gift.
Shampoo & Wash (235ml)
With Burt’s Bees Baby Shampoo & Body Wash in hand, you’re just one step from a fuss free bathtime! The pure and natural tear free formula combines gentle cleansing and moisturising coconut and sunflower oils for a deeply nourishing, all in one baby wash. It leaves your baby’s skin feeling silky soft without striping away the natural moisture, making bathtime a breeze.
99.3% Natural
Original Lotion (170g)
Bringing together nature’s most powerful ingredients, the ultimate baby lotion combines Buttermilk, Shea Butter and Sunflower Seed Oil to deeply hydrate and nourish delicate skin. Free from any harsh chemicals or unnecessary additives, the gentle formula has been scientifically proven to deliver up to 24 hours of moisturisation. Skin is left sumptuously soft and supple, just how nature intended.  
99% Natural 
Buttermilk Bath Soap (20g)
Make the clean up just as fun as getting messy with this nourishing natural soap bar. Formulated upon a vegetable-derived base, it effortlessly sweeps away dirt and grime without stripping away moisture. The addition of Oat Flour helps pamper and soothe irritations for extra-special care.
99.4% Natural
Diaper Rash Ointment (85g)
A comfy baby is a happy baby. That’s why Burt’s Bees Baby Bee Diaper Ointment is specially formulated to soothe and comfort babies’ precious skin. Vitamin E nourishes while zinc oxide and beeswax create a natural barrier to keep unwanted moisture out. Enriched with Sweet Almond Oil, a medium-weight oil rich in proteins and vitamin D, the ointment effectively soothes, calms and relieves uncomfortable, delicate skin.
100% Natural
name: Bees Baby Bee Sweet Memories Gift Set with Keepsake Photo Box

product_description:
塗抹香皂，打出泡泡，盡情享受這份奢華。這款營養豐富的三合一套裝，其靈感來源於19 世紀傳統的肥皂製作工藝，有助於保濕滋養乾燥的肌膚。 
本品採用天然的蜂蠟，能舒緩肌膚，給肌膚長久保濕。特別適合乾燥肌膚使用，令你置身天堂般的享受，同時賦予肌膚淡淡的清香。 
使用說明：
name: Crabtree & Evelyn 百合三倍研磨皂 (3X85G）

product_description:
Pamper delicate skin with the Calendula Massage Oil, a rich yet gentle treatment that relaxes and soothes, from holistic skincare brand Weleda.
A host of exquisite essential oils, including Calendula, Chamomile and Sunflower, combine to help nourish skin with a silky veil of hydration and vitamins. It imbues a fresh, sensual scent while promoting smoother, healthier looking skin, and when used with massage, helps alleviate tension and relax muscles. Suitable for even the most sensitive skin types.
name: Calendula Massage Oil 100ml

product_description: FOREO ISSA™逸薩迷你智能電動矽膠牙刷刷頭- 夏日藍采用頂級矽膠材質，不含BPA和鄰苯二甲酸鹽等有毒化學成分。與Foreo ISSA逸薩迷你智能電動矽膠牙刷相配備，刷頭可抑制細菌滋生，保持口腔和牙齦的徹底清潔。設計智能並符合人體工學，3D靈活性刷頭可以觸及口腔內任何縫隙。刷頭可使用整整一年，價值持久。 – IM
name: ISSA逸萨迷你智能电动硅胶牙刷刷头 - 夏日蓝

product_description: Derived from organic, natural ingredients, the Weleda Lavender Soap cleans and perfumes skin in one wash with a creamy, luxurious lather. The vegetable-based formula contains naturally-purifying Iris and Viola extracts alongside precious Lavender oil, renowned for its soothing, rejuvenating properties and relaxing, heady scent. The soap bar leaves skin feeling clean and supple with a delicate, familiar fragrance.
name: Lavender Soap 100g

product_description: Seascape Island Apothecary 提拉海盐磨砂可以去除肌肤角质，令肌肤从头到脚细致光滑，散发迷人亮泽。 这款身体磨砂内含纯海盐，可轻松去除死皮细胞，梳通毛孔；其中的蜜蜡成分可以深度滋润皮肤；天然的泽西桉叶油可令人神清气爽，精神焕发。 感受触感柔软、散发自然光泽的健康肌肤。 E.N.
name: Island Apothecary 提拉海盐磨砂（175ml）

product_description: Catering specifically for men, Polaar's Invigorating Shower Gel promises to cleanse and revitalise from head to toe. Fortified with Icelandic Lichen and refreshing Menthol, the hair and body wash effortlessly eliminates impurities whilst respecting the pH balance of the skin and scalp. Ideal for use at home or when travelling, you will be left feeling energised and uplifted around the clock.
name: Invigorating Shower Gel 200ml

product_description:
Great for those with dry skin, Weleda Sea Buckthorn Replenishing Body Lotion penetrates deeply to give your body that much needed injection of moisture.
Formulated with vitamin-rich oil from organic sea buckthorn, mallow extract and shea butter, Weleda Sea Buckthorn Replenishing Body Lotion visibly rehydrates your skin. It’s fresh, fruity fragrance invigorates the senses and the lotion easily absorbs into your skin, leaving you with refreshed, soft and supple skin.
name: Sea Buckthorn Body Lotion 200ml

product_description: Create a blank canvas with Sunescape's Tan Removal Mitt. Ideal for awkward areas such as the elbows, knees, ankles and hands, the super soft exfoliating mitt gently removes stubborn, worn-looking self tan, whilst buffing away oily residue, perfume and dead, dull skin cells without abrasion. Skin feels clean, smooth and refined.
name: Tan Removal Mitt

product_description:
用Kneipp Pure 和谐 Orange 和菩提花 Body Wash，体验恢复活力的清洁，它的无皂、pH值平衡配方在进行温和清洁的同时使人神清气爽。
内含天然百香果和柚子油，这款芳香沐浴露可以柔和地去除污垢和杂质，同时唤醒感官并为其注入活力。 它的提神香气可以激发快乐的感受。
name: Pure和谐Orange和菩提花Body Wash（200ml）

product_description:
Visibly firm and tighten skin with the award-winning Optimizing Body Contour Gel from Alchimie Forever. Ideal for those suffering from cellulite and water retention, the innovative cream seeks to minimise the appearance of dimpled skin, with smooth and youthful results.
Formulated with a Caffeine boost, the oil-free formula works to stimulate the circulation which promotes fat cell breakdown, encouraging a visibly slimmer appearance. The gel is also infused with a powerful blend of anti-oxidants, combining to deliver a tighter and more lifted appearance to skin, allowing you to enhance your feminine contours.
name: Forever Optimizing Body Contour Gel 8oz

product_description:
Manuka Health MGO 250+ Children's Manuka Honey Syrup is a completely natural syrup with a sweet liquorice flavour. The product contains no alcohol and is specially formulated for children over 12 months of age.
The syrup contains a blend of premium Manuka Honey and natural herbal expectorants that work to soothe and support the throat and chest. MGO™ 250+ Manuka Honey is 100% natural and has effective and reliable antibacterial properties due to the naturally occurring, active compound Methylglyoxal.
name: Health MGO 250+ Children's Manuka Honey Syrup 100ml

product_description:
Create a refined, contoured silhouette with MÁDARA's Sculpturing Oil; a fast-absorbing, 100% natural formula that works to minimise the appearance of stretch marks.
Suitable for all skin types, the certified organic oil utilises a vitamin-rich blend of Northern Rose Hip and Barley Extracts to help improve tone, texture and elasticity, whilst nourishing and hydrating problem areas to leave them feeling silky smooth. Ideal for use during pregnancy or weight loss.
name: Sculpturing Oil 200ml

product_description:
Add a touch of radiance to your skin with the Kukui Oil Radiant Glow Body Oil from Connock London. The ultra-nourishing oil is formulated to restore softness, elasticity and comfort to dry skin in need of hydration.
Infused with Kukui oil, the formula thoroughly moisturises skin, leaving it soft and visibly revived. The airy, light textured spray provides skin with a sense of freshness and adds a luminous sheen to bare shoulders, legs and anywhere it settles.
name: London Kukui Oil Radiant Glow Body Oil 125ml

product_description: Free your mind from the stresses of the day with the Serenity Body Indulgence Gift Set from AromaWorks. The gift set hosts four luxurious AromaWorks products that seek to uplift your spirit, from a calming candle to therapeutic bath bombs, the Body Indulgence Gift Set hosts everything you need after a long day’s work. Ideal as a gift or a relaxing treat for yourself. Flannel Soft, white cotton flannel finished with AromaWorks branding embroidered to the front. Serenity Bath Bombs (2 x 250g) Free your mind by soaking in a Serenity Bath Bomb infused tub. Formulated with a blend of Himalayan Sea Salt and Calamine, the luxurious bombs create a therapeutic bathing experience, infusing your bathroom with a stress-free, warm citrus aroma. Serenity Candle (10cl) Energise the body and mind with the Serenity Candle from AromaWorks. With a burn time of 36 hours, the floral candle fragrances the home with a soft, sweet scent of Geranium and Neroli. Crafted with a blend of Soy and Beeswax alongside luxurious Essential Oils, the candle promotes nature. The Serenity Candle boasts a relaxing aura, bringing harmony to any room in the home. Serenity Body Oil (100ml) Achieve enviably smooth skin with the Serenity Body Oil from AromaWorks. The uplifting formula is designed to leave skin with a visibly supple finish. Enriched with a pregnancy-friendly combination of Coconut oil and Evening Primrose, the oil seeks to nourish the skin and deliver intense hydration. The spa-like treatment will leave skin touchably soft.
name: Serenity Body Indulgence Gift Set

product_description:
De-stress after a long day with the Serenity Bath Oil from AromaWorks. Designed to deliver peace and tranquillity to your bath time whilst leaving skin feeling refreshed, hydrated and touchably soft.
Enriched with a luxurious blend of Coconut oil and Evening Primrose, the oil delivers moisturise to skin as you relax and soak. Suitable for even the most sensitive of skin types.
name: Serenity Bath Oil 100ml

product_description: The yes to PrimRose Miracle Oil harnesses the powers of naturally soothing Evening Primrose. The sweet-smelling elixir helps to moisturise, smooth and condition skin, brimming with antioxidants and essential nutrients to unveil a more even and calm complexion. The lightweight, non-greasy oil quickly absorbs and can be used anywhere on the body in need of a little relaxation and extra care.
name: to PrimRose Miracle Oil

product_description:
Pamper fatigued hands with the Verdure Nourishing Hand Cream from Malée Natural Science. Inspired by Africa’s wetlands, the formula envelops skin in a fresh forest green fragrance that guarantees to uplift and revitalise with warm and earthy notes of Citrus, Mint and Patchouli.
Ideal for dry and chapped hands, including sensitive skin, the luxurious hand cream thoroughly nourishes. The skin-loving formula is enriched with Sweet Almond Oil and Zinc, which work harmoniously to penetrate into the deep layers of skin, deliver intense moisture and offer long-lasting softness. Complete with Avocado Oil, hands are left protected, soothed and ultra-soft.
name: Natural Science Verdure Nourishing Hand Cream 75ml

product_description:
Smooth and protect skin with the Verdure Conditioning Body Cream from Malée Natural Science. The rich body cream melts effortlessly and is designed to improve skin’s health and appearance with repeated use. Inspired by Africa’s wetlands, the moisturiser envelops the body in a fresh forest green fragrance that guarantees to uplift and revitalise with warm and earthy notes of Citrus, Mint and Patchouli.
Enriched with a blend of Avocado, Sweet Almond and Wheat Germ oil, the luxurious cream delivers essential moisture to skin and alleviates areas of dryness. The non-greasy formula is complete with Shea butter, which offers additional hydration and a soothing feel. Expect nourished skin that is comfortably hydrated and boasts a revitalising fragrance.
name: Natural Science Verdure Conditioning Body Cream 200ml

product_description:
Experience a relaxing cleanse with AromaWorks Calming Body Wash for Men, a hydrating blend of essential oils that work in synergy to help clean and refresh your skin.
Infused with 10 BioActive ingredients and a citrusy, spicy scent powered by Mandarin and Bay, the body wash gently cleanses away impurities whilst conditioning and invigorating the body. Skin feels fresh and smells decadent.
name: Men's Calming Body Wash 300ml

product_description:
Top up your Vitamin D levels all year round with the D3 Max Oral Spray; a high strength formula that can be used by adults and children.
With a natural orange flavour, the convenient spray absorbs quickly into the bloodstream to deliver 4,000 IU per day, helping to support the immune system and promote healthy bones. Best taken under the tongue.
name: Max Oral Spray - 30ml

product_description:
使用  Emjoi 强劲去死皮电动修脚器磨脚器套装 （随附美甲/修脚套装）在家舒适地护理手部和脚；终极护理套装含有美甲修脚所需的所有重要工具，让您尽享手、脚和指甲的护理。
强劲去死皮电动修脚器磨脚器快速祛除硬皮工具结合一系列美甲工具、印有花纹的便携式化妆包和可可果提取物净肤霜使用，以打造完美的护理体验。 – E.W.
强劲去死皮电动修脚器磨脚器修脚刀
这款获奖去死皮电动修脚器磨脚器修脚刀设备可磨掉干燥坚硬的皮肤，仅需几秒钟的时间就可以让您的脚部肌肤感觉柔软光滑。 无论是赤脚在房间走动，还是穿着不舒适的鞋子，每天我们的脚都会有不舒适的体验。 强劲去死皮电动修脚器磨脚器修脚刀可祛除硬皮，减少不舒适感，让脚看起来更漂亮，感觉更光滑舒适。 这款电池驱动的设备携带方便，是外出旅行的理想伴侣。
 该设备需要两节 5 号电池（套装不随附）
随附清洁刷。
微矿物滚轮(抗菌*) 
强劲去死皮电动修脚器磨脚器配备有抗菌*微矿物超粗糙滚轮，采用全新 Flex+ 技术。 全新的 Flex+ 技术可使滚轮与脚部肌肤灵活贴合，以实现强大的控制力和超级顺滑的体验。
美甲套装
强劲去死皮美甲套装的设计是强劲去死皮电动修脚器磨脚器的一个附加组件，具有磨光、修形和抛光功能。 该套装随附有 5 个独立的微型连接件，其设计旨在提供沙龙级品质的体验；一个表皮工具 、 一个精细修形工具 、 一个普通修形工具 、一个钢砂工具和抛光工具 。
该套装还随附有一个便携型指甲刀 、 一对脚趾分离器 、 一个指甲锉和 便携型化妆包，以存放所有工具。
 超级保湿霜
在修脚美甲后使用可可果萃取物超级保湿霜进行护理。 使用舒柔护理霜按摩肌肤，以使脚部和手部的肌肤感觉柔软光滑。
name: 强劲去死皮电动修脚器磨脚器套装（随附美甲套装）

product_description:
BAKEL贝蔻薄荷身体磨砂膏 带给您温泉浴般的去角质 体验，海盐去除身体角质，软化、滋润和肌肤，再现肌肤活力。
该磨砂膏内含薄荷精油、大豆油和桉树油成分组合，在轻柔地擦洗使用者肌肤表面的同时，促进表皮肌肤新陈代谢和再生，它的润肤性能有助于改善血液循环，对于下肢肿胀特别有效。  
100％纯天然成分，去除身体表面角质，让您的皮肤倍觉柔软、光滑和精致。

Nourish dry hands with the richly textured Archipelago Botanicals Boticario di Havana Hand Cream, based on their bestselling Havana home fragrance blend that includes Mandarin, Bergamot Leaf, Neroli, Wild Basil, Crushed Thyme and Coriander. The natural ingredients contain antioxidants, Vitamin E and AHAs that offer deeply moisturising relief for rough, dry and irritated skin without leaving an oily or greasy residue.
name: Botanicals Boticario di Havana Hand Cream 115g

product_description:
Experience an uplifting soak with the Great Day Bath & Shower Drops from NEOM’s Scent To Make You Happy™ collection. Designed to deliver therapeutic benefits to the mind and body, the bath and shower drops leave skin smooth and comfortable, whilst boasting an energising scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of Wild Mint and Mandarin, the formula envelops skin in a refreshing aroma that banishes feelings of stress, as well as lifts your mood. Complete with Vitamins A and E, alongside skin-loving Safflower oil, expect to feel hydrated and happy.

product_description:
本款奶油狀香脂膏能強效滋養足部，無油膩感。質地清爽柔和，可使人立即感覺到舒適，令肌膚如天鵝絨般柔軟、光滑。適用於任何想要滋養和放鬆足部的人。 
歐緹麗葡萄籽美麗護足霜內含葡萄籽油，紅酒酵母（Vinolevure），強效滋養肌膚，修復並放鬆因高跟鞋帶來的足部疲勞感。質地清爽，易於吸收，含有甜橙、留蘭香和橙皮的香氣，是一款味道清新的乳膏。 
使用方法： 每天早晚塗在肌膚上，輕輕按摩至吸收。先在手掌中使香脂膏變暖，然後以打圈方式塗在小腿上，消除腿部腫脹。
name: 75ml

product_description: Pamper hard-working hands with the Molton Brown Puritas & Pettigree Dew Hand Wash Set. Each liquid hand wash combines nourishing and moisturising ingredients to cleanse your hands and nails, whilst offering a luxurious olfactory experience. Hands are left soft and sparkling clean.
name: Brown Puritas & Pettigree Dew Hand Wash Set

product_description:
Westlab  排毒型喜马拉雅山岩盐身体磨砂膏，可温和地去除角质。 有益配方，内含精油混合物，包括：杜松子、葡萄柚、清爽薄荷、活力迷迭香等，可减少水潴留、刺激血液循环。
内含杏、米糠、抗氧化剂维生素E等成分，用以提高肌肤弹性、保护修复肌肤、对抗肌肤炎症、软化肌肤、使肌肤得到再生。 散发出怡人的香味、去除死皮细胞及暗沉的肌肤细胞，使人活力四射、为肌肤排毒、深层清洁肌肤。 E.N.

Hands feel smooth and supple, imbued with a refreshing citrus scent.

product_description:
Breeze through the final stages of pregnancy with the Mama Mio Third Trimester Oil Bundle.  Combining a trio of bestselling Mama Mio products, the bundle is designed to treat and care for mum-to-be during the third and final trimester of pregnancy, when fatigue levels are high and skin can be stressed. Host to a moisturising body oil, soothing breast cream and cooling leg gel, each product within the bundle is suitable for use whilst pregnant and will leave skin thoroughly nourished.
The Tummy Rub Oil 120ml
Help protect your skin against pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Oil. Enriched with Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids, the oil is able to build the skin's strength and elasticity, helping to relieve itching tummies. Specially formulated with a blend of Organic Oils to lock in moisture and provide maximum protection to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, the luxurious oil works to hydrate skin.
Pregnancy Boob Tube 100ml
The Pregnancy Boob Tube bust cream soothes skin to leave it with a healthy glow. Enriched with organic Omega oils, Boob Tube hydrates by providing antioxidants to strengthen and help reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Specially formulated with unique Green Cabbage Leaf extract, its new and improved formula makes it pregnancy and breastfeeding safe.
Lucky Legs Cooling Leg Gel 100ml
Help revive tired legs with Lucky Legs Cooling Leg Gel. The lightweight yet powerful gel leaves legs and feet feeling comfortable and soothed. Formulated with essential nourishing oils, menthols and spearmint to relax and refresh skin. The additional pressure and water retention when carrying a baby can start to weigh you down, so its compact size fits perfectly in your handbag for whenever you require a boost.
name: Mio Third Trimester Oil Bundle (Worth £76)

 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。

product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Kukui Oil Essentials Collection from Connock London. Housed in a zipped wash bag, the kit combines five luxurious products to restore soft, smooth and comfortable skin on the hands and body.
Kukui Oil Soap (100g)
Harnessing the powers of Kukui Oil and Shea Butter, the vegetable-based, creamy soap creates a rich lather to gently eliminate impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Skin is soft, supple and delicately fragranced.
Comforting Hand & Body Wash (75ml)
A refreshing formula developed to cleanse and condition skin. Harnessing the powers of Papaya Extract, the luxurious gel gently buffs away dead skin cells, whilst Aloe Vera and antioxidant Vitamin E soothe and protect against free radical damage. The hands and body are left feeling smooth, supple and refined.
Hydrating Hand & Body Lotion (75ml)
Rejuvenate dry skin on the hands and body with the lightweight, fast-absorbing lotion. Fortified with a moisturising blend of Shea Butter, Kukui Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the hydrating formula softens and conditions, whilst defending against environmental aggressors. Skin is smooth, glowing and subtly fragranced.
Nourishing Hand Cream (50ml)
A deeply moisturising hand cream that works to combat dry, rough skin whilst fighting visible signs of ageing. Infused with Kukui Oil, rich in essential fatty acids, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula delivers intense hydration, and its dose of antioxidant Vitamin E shields from environmental factors that can lead to fine lines, cracking and chapping.
Wonder Balm (10ml)
Infused with a unique blend of Kukui Oil, Monoi Cocoa Butter and Beeswax, the luxurious formula works to soothe and moisturise areas of dry skin. Ideal for lips, cuticles, elbows, knees and heels, the non-greasy balm is designed to calm irritated skin for long-lasting comfort.

Sukin 认为皮肤和头发护理产品最强大、最有效的成分来源于大自然。 注重环保的 Sukin 是一家来自澳大利亚的天然个人护理品公司。
"护肤不以损耗地球为代价™" — Sukin 的承诺远远超出了化妆品。 这是一家 100% 认证的碳平衡公司，旨在减少其业务对于脆弱环境的影响。 -SA

product_description: Dr. Hauschka的玫瑰体香剂 可长效抵御出汗造成的潮湿和体味。 凭借含有荷荷巴油和天山雨衣草精粹的强大、快干配方，将该滚涂体香剂轻轻涂在肌肤上，可获得终极清新舒爽，不留痕迹或污渍。 适合中性至敏感型皮肤，您的肌肤将散发精致的玫瑰香味。 E.N.

product_description:
Pamper hard-working hands with the Molton Brown Lemon & Mandarin & Blue Maquis Hand Wash Set. Each liquid hand wash combines nourishing and moisturising ingredients to cleanse your hands and nails, whilst offering a luxurious olfactory experience. Hands are left soft and sparkling clean.
Lemon & Mandarin Fine Liquid Hand Wash (300ml) - Mandarin, Italian Lemon Oil, Fig Leaf and Cedarwood.
Blue Maquis Fine Liquid Hand Wash (300ml) - Corsican Pine, Ginger and Rosemary.
name: Brown Lemon & Mandarin & Blue Maquis Hand Wash Set

product_description:
每天使用这款优秀的 MONU Firming Moisturiser，令肌肤触感柔滑舒适。 富含海洋胶原蛋白，消除细纹，肌肤触感光滑、紧致。
MONU 被专业理疗师使用，采用最纯净成分，具备独特美容保养效果，可提供肌肤保养所需的有益成分。 使用 MONU Firming Moisturiser，为肌肤补充水分，呈现柔滑肌肤。 这款保湿霜的丰盈配方可深层滋养，提供 UVA 和 UVB 防晒功效。
使用说明：
name: Firming Moisturiser (50ml)

product_description:
Combat body blemishes with Paula's Choice Clear Exfoliating Body Spray 2% BHA, an exfoliating fluid fortified with salicylic acid to help fight acne and prevent the development of new breakouts.
Ideal for those with redness, acne and keratosis pilaris, the calming spray is alcohol free so won't make skin feel dry or tight, and its blend of BHA and skin conditioning agents work on the surface and deep into pores to unclog and eliminate bacteria, refining the look of skin for improved confidence. Quick-drying. - K.N.
name: Choice Clear Exfoliating Body Spray 2% BHA (118ml)

product_description:
帮助放松以及镇静疲惫的身心，缓解疲劳的肌肉,使你的身体恢复活力。含有多种的精油，矿物盐和草药的成分，使用这款完美的浴液，如牛奶般的质地帮助肌肤保湿。我们的限量版超大装Lliquid Yoga放松泡澡浴液比普通装加大超过2倍容量，因此你也可以给你的身体双倍的放松与呵护！
放松泡澡浴液是您藏在瓶子里的私人按摩师；帮助放松紧张的肩颈，同时放松疲惫的身体。没有一款泡浴治疗能像这款浴液一样含有丰富的活性成分。含有丰富的镁泻盐和山金车，也混合了我们的热门成分V-Tonic™，留兰香，柏树，薰衣草，柑橘和洋甘菊精油有助于缓解压力和焦虑，同时也能给肌肤保湿，木鲁星果棕脂,您的身心都将会得到益处。重要的是，这款产品不含有月桂基醚硫酸钠和月桂基硫酸钠（SLS）。
你可能会问这两种成分究竟是何物? 您在家使用的大多数能气泡的产品中大多均含有这两种成分-您可以去检查下您的沐浴露，泡泡浴剂，洗碗精，厨房地板清理剂甚至你的洗车的清洁剂。很奇怪，对吧？我们也这么觉得-所以我们不使用这两种成分，绝不。此外这两种成分也是众所周知的会刺激肌肤。我们不想让这些令人讨厌的成分让您烦心，但是你可以上网搜索一下。
泻盐(硫酸镁) 镁是一种有着惊人效果的传统秘方。
V-Tonic TM 一种不可思议的混合物含有各种必要的精油的提取物，含有薄荷叶油，柑橘柠檬果叶油，柏叶油和薰衣草，以帮助缓解和放松肌肉，帮助您舒缓身心。
木鲁星果棕脂 含有丰富的Omega，非常保湿。
山金车以其舒缓的特性出名。
古巴香脂油  (Carapa Guianesis) 天然的深层保湿产品尤其能够帮助缓解肌肉酸痛。
七叶树 (Aesculus hippocastanum)籽提取物丰富的七叶素加槲皮素，帮助提高抗氧化保护。
无花果提取物含有丰富的抗氧化成分维他命A.
name: Yoga放松泡澡浴液

product_description:
使用 MICRO Pedi Extreme Coarse Rollers，消除顽固老茧和硬皮。 这款强大的粗足辊是修脚界的革命，专门设计用于防止粗糙皮肤，去除顽固表层，硬皮片或破裂皮片，无擦伤风险。
这款足辊由细微矿物质组成，无刺激，每秒以 360° 旋转 30 次，能温和有效去除多余硬皮及干皮。 可获得沙龙级光滑的效果。 - K.N
name: Pedi Extreme Coarse Rollers - Purple

product_description: 这保湿沐浴露用希腊葡萄的新鲜果味勾起了对圣托里尼崎岖景观的想象。 这款 KORRES Santoini Vine Showergel 保湿沐浴凝胶受海上空气和火山土壤的影响，为肌肤提供绝佳保护。 内含的小麦精华，富含维生素 B2、B3 和 B5，促进肌肤营养、健康和再生。 LB
name: Santorini Vine Shower Gel (40ml)

product_description:
Sukin 敏感型潤膚乳採用親膚配方，可舒緩、鎮靜並平衡敏感肌膚，是疲憊和刺激性肌膚的最佳選擇。這款潤膚乳細膩、柔和，由具有肌膚修復功效的古柯葉和牛油樹籽油、舒緩的蘆薈、洋甘菊以及清爽的黃瓜配製而成，可有效鎮定敏感肌膚。讓肌膚感覺更加柔順、水嫩，徹底舒緩。 - RH 
 使用說明：為達到最佳效果，請在沐浴/泡澡後立即使用。輕輕按摩到皮膚上，讓潤膚乳可發揮最佳功效。

product_description: Relieve tired, aching limbs with the Supersalt Epsom Muscle Relief from Westlab. Blending the purest of mineral-rich salts with a naturally therapeutic blend of Arnica, Spearmint and Eucalyptus, the bath salts soothe strained muscles and aid post-workout recovery, whilst reviving the mind and body to leave you feeling calm, comfortable and deeply restored.

采用天然成分的独特混合物专门配制，专门消除由细菌引起的气味，这款沐浴露在轻柔清除每日尘垢的同时利用山鸡椒精油和佛手柑令人振奋的香氛使感官倍感畅快。 Skin感觉超清爽、刺激和充满活力。

product_description:
使用 L'Oreal Paris Dermo Exp Sublime Bronze Milk，让肌肤享受太阳之吻。 短短的两个小时之后，其将变成天然的棕褐色，让您的肌肤容光焕发。 除了给您持久的古铜肤色之外，其还有 SPF 8 级防晒，防止您的肌肤被阳光晒伤。
完美适用于面部和身体，无论什么季节，您都可以在阳光下纵情运动。

这款身体黄油给你的肌肤带来的不仅仅只是水分。非常丰富的保湿，美丽的花香，同时抵抗自由基增加维他命使肌肤更加健康、光滑、紧致，24小时散发自然光泽，让肌肤能够自如的应付生活中的跌宕起伏。
使用在沐浴后的湿润肌肤上，帮助深层补水锁水。每天一次已经足够了-这款超强保湿设计能为你提供24小时的持续保湿。配合向上手法往心脏处按摩，帮助吸收，以实现最大化效果。

Hydrea London 這款產品長40 厘米，特別適合摩擦去除角質，尤其是背部這樣很難夠得到的地方。採用棉質拉手設計，使用簡單，易懸掛。 
用這款劍麻摩擦去除角質後，您的肌膚將煥發青春光彩。使用龍舌蘭仙人掌葉打壓磨碎後製作而成，特別適合喚醒沉睡肌膚。

product_description:
使用 Fake Bake Flawless Coconut Face 和 Body 美黑精华液可以获得容光焕发的肤色；这款轻质的奇妙精华液可轻易地融化到皮肤上，让您拥有自然光晒后的诱人美丽的古铜色妆效。
将豪华Fake Bake配方与丝氨基酸和超级食品Coconut油结合起来，这款抗衰老的自我美黑剂可紧缩肌肤，调理和改善肤色，同时防止脱水和延缓皱纹出现
利用透明质酸和天然萃取的美黑精华液（DHA、赤藓和DMI）的功效，这款无油腻的美黑剂提供卓越的补水效果和持久、无纹理痕迹的颜色，褪色缓慢而均匀。

product_description:
Smile with confidence; the Mr Bright Teeth Whitening Kit is a simple, safe and effective teeth whitening treatment using a minty-fresh, plant-based formula without damaging peroxide.   
Utilising advanced LED technology, the compact system provides you with an easy-to-use mouth guard and the strongest peroxide-free, take-home whitening gel available.
See instant results in as little as 30 minutes, with a reduction in tooth stains and discolouration and up to 7 shades whiter in two weeks with continued use. Clinically approved and certified, achieve gleaming pearly whites from the comfort of your own home.
4 x Whitening Gels
1 x Led Light
1 x Mouth Guard ( Upper + Lower )
1 x Step By Step Instruction Manual
1 x Zip Case
name: Bright Teeth Whitening Kit

product_description:
本款抗氧化手霜結合了保濕、柔軟和活力等各種特性，由橙漿製成，可給予手部肌膚如絲般光滑的呵護。無油膩不適之感。 
適用於任何尋找手部和指甲滋養與抗衰老護理的人。 
 使用方法： 根據需要，隨時塗在手部和指甲上，按摩至吸收。
name: 75ml

product_description:
Clarify and brighten your complexion with the Erno Laszlo White Marble Cleansing Bar. Creamy and lavish, the innovative soap bar does more than just clean and utilises breakthrough whitening technology to transform your pigmentation.
The exclusive nano-encapsulated LumiWhite Complex blocks excess melanin to help fight discolouration and reveal a natural, long lasting radiance, plus active enzymes help to even out tone and minimise the appearance of sun spots. 
Its Fruit Acid Complex, derived from citrus and natural sugars, breaks down dirt and exfoliates deep within pores to eliminate impurities and excess oil, whilst extract of Willow Bark acts as an anti-inflammatory ingredient to soothe and nourish. Packed with Vitamin C and Shea Butter, skin is left moisturised and protected from free radicals with a healthy-looking glow.
name: Laszlo White Marble Cleansing Bar (100g)

product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Sienna X Radiance Body Balm; a lightweight, deeply moisturising formula to help enhance and prolong your tan.
Harnessing the powers of Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy balm softens and nourishes skin, whilst unique gold flecks create a luminous veil over the body for a subtle sheen. Expect smooth, supple skin with a healthy glow.
name: X Radiance Body Balm 200ml

product_description:
使用 Westlab Dead Sea Salt，护理瘙痒或干性肌肤；这一品牌是英国领先的浴盐专家。 其含有高品位的镁，适用于容易发生湿疹、痤疮和牛皮癣的皮肤，可恢复和重新平衡肌肤；而钙和钾则支持肌肤的自然修复过程并补充矿物质。
死海 (Dead Sea) 以其低污染水平以及对健康和福祉的多种好处而倍受认可，含有可放松肌肉的溴化物和富含维生素的杜氏绿藻，可实现抗氧化保护和细胞更新。 有助于为肌肤补充水分，实现最佳的保湿水平，令全身肌肤柔软光滑。
name: Dead Sea Salt 1kg

product_description:
Stay fresh and comfortable with Molton Brown Coastal Cypress & Sea Fennel Deodorant Spray, a refreshing spray deodorant that protects against perspiration and unwanted odours.
Helping to keep your underarms fresh, dry and odour-free, the anti-perspirant combines fresh Marine notes with earthy Cedarwood and Salted Cypress for invigorating protection. Skin feels comfortable, dry and revitalised.
name: Brown Coastal Cypress & Sea Fennel Deodorant Spray 150ml

product_description:
它是与经典而独特的Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream 深层保湿 Body Treatment 配合使用的佳品，这款快速吸收的润肤霜将会使您的肌肤感觉柔软、光滑并可保湿8个小时。
这款Eight Hour保湿液可充分浸透水分并深层保湿以抑制肌肤剥落。 您定会喜爱这款Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream 深层保湿 Body Treatment 霜，它可以轻松融入您的肌肤以 缓解干燥的迹象，减少肌肤敏感，同时不会让您的肌肤有油腻的感觉。
使用说明：
name: Arden Eight Hour Cream深层保湿Body Treatment（200毫升）

product_description:
Relax and unwind with this works' Super Sleep Dual Pillow Spray. Combining two aromatherapeutic solutions for a good night's sleep, the pillow sprays inspire feelings of calm and prepare you for a deep and restful slumber.
sleep plus pillow spray (20ml):
A fast acting, natural remedy to restore a healthy sleep pattern. Formulated with natural oils, the fragrant formula releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale your worries. Contains naturally encapsulated Lavender to gradually release its aromatherapeutic benefits as you sleep.
deep sleep pillow spray (20ml):
A best-selling natural sleep aid that inspires feelings of calm. Designed to inspire a rejuvenating and deep sleep, the pillow spray is formulated with 100% pure essential oils of Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Chamomile; it releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale any nerves and worries. Spray onto your pillow before bedtime; feel your troubles melt away and enjoy a peaceful slumber. Suitable to use during pregnancy.
name: Works Super Sleep Dual Pillow Spray 40ml

product_description:
使用 Westlab Himalayan Salt，让身体排出毒素；这一品牌是英国领先的浴盐专家。 其纯粹配方源自数百万年以前的喜马拉雅山，含有八十多种矿物质，包括可舒缓并修复受损肌肤的镁，以及可促进细胞更新的再生钙质。
盐有助于改善营养物质的吸收，促进血液循环，刺激人体的消化系统和神经系统，清除毒素，令全身感觉清爽健康、容光焕发。 钾是一种专注于减轻压力和焦虑的成分，也可最大限度地降低高血压的风险。 E.N.
name: Himalayan Salt 1kg

product_description:
Foreo ISSA逸薩迷你智能電動矽膠牙刷是一款兒童友好型牙刷，改變兒童對刷牙的看法，把刷牙真正變成樂趣，用簡單有趣的方式讓孩子自己正確地刷牙。牙刷由柔軟、溫和的無縫矽膠製成，可抑制細菌滋生，保持兒童口腔和牙齦的徹底清潔。適合5歲及以上兒童使用。其兒童友好型的設計方便兒童小手手持，孩子可以自己獨立使用。另外家長監控功能方便家長監督兒童刷牙，笑容助手“喜悅”（笑臉）或“憂傷”（哭臉）可顯示2分鐘的刷牙是否在12小時內完成，幫助兒童自己保持一個持久的刷牙習慣，從而保證孩子每天刷牙兩次，每次刷牙2分鐘。牙刷具有2速檔位，每次充電後可使用200次，刷頭可使用整整一年，方便耐用，價值持久。 
 Foreo ISSA逸薩迷你智能電動矽膠牙刷將溫和脈動和柔軟矽膠相結合，以全新方式護理兒童牙齒，溫和有效，而不會像傳統刷毛牙刷一樣劃傷牙齒。設計智能並符合人體工學，3D靈活性刷頭可以觸及口腔內任何縫隙。同時牙刷小巧、活潑、有趣的設計一定會贏得兒童的喜愛。具有獨特的WhiteTooth™技術，創新科技可刷去牙齒表面污漬，使牙齒瞬間潔白。產品振動每30秒暫停一次，提醒您清潔口腔的下一個四分之一區域。 
 特點： 
 技術參數: 
成人也適用
 請注意:包裝內包括USB接口充電器，但是不包括國際轉換插頭。另外，刷頭每年僅需更換一次。
name: ISSA逸萨迷你智能电动硅胶牙刷 - 草莓色

product_description:
Emjoi MICRO Pedi藍色替換捲髮器（2件裝） 
 Emojoi MICRO Pedi 磨腳器現可輕鬆去除腳上的死皮硬繭。 MICRO Pedi 藍色滾輪補充裝以每秒30 圈的轉速輕鬆去除腳上的死皮，方便快捷。這些更換滾輪用於重度粗糙的膚質，滾輪移動時會有痛感，連續使用2 個月方可見效。機不可失，趕緊囤貨吧！
name: MICRO Pedi 蓝色替换卷发器 （2 件装）

product_description:
Drench skin in hydration with the KORRES Yoghurt Shower Gel; a creamy body wash that cleanses the body, whilst offering a long-lasting moisturising effect. Effortlessly lathering over skin, the fragrant soap gently and effectively cleanses away daily dirt, oil and impurities.
Boasting a Greek Yoghurt based formula, the refreshing shower gel is enriched with multiple Wheat Proteins, which form a protective film over skin to help the body to maintain healthy hydration levels. Alongside offering a veil of rich moisture, the foaming shower gel is enriched with Active Aloe® to combat loss of elasticity and stimulate collagen synthesis. This helps to reduce visible signs of ageing.
Expect the body to feel refreshed, rejuvenated and comfortably hydrated.

product_description:
傑森熏衣草沐浴露泡沫豐富，蘊含獲得認證的有機薰衣草精華，可深入滋養柔化肌膚。性感的香氣令您活力煥發，讓沐浴更加充滿樂趣。 
舒緩洋甘菊和豐富的鱷梨油、杏樹和維生素E 與潤膚劑和保濕劑相互作用，為肌膚提供深層保濕功效。傑森熏衣草沐浴露採用純天然成分，悉心滋養您的肌膚。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森熏衣草沐浴露 (900ml)

product_description: Envelop skin with the Elizabeth Arden White Tea Body Cream for a Zen-like experience.  Decisively uncomplicated and simple, the sumptuous formula melts into skin, working to soften and hydrate while layering a crisp floral fragrance. Opening with notes of zesty Mandarin and breathtaking Sea Breeze, the rich body cream unfolds into a delicate heart of White Tea and Turkish Rose for a comfortingly pure scent that lingers.

Put your feet up and de-stress with the Mio Skincare Relaxing Night In Set. The set is host to a trio of carefully selected products, each designed to offer optimum relaxation. Combining a comforting bath soak, fragrant candle and calming spray, the set is the perfect accompaniment for a relaxing night in.
Liquid Yoga Bath Soak (200ml)
Experience the benefits of the Liquid Yoga Bath Soak, a moisturizing bath formula with Epsom salts to comfort tired and stressed bodies. Enriched with a blend of essential oils, mineral salts and herbs, the bath soak helps calm racing minds whilst its deeply nourishing properties are harnessed from omega-rich murumuru butter. On par with a relaxing massage, the bath soak can help de-stress tight, fatigued muscles and dry, wanting skin feels soothed.
Liquid Yoga Candle
Ease your mind and relax your body with the Liquid Yoga Candle, providing the warm glow of candlelight, popular for easing tensions and aiding sleep. Enriched with a lavender-mint fragrance, the candle is able to lift the mind, body and soul, delivering you to a place of pure relaxation. Breathe and achieve pure zen.
Liquid Yoga Space Spray (150ml)
Experience the emotional benefits of the Liquid Yoga Space Spray, a spirit lifting spritz infused with a cocktail of essential oils to calm, de-stress and rebalance the mind. Contains a blend of Lavender, Chamomile and Lavandin. Ultimately uplifting, spray onto your pillow, pulse points or into the air to experience the beautiful fragrance and beautiful consequences. Immediately, positivity is restored and a peaceful Zen is achieved.

product_description:
Who run the world? (Girls).Be Your Best is an awesome blend of vitamins designed for active women looking to boost their multivitamin intake to support their physical and dietary needs.
This impressive blend of micronutrients including vitamins C, E and D contribute to the normal functioning of the immune system following intense exercise. These vitamins, along with the other potent mineral ingredients contribute to the normal function of the cardiovascular, respiratory and muscular systems whilst you sweat it out. These comprehensive ingredients are scientifically designed to help improve recovery time and avoid you becoming prematurely fatigued during exercise.
Be Your Best is a great addition to every active lifestyle, helping you to achieve your exercise goals by supporting both performance and recovery. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.

product_description:
Inner Me Daily 4 Me 每日营养片 - 忙碌岁月是一款针对30-40岁人群的营养保健组合，提供补充能量，保持健康生活所需的每日营养。
在忙碌的年纪，您总是忙得不可开交。 这款保健品套装包含4种胶囊，为您提供能量，处理好忙碌的生活，让您保持健康的体魄，不让意外的健康问题拖慢您的脚步。

product_description: Keep fresh naturally with the Men’s 24 Hour Roll On Deodorant from holistic brand Weleda. Free from aluminium salts and synthetic preservatives that can cause irritation and block pores, the all-natural formula helps promote a refreshing sensation with woody herbal notes of Rosemary, Vetiver and Litsea Cubeba helping neutralise odours and impart a refined masculine scent. In a convenient roll-on form for ease-of-use and on-the-go.

product_description:
为达到精确美容效果，尝试使用带照明的Rio 10倍放大镜，它非常适合日常家庭使用。 拥有额外的LED灯设置，设有单一的不显眼电源按键进行机动控制，这款人性化的镜子通过控制性、准确度和提高可见度，为化妆过程提供帮助。
可移动吸盘使其成为一款完全灵活的产品，可以利用手柄手持镜子，或将镜子嵌到浴室柜上。 镜子为双面，一面为真实影像镜，而反面为放大镜，这个方便的附件为日常美容提供了合适的、实际的帮助。 C.R

product_description:
利用来自 Dr. Hauschka 的焕肤和活力套装护理肌肤，这是一个包含该品牌六种焕发、激发活力产品的系列。 这些产品包装在一个礼盒内，可改善修复身心，让您焕发活力。 E.N. 
柠檬香茅活力滋润沐浴液（10ml） 
一种温和清洁配方，可让您活力十足迎接新的一天。 加入木瓜籽提取物和植物表面活性剂，可轻松融化污垢和杂质，该轻质霜膏泡沫散发一种柠檬和鲜姜的清香，令身体和感官焕发活力。 优质向日葵和鳄梨油混合物防止肌肤过度干燥，从而让您获得清洁、滋润的肌肤。
柠檬香茅活肤精华沐浴液（10ml） 
利用活肤精华沐浴液令身心焕发活力。 结合温暖的流动清水，该活肤沐浴液散发一种异国情调的香茅和阳光下成熟柠檬的清新香气，营造一种勃勃生机。加入葵花籽油，以保持水分和刺激肌肤，让您重新焕发活力，肌肤获得完美呵护。
柠檬香茅活力护肤油（10ml） 
利用护肤油唤醒肌肤和感觉。 富含香茅、槲寄生和马尾成分，可令身体重新焕发活力，同时紧致和调理肌肤，令肌肤顺滑水嫩、柔软舒适。 其独特配方利用创新调和工艺方法精心混合葵花籽油，将混合物加热至37℃的体温，令肌肤滋养特性转移至护肤油中。
柠檬香茅活力润肤乳（10ml） 
一种可令身体焕发活力的清爽润肤乳。 加入柠檬和香茅萃取物，该快速吸收配方可调理和紧致肌肤，而荷荷巴油、葵花籽油和橄榄油的混合物可补充水分并进行彻底深层滋养。木瓜籽提取物具有舒缓功效并提供长效保湿，令肌肤细嫩柔软、光滑水嫩、活力十足。 积极、健康生活方式的理想补充。
木瓜保湿润肤乳（10ml） 
利用木瓜籽、黑刺李和鼠尾草提取物，该奢华身体润肤乳可迅速被肌肤吸收，提供长效保湿。 荷荷巴和橄榄油可保持健康的水分平衡，增加柔软度，同时令肌肤如丝般柔软。
 滋润护手霜（10ml）
使用滋润护手霜深层滋润干燥、粗糙和辛勤劳作的双手。 利用具有再生功效的Bryophyllum植物配制，该快速吸收面霜支持皮肤的自然更新过程，令肌肤滋润水嫩，如丝般柔滑。 抚慰和焕发活力，令双手在寒冷、恶劣和干燥条件下受到保护。
name: Hauschka生机和能力套装（6×10ml）

product_description:

本款沐浴露质地柔软，适合所有肌肤类型。其香味令人放松，可保持肌肤天然水分，洁净肌肤，令肌肤充满活力。 包含大量的天然成分，如：薄荷，可令肌肤清凉舒爽；生姜，可刺激血液循环；蔬菜甘油、蜂蜜、小麦提取物，可软化和调理肌肤。

这种配方适合日常使用，可用于所有发质，温和清洗秀发，令秀发充满生机，并清除护发产品和日常生活遗留的污垢。 含有多种天然成分，包括：姜，促进头发生长；巴巴苏和椰子油，滋养头皮，促进血液循环。

Tackle rough patches and dryness with the Adam Revolution Ultimate Hand Repair Oxygen Cream; an adaptive hand cream especially developed for men to deliver intensive hydrating care.
Ideal for hands often subjected to heavy-duty work, outdoor sports or varying climates, the moisturising formula utilises an Oxygenating Complex – made up of sea-derived minerals and Vitamin C – to effectively stimulate metabolic activity and enhance oxygen levels within fibroblasts. As a result, skin feels re-energised and restored with enhanced protection against free radical damage.
Fortified with a natural complex of ceramides, phospholipids and glycolipids, it improves the natural barrier function for increased repair of callouses, with Allantoin delivering soothing benefits. Hands feel smooth and replenished, effectively protected from further damage.

Hands feel moisturised and re-energised.

取本品塗抹於肌膚，打出豐富泡沫。用這款產品精緻地開啟一天或結束一天。本品能打出豐富的泡沫，清潔的同時美膚，讓肌膚散發淡淡花香。

使用說明：

product_description:
Target hard to reach aches and pains with the HoMedics Shiatsu Max 2.0 Back and Shoulder Massager; a high-performance massage chair from the leading innovators in home massage. Arriving in a muted grey hue, the massage seat is able to complement the colour palette of almost every living room. The cover arrives with a secure strapping system and is the perfect fit for most office and home chairs, simply place on a chair and secure with the adjustable strap.
The chair cover boasts an adjustable seat and headrest, which ensures the massager is suitable for all shapes and sizes, targeting the correct places for each individual. Arriving with a variety of fourteen massage programmes ranging from Shiatsu to Vibration, the massage seat guarantees to feature a sequence to suit your needs, whilst the optional heat function works to intensify any programme.
Offering instant relief, the back and shoulder massager offers the benefits of a professional massage, from the comfort of your own home. The seat eliminates feelings of discomfort and muscle tension that may result from physical work or even being hunched over a desk. It also increases the production of endorphins in the body to deliver a stress-reducing effect.
The cover is crafted from resistant material and is complete with a detachable back cover. This can be placed in a washing machine, whilst the rest of the chair can be simply wiped down, to maintain a pristine condition.

Finished with a crucial dose of Cucumber Seed extract, the hand and nail cream is rich in Vitamin C, which offers a soothing sensation to skin and ensures it is free from irritation. Skin is silky soft and comfortably hydrated.

Quickstart Exhilarating Shower Gel (200ml)
Awaken skin with the Quick Start Exhilarating Shower Gel. Without stripping skin of essential moisture, the shower gel delivers Coconut-derived cleansers, fresh Spearmint and V-Tonic™, alongside a blend of vitamins and ingredients containing antioxidant properties, which provide skin with luxurious hydration. Guarana-derived caffeine gives the shower gel a reviving effect, leaving skin refreshed.
Double Buff Exfoliator (150ml)
The Double Buff Enzyme Exfoliator polishes your skin without the use of any rough beads; Pumice, Lava and Bamboo blended with Papaya and Pineapple enzymes do all the work efficiently and gently. The formula gives the appearance of even skin tone and helps to reveal a new, soft layer of skin that is ready to glow. Also suitable for use on your face and perfect for priming your skin before applying self-tan.
name: Shower Essentials Duo (Worth £41)

product_description:
Clarify and refresh hands with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Hand Wash; a lightweight, pH balanced formula that utilises naturally-derived surfactants to cleanse skin without stripping moisture.
Infused with extracts of Brown Algae and antioxidant-rich Green Seaweed, the luxurious gel gently eliminates impurities whilst softening and conditioning hands to leave them smooth and comfortable. Imparts a crisp, fresh scent of aquatic, musk and sea breeze accords.

product_description: Shiseido的的Ever Bloom Body润肤霜的奢华香气令人沉醉，这款保湿霜可让您的肌肤如丝般柔软，获得完美呵护。 利用来自甜荷花、茉莉的花香和保加利亚玫瑰油，融入栀子、突尼斯橙花和木质底调香气，让精致香味萦绕全身。 深层滋补，快速吸收，您会获得清香萦绕的光滑、柔软肌肤。 E.N.

product_description:
Freezeframe BB 遮瑕身体啫喱让您拥有无可挑剔的妆效；它是一款含有保湿霜、BB 霜和调色乳三合一产品，经临床实践证明可有效增强肌肤的光泽度。
其清爽的配方中蕴含有卡卡度果，是一种被认可的澳大利亚超级水果，它含有大量的维他命 C 和优质的抗氧化成分，使这款身体啫喱能够有效抵挡环境侵害因素的影响，起到持久保湿作用。
仅需 60 秒就能让您实现光学遮瑕，修复瑕疵、皱纹和增大的毛孔，同时其独特的亮白玻璃粉可瞬间增强肌肤的光泽度，有效应对肤色不均匀或变色的问题。 这款啫喱具有打底、爽肤和抗衰老等多重好处，让您拥有所期待的如画般完美的哑光肌肤，让您尽享光滑、柔光的肌肤。

product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn's Bestsellers Hand Therapy Sample combines a host of best-selling, scented hand creams. 
Each super-moisturising and replenishing formula harnesses the softening and conditioning properties of Shea Butter and Macadamia Oil to comfort and condition your hands, nails and cuticles. The quick-absorbing creams enrich the skin with a host of beneficial ingredients, so skin feels hydrated, soothed and delicately fragranced.
Gardeners (fresh green scent with Clover, Lavender and Sage)
La Source (an aquatic fragrance with notes of Musk and Sea Breezes)
Caribbean Island (Island Wild Flowers, Tropical Citrus Fruits, Jasmine and Sea Air)
Pomegranate (citrus fragrance with sweet Pomegranate and fresh Fig Leaf)
Rosewater (classic English Rosewater scent with leafy green notes)
Tarocco Orange (citrus scent with Orange, Bergamot, and Neroli)
name: & Evelyn Bestsellers Hand Therapy Sample 6 x 25g

product_description:
Treat your skin to Karin Herzog’s Huile Scintillante, a wonderfully lightweight and lavish body oil that utilises light-reflecting particles to give you a radiant complexion.  
Bursting with essential oils and uplifting natural aromas of cinnamon and sweet orange, the shimmering oil nourishes and conditions skin to leave it feeling sumptuously soft and hydrated. Subtle iridescent particles provide a luminous glimmer, perfect for all skin types especially when tanned for that gorgeous summer glow.
name: Herzog Huile Scintillante

product_description:
柑橘清香伴君入梦，并提供肌肤所需的维生素，从而保持亮泽。 适合干性肌肤。
BEAUTIFUL SLEEP：宜人的柑橘香味和花香共同驱散焦虑，并鼓励积极进取的精神，让您安然入梦。 含有气味类似于柠檬草的木姜子油 - 柠檬草被用于中药，镇静心神。
BEAUTIFUL SKIN：取自橘子树的肌肤软化油与天竺葵和没药共同护理肌肤，使其恢复自然平衡。 富含维生素 A、B 和 E 的椰子坚果、荷荷巴油和白色茶籽油易于吸收，可在夜间深层滋养滋润肌肤，从头到脚实现顺滑效果。
使用说明：挤出两满吸管本品至装有温水的深浴缸中。 为了获得更强烈的体验，可在步入浴缸之前轻轻按摩至肌肤上。 进行三次慢呼吸并放松。 从头到脚享受温和滋润，准备进入完美梦乡。
避免接触眼睛 如同所有香薰产品一样，在怀孕期间最好先咨询助产士，方可使用。
name: the Moon After Dark Bath Oil Glow (100ml)

product_description: Cowshed 的這款乳液釋放肌膚壓力，令肌膚倍感愉悅舒緩，寬舒閒適。富含自然滋養的可可油和維生素E，不含防腐劑、石油化工原料、硫磺、人造香精和染料。

product_description: 有神奇健康恢复作用的 Sandalo 沐浴露以优质天然植物为主要成分制成，不含对羟基苯甲酸酯。 满是异域 Sandalo 树精油，可令人产生快感的水仙香味，香根草、玫瑰和茉莉花，以及雪松和柚木的木色调。 这是介绍这种用西西里岛植物和花卉以传统方法制成的独特香水的绝佳介绍方式。
name: Sandalo 沐浴露 (250ml)

Beautifully scented, the Weleda Wild Rose Pampering Body Lotion stimulates the skin’s regenerative processes to maintain its natural elasticity.
Weleda Wild Rose Pampering Body Lotion contains organic wild rose oil, jojoba oil and hamamelis to noticeably smooth the skin while the fragrance of the Damascene Rose indulges your senses. Perfect for dry or normal skin, this deeply nourishing cream absorbs deeply leaving you with a hydrated and soft feel.

product_description:

Ideal for use post sporting activites, the body wash combines energising essential oils with bio-degradable surfactants to effectively sweep away dirt and neutralise odours while invigorating the senses. Extract of Arnica Montana Flower helps stimulate blood circulation, leaving skin feeling clean, fresh and rejuvenated.

product_description:
用 Australian Bodycare Hand Cream令您的双手保持柔软水嫩。 这款深层滋润凝胶富贵奢华，有助于驱除不舒服的干斑，如此您的双手会光滑而健康。 它蕴含 1％的因抗菌性而闻名的茶树油，还含有摩洛哥坚果油和牛油果油，可深层滋润您的双手。
日常温和地使用这款快速吸收的凝胶，它可以有效舒缓和疗愈所有护理问题，而尿囊素可以修复您的肌肤，有助于减少衰老的迹象，如此您的双手会在更长一段时间内看起来青春健康。 - L.M.

product_description:
Ortigia 推出的 Fico D'India 身体乳霜特别添加了具有滋润功效的橄榄油和保湿的羊毛脂，是您必不可少的美发产品，为肌肤带去温柔的呵护。 这款身体乳霜带有无花果和雪松木的浓郁馨香，深入肌肤，长效持久。 乳霜质地轻盈不油腻，丝般柔滑，非常适合用于滋润身体和双手。 - R.H
Ortiga 是一家制作香皂和香薰产品的意大利公司，由 Sue Townsend 于2006年在西西里岛创立。 品牌只采用天然原料，灵感来源于西西里的美学、色彩和芬芳，带给您奢华香皂、香薰、护肤霜、蜡烛和乳液等丰富的产品。
name: Fico d'India 身体乳霜（300ml）

product_description:

能有效保濕醒膚，這款天然的護手霜能令您的雙手散發健康的光澤。 -SA 
 不含對羥基苯甲酸酯或鄰苯二甲酸鹽 
 使用說明：

拥有可快速吸收配方，该手部和身体润肤霜加入非洲牛油果脂和红花油质体以长效保湿，对付干燥、粗糙的皮肤，从而获得极致舒适。
必需氨基酸加强肌肤，增加柔韧性，同时强大的生物提取物有助于紧实、美白全身肌肤，从而获得健康、调理和容光焕发的肌肤。 E.N.

充满薰衣草的清香。

product_description:

这款沐浴露含有取自纯天然原料的浓缩薰衣草精油，具有芳香气味，在泡澡后有助于平衡您的情绪，让您恢复活力并滋养全身肌肤。 混入水中时，其配方会发挥自然舒缓和放松的特性，有助于驱除疲劳并激发宁静的感觉。
不含对羟基苯甲酸酯，矿物油和人工香料。

product_description:
Treat your body and hair to NUXE Sun Travel Kit SPF30 2017, a set of protective formulas to keep skin and hair safe in the sun. Combining a high protection face cream with an after-sun shampoo and after-sun lotion, the trio will help keep skin and hair healthy and refreshed during outdoor escapades.
Delicious Cream for Face SPF 30 (50ml)
A high protection sun lotion for face. Infused with Sun and Water Flowers, the cream helps protect against premature ageing and has been specially formulated to treat delicate skin on the face. It melts in quickly without leaving an unsightly white film. Shielding your skin against harmful UV rays, it will keep skin safe whilst promoting a beautiful tan. Infused with an exotic fragrance of Sweet Orange, Tahitian Gardenia and Vanilla. Photostable. Alcohol free.
After-Sun Hair & Body Shampoo (50ml)
A multi-tasking formula that gently lifts away residues that can accumulate after a day in the sun, such as UV filters, salt, chlorine and sand. Performing a refreshing cleanse on skin and hair, it contains Sun and Water Flowers, and expertly removes impurities to leave skin feeling fresh and revitalised, and hair soft and supple. Infused with an exotic fragrance.
Refreshing After-Sun Lotion (50ml)
A soothing aftersun formula for the face and body. Instantly refreshing on application, the Sun and Water Flower-infused formula helps to hydrate skin and prolong your hard earned tan. Its fresh texture leaves skin feeling relieved and comfortable. Enriched with an exotic Sweet Orange, Tahitian Gardenia and Vanilla fragrance. Suitable for all skin types.
name: Sun Travel Kit SPF30 2017

product_description:
用Organic Surge 热带 Orange and Bergamot Hand 和 Body Washrefresh及滋补您的肌肤，它的舒缓配方富含各种抗氧化剂，可在洁肤及清除杂质的同时锁住水分

A delicate balance of Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamins C and E provide essential nutrients and moisture, working to smooth the surface texture and deeply hydrate for long lasting comfort. Each super-moisturising and replenishing formula harnesses the softening and conditioning properties of Shea Butter and Macadamia Oil to comfort and condition your hands, nails and cuticles. Enriched with activated Charcoal which draws impurities out of skin, and naturally antioxidant Tomatoes (also rich in fruit acids), the balancing soap helps to absorb excess sebum that can cause blemishes, and protect the skin against environmental factors that can clog and congest your pores. Skin is left feeling clarified and detoxified with a balanced, healthier-looking appearance.

product_description:
体验St. Tropez最深古铜色，就用深古铜色喷雾。这是一款速干特级美黑产品，可根据个人肤色进行调节，为您打造自然的深金色肤色。
超吸收配方，操作简单。 采用了革命性黑色素技术，可巧妙地调整肤色，使之与您的肤色匹配。内含的滋养型调理剂和抗氧化剂，可滋润保护肌肤。延长美黑时间、使美黑的肤色慢慢均匀的变淡。 为您打造均匀无痕的肤色。轻巧的喷雾均匀洒落在皮肤上，使肤色逐渐变为自然的深棕褐色，持久长效。采用Aromaguard™Fragrance技术，使本品不会散发出人工日晒产品的难闻味道。 - K.N

Organic Surge 超级清爽 Deodorant 旨在让您全天保持清爽以避免腋下散发不愉快的气味。
采用天然成分的独特混合物专门配制，专门消除由细菌引起的气味，这款提神的滚动式除臭剂结合山鸡椒精油（传统上用于治疗多汗）和醇酸锌，它不会抑制自然汗液分泌或扰乱肌肤的自然菌群。 其清爽的特性和佛手柑精油含量有助于自然解毒和排除毒素。 腋下感觉超级清爽和畅快。

同时，依兰和广藿香的优雅组合可以使您的皮肤更为细腻，全天持久地散发出超级迷人的花香气息。 - L.M.使用说明：

JASON Invigorating Rosewater Body Wash能彻底清洁肌肤，令肌肤感觉柔软润泽。 天然配方中的玫瑰水和金盏花精华舒缓滋养、香气提神； 维生素E和维生素原B5能亮白和保护全身肌肤。 - K.R

蕴含天然衍生的最新美黑成分，DHA和赤藓酮糖（Erthulose）促进肌肤表层黑色素生成，有效形成美黑效果，令肌肤呈现自然美黑的神采。
亲附肌肤的配方以及"show where it goes"的妆色引导效果能让您轻松完成仿晒涂抹，再也不用匆忙赶去美黑沙龙。 若想打造更深的美黑肤色，只需连续多日反复涂抹本品即可 - SA

非常适合喷洒在枕头，瑜伽垫，车和办公室里。能够帮助提升日常睡眠质量，帮助缓解紧张引起的头痛。同时也可以悄悄的缓解家庭问题的紧张气氛。

本乳霜可被迅速吸收，保护并滋润您的皮肤，可以防止身体任何地方出现粗糙或者张紧之感，从而让您的皮肤光滑、柔软水嫩。 此款具有天鹅绒般触感的身体乳油散发出一种微妙的清香，持久萦绕在你的皮肤之上。本产品可以滋润和保护您的皮肤，让您有舒缓放松的感觉。 - L.M.使用说明：

有助於改善傷疤和磨損皮膚。茶樹油以其出色的藥用功效著稱，多年來被用作天然抗菌防蟲物質，改善肌膚紊亂。

product_description:
MICRO Pedi NANO 是一款创新的便携式修脚设备，旨在去除脚部角质，令脚部肌肤不再干燥、坚硬、粗糙。 其独特的、超粗微矿物水晶滚筒可 360 度旋转，每秒转动三十次。对肌肤无刺激。 本手持设备无需摩擦，可轻松减少脚跟龟裂、老茧、鸡眼等。其速度比金属刮刀速度更快。
MICRO Pedi NANO 结构紧凑、设计轻便，适合旅游时使用。无论何地均可即刻帮您重获丝绸般柔软的双脚。 该设备已得到美国足病医学协会的首肯，被评为有益足部健康之设备。采用 Pedi Flex+ 滚轮技术，可清除脚部 99.9% 的细菌。 E.N. 
请注意：出于卫生原因，建议每个滚筒仅供一人使用，不得与他人共用。

利用可锁延时间的松香油、透明质酸、辣木油、海甘蓝油进行专业配制，同时含有氨基酸和水分调理机制，令肌肤顺滑柔嫩，光亮滋润。 衰老迹象将明显减少，您的肌肤将活力四射、光彩照人 - L.M.

product_description:
The Perfect Body Muscle Therapy from this works delivers targeted relief from aches and pains in a portable rollerball form for quick and effortless on-the-go treatment.
A reformulation of the original In Transit Muscle Therapy, the soothing formula utilises a powerful superblend of 100% natural essential oils with a host of aromatherapeutic and holistic benefits, including relaxing Marjoram, pain-relieving Clove and stimulating Black Pepper.
Simply roll across skin for instant warmth and comfort, acting as a massage therapist in a bottle to alleviate the feeling of tension and post-workout sores. Can also be used to treat headaches.

product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn's Jasmine Body Care Duo is a limited edition pairing that has been carefully curated to cleanse and moisturise your skin whilst imparting a delectable fragrance. Utilising the brand's exclusive Triple Oil Blend, the duo work in synergy to leave the skin and senses feeling revived and replenished.
Old World Jasmine Indulgent Bath and Shower Gel (300ml)
A luxurious body wash that works into a rich lather to gently cleanse and moisturise the skin whilst uplifting the senses. Formulated with the brand's exclusive Triple Oil Blend of Moringa, Evening Primrose and Rosehip, it gently eliminates impurities and delivers antioxidant properties to leave skin feeling soft and supple.  Fragrance: White Jasmine and sparkling Citrus.
Old World Jasmine Hydrating Body Lotion (300ml)
A lightweight yet intensely hydrating lotion that nourishes and moisturises from head to toe. Infused with a Triple Oil Blend comprising Moringa, Evening Primrose and Rosehip Oils, the formula melts effortlessly into skin, delivering nutrients and omegas to leave the body feeling replenished, nourished and silky soft. Fragrance: White Jasmine and sparkling Citrus. Free from colour and phthalates.

product_description:
Develop a flawless, streak-free tan with the SKINNY TAN Express Mousse; a convenient tanning foam that delivers long-lasting results. Working on both the face and body, the fluffy formula guarantees an enviable tan, without an unwanted orange-hued finish.
Enriched with two, certified natural tanning ingredients, the lightweight mousse quickly and effortlessly glides over skin, offering a sun-kissed glow that develops from application. The tan can be worn for 1-3 hours before rinsing away, depending on how dark you want to go.
The self tan also boasts organic Aloe Vera and active Caffeine, which ensure skin is thoroughly and comfortably hydrated, whilst perfecting the face and body by reducing the appearance of blemishes and cellulite. Finished with a tropical dose of organic Coconut, the tanning mousse leaves skin beautifully bronzed and smelling delicious.
name: TAN Express Mousse 150ml

product_description:
Reveal natural-looking, bronzed skin with the SKINNY TAN 7 Day Tanner in Dark; an effective tanning cream that delivers long-lasting results. Effortlessly gliding onto clean, exfoliated skin, the false tan offers a deep golden glow that develops into an enviable, sun-kissed tan lasting up to seven days.
The tanner is intelligently created with a makeup guide colour, which allows you to see where the product has been applied to, and therefore produce more even results. Please bear in mind that the guide colour is designed to be darker that the tan developing underneath.
The tan is enriched with Sweet Almond Oill and Gurana, which work in synergy to perfect skin by concealing and reducing the appearance of imperfections, including blemishes and cellulite. Complete with a fragrant, tropical scent, the self tan envelops skin in an exotic fragrance instead of the typical, tell-tale tan aroma.
name: TAN 7 Day Tanner - Dark 125ml

product_description:
Imedeen Derma One Tablets 含独有海洋活性复合精华，富含多糖和蛋白质。这些成分都是肌肤结构的组成部分。 服用后将大大增强肌肤的天然再生能力。 配方还含锌和维生素 C 等成分，可显著提升肌肤健康，以及生成胶原质的能力。
本产品为促使细胞更新进程和对抗自由基损伤而设计。 因此，Imedeen Derma One Tablets 是护肤系列中的必备产品。
请注意：每小包含 2 个月的服用量。

product_description:
使用这款全效精油为你的肌肤轻松补充强有效的 Omegas，维他命以及抗氧化剂，拥抱光滑、透亮更健康的肌肤。帮助肌肤锁住必要水分，使肌肤看起来更加有弹性。帮助均匀肤色，修复伤疤，减少生长纹、妊娠纹。
在每天淋浴后使用在湿润的皮肤上以提供额外的补水。仅需一点就可以覆盖大面积。为了实现最佳效果，请向上向心的方向细致的按摩帮助吸收。这样按摩的手法可以促进血液循环，帮助精油充分吸收，并给你的肌肤带来更多氧气和营养。

product_description:
Dare to bare your legs with the this works Skin Deep Dry Leg Oil; an award-winning blend that instantly transforms dry and dull skin, revealing radiant, shiny and softened legs. Arriving in a limited edition travel size, the leg oil is the perfect travel companion.
Comfortably massaging into skin and suitable for daily use, the oil utilises a 100% natural superblend of Essential Oils, alongside an array of cold-pressed Plant Oils, including Rose Oil, Sandalwood and Evening Primrose. Its luxurious formula helps to restore and maintain skin’s lipid barrier, whilst enveloping the legs in a veil of nourishing moisture. The blend of oils eliminates areas of dry, dull and scaly skin to keep legs in tip top condition.
Delivering instant and long-lasting results, the Skin Deep Dry Leg Oil is sure to become a beauty essential. Legs are nourished, comfortable and youthful, with skin that visibly glows.

product_description: 茱莉蔻薰衣草沐浴露,清爽豐富的泡沫，富含薰衣草的生命活力，讓肌膚潔淨、清新、滋潤.

可用有滋养作用的 REN Moroccan Rose Otto 润体霜护理身体。 这种润体霜特别适用于干性或病态皮肤，通过刺激贝塔内啡肽的释放，一面发挥舒缓作用，一面改善心情。
REN Moroccan Rose Otto 润体霜可防止受到日常损伤（如紫外线伤害、污染和自由基）的影响，而野玫瑰果秄油中的必需脂肪酸和荷荷巴油则可以提高皮肤脂质含量。
REN 产品也不含许多人工成分，如石油化学产品、硫酸盐、对羟苯甲酸酯、合成香水、人造色素、T.E.A、D.E.A、二醇、硅酮和聚乙二醇。
使用说明：
name: Moroccan Rose Otto 润体霜 (200ml)

product_description:
Create a flawless canvas for tanning with Vita Liberata's Super Fine Skin Polish; a gentle body scrub that works to buff away dead, dull skin cells without damaging, scratching or over-drying.
Harnessing the powers of Walnut, Sweet Almond and Beeswax, the luxurious exfoliator helps to enhance the effectiveness of your fake tan to ensure even and streak-free colour. Its innovative Moisture Locking System delivers 72 hour hydration, whilst certified organic and natural extracts provide anti-ageing benefits. Skin is soft, smooth and prepared for self tan application.

product_description:
PAYOT Gommage Amande Body磨砂膏是一种去角质霜，它可软化皮肤，使皮肤充满活力、光滑，也可修复皮肤。
该款磨砂膏中添加有杏仁及开心果的微晶粒，此配方可对皮肤进行温和的、机械剥离，从而去死皮，使暗沉肌肤变得发亮，同时使细胞更新。您也将会拥有明亮、光滑、有光泽的肌肤。 它还包含牛油果油、荷荷巴油、甜杏仁油等成分。这些成分会滋养皮肤，使皮肤柔软。
皮肤得到清洁、净化、因此后续的皮肤护理也更容易。 同时皮肤重新焕发光泽、洁净如初。

腿部消肿凝胶™随时随地让你的疲劳的双腿和肿胀的双脚做个迷你SPA 30ml

product_description:
用Rio全Body 蜡膜套装让从头到脚的皮肤都变得柔软光滑。 该套装包含用于胳膊和腿的软蜡，还包含更适合更敏感区域（包括胡须和比基尼线）的硬蜡。
这种蜡升温迅速，用木抹刀很容易敷用，将蜡粘到毛发上而非皮肤上，如此可快而轻易地去掉蜡。 您可以在自己舒适的家里取得与沙龙美体质量等同的效果。 - L.M.
开始之前，先观看步骤 DVD 了解技巧以及打蜡技术的完整指南。 始终在皮肤的一小块面积上做皮肤过敏试验，看是否可能出现皮肤反应。 还建议清洗并擦干您将要上蜡的区域，以暂时清除身体的天然油脂，并帮助蜡粘在毛发上。
将沙龙软蜡桶放在加热器内，确保去除了盖子。 给加热器通电以融化蜡。 充分搅拌，直至蜡与糖浆类似。
把 1 片硬蜡放入加热杯中，然后将杯子放入加热器内。 给加热器通电以融化蜡。 充分搅拌，直至蜡变得光滑、如浓稠的蜂蜜。
用抹刀，涂一层厚而平坦的蜡条，蜡条平坦，宽度不超过一英寸。 使蜡在皮肤上冷却，直到变硬，但仍然柔韧。 使蜡在皮肤上冷却，直到变硬，但仍然柔韧。 用一只手拉紧皮肤，用手指拂去蜡角，如此有一个可以抓住的区域。 从头发生长相反的方向快速撕开蜡。 不要把蜡从皮肤上撕开。
不要在您身体上松弛擦破了皮的部分或表现出下列迹象的任何区域使用这种产品：静脉曲张、皮肤病（如湿疹、牛皮癣、皮炎）、割伤和擦伤、红肿、疣、痣、过敏或晒伤、静脉炎、糖尿病、最近的瘢痕组织、其他皮肤疾病。 如果您患有任何上述疾病，我们建议您在治疗前咨询您的医生。 不要在割伤或破损的皮肤上使用。
name: Removal套件

product_description:
Transform your skincare routine with the Mama Mio First Trimester Butter Bundle. Combining a trio of bestselling Mama Mio products, the bundle is designed to treat and nourish skin in order to cope with hormone changes that occur in the first trimester of pregnancy. Host to a moisturising body butter, luxurious body lotion and refreshing facial wash, each product within the bundle is suitable for use whilst pregnant and will leave skin thoroughly nourished.
The Tummy Rub Butter (120g)
Help protect your skin against pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Butter. Enriched with Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids, the butter contributes towards skin's strength and elasticity, whilst organic Shea Butter provides a barrier to lock in moisture. Specially formulated with organic Rose Hip oil, which works to prevent and reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, the luxurious butter works to hydrate skin, while Argan Oil helps nourish.
Megamama (150ml)
Help nourish and replenish dry skin with Megamama, a super-rich omega body lotion. The luxurious cream contains Omega oils and powerful antioxidants to help strengthen and shield skin from free radical damage and environmental stresses. Enriched with Chia and Pumpkin seed, the cream leaves skin hydrated. Legs and arms can be particularly needy during pregnancy, causing skin to look tired and dull. Megamama allows you to experience a boost in radiance and reveal skin that is bursting with moisture. Suitable for use while pregnant and nursing to make skin feel moisturised and subtly fragranced for the whole day.
Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash (100ml)
Gently cleanse skin with the foaming Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash. Specially formulated with Tea Tree oil and Green Tea Leaf, the wash helps keep skin hydrated and provides powerful antioxidants that shield skin from free radical damage and environmental stresses. The luxurious formula contains a blend of natural, Coconut-derived cleansers enriched with organic Omegas and Vitamins to nourish skin. Experience skin that is full of moisture with a boost in radiance for a brighter complexion.
name: Mio First Trimester Butter Bundle (Worth £71)

product_description:
Who run the world? (Girls).Be Your Best is an awesome blend of vitamins designed for active women looking to boost their multivitamin intake to support their physical and dietary needs.
This impressive blend of micronutrients including vitamins C, E and D contribute to the normal functioning of the immune system following intense exercise. These vitamins, along with the other potent mineral ingredients contribute to the normal function of the cardiovascular, respiratory and muscular systems whilst you sweat it out. These comprehensive ingredients are scientifically designed to help improve recovery time and avoid you becoming prematurely fatigued during exercise.
Be Your Best is a great addition to every active lifestyle, helping you to achieve your exercise goals by supporting both performance and recovery. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.
name: Your Best

Bio-Oil 生物油由多种维生素和天然植物精油混合调制而成，包括金盏花油，甘菊油和维生素 E，可帮助淡化疤痕、妊娠纹和不均匀肤色。

 Lavender及天竺葵Body Moisturiser（200毫升）： 
日常保湿，致力于保湿和滋养所有皮肤类型。 该配方采用植物活性物，可以软化、舒缓和深度滋润干燥的皮肤，促进皮肤柔软、亮丽。 蓝蓟油（富含OMEGAS 3，6和9）与具有保湿性能的Shea黄油和澳大利亚冷加压的Avocado，Jojoba和Lavender油相融合，起到深层镇静和滋养作用。 它的纯天然配方使肌肤具有丝绸般柔软的感觉。
Lavender Body Wash (500ml)：
有补给身体沐浴露肥皂和对羟基苯甲酸免费。 它Organic Lavender油，注入式采用非干燥清洁剂解除冲走杂质而不引起刺激。 Skin手感柔软、洁净而舒适。 不含肥皂、对羟基苯甲酸酯和硫酸盐。
 Lavender＆Anthyliss免洗Conditioner（150ml）中：

Packed full of minerals and detoxifying ingredients, the mask utilises Fango Active Mud which expertly energises and nourishes skin from head to toe. Its gentle exfoliating properties slough away dead skin, unclog pores and deeply purify to reveal smoother, softer, brighter-looking skin. Fine lines appear reduced and the face and body are left feeling firmer and hydrated with improved clarity. Infused with Sweet Almond and Avocado Oils to nourish and comfort.

It's great against foot odour, athletes foot, nail infections and other bacterial or fungal infections. Helps ensure healthy feet and brightens discoloured toe nails. It contains a Juniper berry essential oil infusion that fragrances your feet and regulates perspiration. The deodourising and repairing action works for up to 8 hours to really give you confidence to step out.
Directions of Use:

Initially formulated as part of a luxurious spa treatment at the Bulgari Hotel, the oil contains a specific selection of essential oils that are renowned for healing properties both physically and mentally.
Working to boost circulation and condition skin, the aromatic blend opens on a delicate bouquet of Chamomile, Ylang Ylang and Geranium, with sensual accords of Vetiver and Frankincense. Settling upon a base of Sweet Almond and Sesame, it helps soothe aching bones and joints while clarifying the mind for a greater sense of wellbeing and calm.
