Lightweight and non-greasy, the cream effortlessly melts in, with the main active ingredient of Neroli Oil seeking to repair and restore skin with a firming effect. Shea Butter is brimming with vitamins, aiming to combat environmental aggressors and soften skin with intense moisture, whilst Ximenia Seed Oil intensely nourishes and hydrates. Expect visibly smoother and refined skin.

The lightweight formula effortlessly glides onto the face and can be worn under your usual moisturiser. Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Vitamin E, Lavender and Rose Hip, the intense serum works to restore skin’s healthy moisture levels, whilst combating visible signs of ageing. The appearance of fine lines and wrinkles is reduced and skin appears smooth and youthful.
Not only delivering anti-ageing benefits, the 6-Oil Super Serum also boasts therapeutic results that can promote a good night’s sleep. Complete with a relaxing lavender aroma.

使用 Baxter of California Vitamin Cleansing Bar，为肌肤补充天然所需水分。 本品中段附有色带，含滋润甘油和海藻，以及维生素 A 和 E，设计巧妙，细心呵护肌肤，令肌肤体验放松与再生，每个毛孔都感受到重生、清洁和温和滋养。
本品气味芳香，意大利青柠散发馥郁芬芳，令肌肤获得再生体验。 C.R

Achieve smoother and firmer looking skin with the Cocoa Noir Sensuous & Indulgent Body Oil from Dr Botanicals. Rich in botanical extracts, the anti-ageing oil is designed to visibly firm skin for a more youthful appearance and to reduce the appearance of imperfections.
Infused with Morrocan Rose Oil and Shea Butter, the vitamin rich formula seeks to have a soothing effect on skin, whilst Neroli visibly firms, smoothes and hydrates, creating an overall younger looking appearance that is looked after and nourished.

product_description: Give the gift of a long-lasting, sun-kissed tan with this gift set from TANWORX. Whether you want to treat a friend, family member or yourself, the TANWORX Ultimate Self Tanning Collection Dark is the ideal package to create a flawless, yet even tan. - K.R TANWORX Exfoliating Cream Prep your skin for an even tan with this gentle yet effective exfoliating cream. It instantly boost skin tone and texture, removing dead skin cells to reveal a smooth canvas ready to apply your TANWORX Self Tanning Foam. TANWORX Self Tanning Foam - Dark The lightweight tinted foam glides onto skin, giving an instant bronzed glow so you can see where to apply the product. The tan develops and darkens over the course of 3 hours, leaving you with a deep, dark but natural looking tan. The no-drip formula provides a streak-free tan that quickly dries, allowing you to get on with your day as the tan develops. *Wait 8 hours after application before showering or bathing. TANWORX Tan Maintainer A fresh and hydrating moisturiser, it slows down the natural exfoliating process but restoring hydration, meaning a prolonged tan. Apply the same as your usual moisturiser to enhance and maintain your tan. TANWORX Tanning Mitt Apply your tanning products quickly and easily without worrying about staining your hands. The tanning mitt has been made with a special formula-resistant barrier, protecting hands and wrists from staining. The soft mitt provides an even, streak-free tan with every product, which can then be put into the washing machine to clean when you're done.

Cleanse and pamper skin with the Vani-T Body Shampoo. Free from SLS and sulphates, the gentle body wash has a natural and organic based formula that sweeps away dirt and grime while infusing skin with nourishing anti-ageing actives.
Fortified with Marine Collagen and fruit-extracted Vitamin C, it helps stimulate cellular repair and renewal while botanically-sourced Phytolin™ ensures maximum hydration. A blend of luxurious, antioxidant-rich oils leave skin feeling smooth, supple and revitalised with a delectable coconut scent.

product_description:
用 Seascape Island Apothecary Refresh Hand霜(300ml) 令您的双手保持光滑、柔软水嫩。 这款平衡型护手霜的配方蕴含舒缓性的泽西薰衣草精油、爽肤性的柠檬香草精油、清洁性的天竺葵精油和滋养性的牛油果油精油，可令您的双手充满活力、焕然一新。
这款亲肤配方 Perfect干燥超负荷的手，具有高度保湿的功效，可令您的肌肤触感柔软、清爽舒适。 它不含苯甲酸酯类和人工色素及香料，适合所有肌肤类型，即使是最敏感的肌肤。 - L.M.

Formulated with 74% natural ingredients, the bath foam is made with an expert blend of marshmallow, aloe leaf, coconut and sweet almond to condition and soothe your skin, whilst the calming fragrance of lavender, sweet basil and jasmine will promote deep sleep. - L.M.

Infused with Lemon, Lavender and Sweet Almond Oils, rich in vitamins and fatty acids, the luxurious formula absorbs quickly into skin to deliver toning and firming properties, whilst minimising the appearance of dark spots and imperfections for a smoother, more refined texture.
Skin is renewed and regenerated without greasy or sticky residue.

Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting the sensual scent of Iris. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.
name: Dante Dei Colli Fiorentini Iris Soap 250g

product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Pisa' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts a floral fragrance of White Magnolia, Apricot Blossom and Lilium to rejuvenate the senses.
name: Dante Dolce Vivere Pisa Soap 250g

product_description:
Achieve long-lasting hair removal with the HoMedics Duo Salon IPL Hair Reduction; an efficient, safe and pain-free device that utilises Intense Pulse Light (IPL) technology alongside Advanced Fluorescence Technology (AFT FREEGLIDE™) in one easy-to-use device.
The hair removal system adapts to treat different areas of your body, with highly powered, single-shot IPL treatments for stubborn and thicker hair around the bikini line and underarms or use the Duo Salon head for sparse, thinner on arms and legs.
Two flashes per second means you can treat your entire body in as little as 20 minutes, with Active Cooling Technology™ delivering professional cooling to leave the surface of skin feeling cool to touch for a comfortable, salon-like experience.
Five light settings deliver gentle yet effective treatment for a range of hair types and skin tones, allowing you to adjust the intensity for specific areas. A facial attachment allows precise, targeted treatment.
name: Duo Salon IPL Hair Reduction - EU 2 Pin Plug

product_description:
Immerse yourself in the intoxicating Havana fragrance with the travel set from Archipelago Botanicals. The set combines a travel size body lotion, body wash and shampoo for soft, cleansed skin and hair on the go.
The Set Contains:
Treat your skin to Archipelago’s Botanicals Boticario di Havana Body Lotion. Based on the Havana home fragrance that blends Ylang Ylang, Tobacco Flower and Bergamot, the richly moisturising lotion has a citrus finish that is suitable for both men and women. Containing high quality natural ingredients, rich in antioxidants and AHA’s, the body lotion will keep skin hydrated without a greasy residue, will reduce redness and calm dry, rough skin and is suitable for daily use.
Based on the best-selling Havana fragrance range, the Archipelago Botanicals Boticario di Havana Body Wash, scented with Ylang Ylang, Tobacco Flower and Bergamot, is a gentle, exfoliating body wash packed with antioxidants and AHA’s to hydrate, cleanse and detoxify the skin. With a fresh citrus finish, the body wash is suitable for both men and women and is ideal for daily use for beautifully moisturised, deliciously scented and silky soft skin.
Specially developed for gentle, daily use, Archipelago’s Botanicals Boticario di Havana Shampoo, scented with the bestselling Havana fragrance is  formulated with natural jojoba oil and orange and pineapple extracts. The paraben-free shampoo is suitable for coloured and chemically treated hair that is left clean, soft, shiny and manageable.
name: Botanicals Boticario di Havana Travel Set

product_description:
Alleviate aches and unwind tension with the HoMedics Compact Percussion Handheld Massager with Heat; an advanced device to deliver deep tissue massage for intensive muscle relief.
Delivering up to 3,000 pulses per minute, the system uses dual pivot nodes and rapid percussive pulsations with variable intensity to create a custom treatment, and the ergonomic design is easy and comfortable  to use with a lengthened handle and rubberized grip.  
Changeable nodes allow you to change intensity and strength, with softer nodes for more sensitive areas such as the spine and shoulder blades, and gradual heated nodes to soothe stiff tendons. The Percussion Action Massager directly targets problematic areas, ideal for treating multiple areas all over the body including the lumbar area, legs, arms and back.
name: Compact Percussion Handheld Massager with Heat

product_description:
Refresh and cleanse with the RMK Moist Foaming Soap. Transforming into a rejuvenating lather upon application, the carbonated-foam formula sweeps away dirt, oil and impurities while helping boost blood circulation for polished and refined skin.
Enriched with moisturising extracts from Japanese Sake and Rooibos, it delivers a cocktail of beneficial nutrients and antioxidants as well as an uplifting fruity scent. Skin is left feeling soft, smooth and hydrated with a healthy looking vitality.
name: Moist Foaming Soap - Refill 130g

product_description: Discover the warm, delicate fragrance of the Exquisite Vanilla & Violet Flower Single Wick Candle from Molton Brown. Transporting your senses to Somerset, where rolling green hills meet Violet quillets, the tranquil candle releases notes of floral Freesia and dainty Rose, contrasted with juicy Bergamot and creamy Madagascan Vanilla. Presented in a glass container and matching gift box, making an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.
name: Brown Exquisite Vanilla & Violet Flower Single Wick Candle

product_description:
Get feet sandal-ready with the Well Heeled! Replacement Roller - Regular from Magnitone London. The pack houses two roller heads that are designed to replace your current, well-loved head, which may not be as effective anymore. The replacement rollers are compatible with Magnitone’s Express Pedicure System.
The powerful roller provides a thorough pedicure to feet in need of pampering. Boasting a micro-crystal roller, the head effectively buffs dry, hard and rough skin from feet, including stubborn heels.  Expect the roller to reveal salon-soft skin instantly and effortlessly.
name: London Well Heeled! Replacement Roller - Regular (x2)

product_description:
Take an aromatic journey through the hills of Florentine with Nesti Dante's Dei Colli Fiorentini Cypress Tree Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting the romantic scent of the Sweet Violet. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.
name: Dante Dei Colli Fiorentini Sweet Violet Soap 250g

product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to Weleda's Pomegranate Ribbon Box. Combines a creamy body wash, skin-softening body lotion and fruity-floral fragrance spray, all wrapped in a branded gift box.
Pomegranate Creamy Body Wash (200ml)
Harnessing the powers of Organic Pomegranate Seed Oil, the luxurious body wash gently cleanses from top to toe to leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. A warming blend of Sandalwood, Davana and Neroli Essential Oils invigorates skin and stimulates the senses to rebalance your body and mind. With regular use, skin will feel soft, smooth and perfectly pampered.
Pomegranate Body Lotion (200ml)
Specifically formulated for maturing skin, the body lotion absorbs quickly into skin to prevent premature signs of ageing. Enriched with Pomegranate Seed Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil and moisturising Shea Butter to soften and condition, whilst protecting against external aggressors so you can experience smooth, comfortable skin. with a youthful glow.
Jardin de Vie Grenade (50ml)
A joyful, energising fragrance inspired by flowering trees in oriental gardens. Opening with fruity notes of exotic Mango and Orange, the scent is enhanced by Neroli and Davana in the heart, before settling on a creamy Vanilla base. Housed in a vibrant red bottle, simply spritz onto skin to experience the rich, sensual fragrance. Suitable for vegans.
name: Pomegranate Ribbon Box (Worth £35)

product_description:
Lanolips Rose Everyday Hand Cream with Rose Oil 采用从刚剪过毛的羊身上提取的天然物质——超纯级绵羊油制作而成，为干燥的双手和指甲提供极致保湿。
软膏为 100% 纯天然，不伤害动物，具有轻盈的质地，含有玫瑰精油和角蛋白，功效得以加强，滋养保湿，呵护干燥的双手。 这种酸碱平衡的配方可迅速被肌肤吸收，高效滋润双手并恢复角质层。 肌肤和指甲会感觉滋养而舒适。 非常轻盈，可供日常使用。 - K.N
name: Lano Rose Everyday Hand Cream with Rose Oil 120ml

product_description:
Natural Birthing Company's Down Below Perineal Massage Oil is a safe and 100% natural oil formula that can be used during perineal massage to help increase elasticity 'down below'.
Perineal massage is recommended from 34 weeks of pregnancy to help prepare for labour; the massaging action helps to gently stretch skin and increase elasticity of perineal muscles to reduce the risk of tearing or episiotomy (needing a cut) during labour.
Blending Rosehip, Apricot, Calendula and Evening Primrose Oils, the relaxing formula helps to prepare your intimate area for child birth, and also doubles as a body massage oil; it moisturises skin and may reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy.
name: Birthing Company Down Below Perineal Massage Oil 50ml

product_description:
MGO™ 550+ Manuka Honey Blend is derived from Leptospermum Scoparium, a plant unique to New Zealand; its flowers are powerfully fragrant and full of nectar which attributes Manuka Honey with its rich, dark and full-bodied flavour.
MGO™ 550+ Manuka Honey is certified to contain a minimum of 250mg/kg methylgyoxal. Methylgyoxal is a naturally occurring compound in Manuka Honey that lends the substance its remarkable and unique properties. No other system of measurement gives such a clear and simple indication; the higher the MGO™ rating, the higher the Methylglyoxal content.
name: 550+ Pure Manuka Honey Blend

product_description:
為您的沐浴時光增添魅力。美觀時尚的淋浴帽不僅外觀精緻，而且舒適實用。 
這款優質浴帽採用PEVA 材料，柔軟環保又防水，能讓您的頭髮在沐浴或沖澡時保持乾爽。本品還可用於頭髮造型。對於具有調理作用的集中修護產品，能夠產生奇妙作用！
name: London 环保浴帽 - 黑白条纹

product_description:
小蜜蜂護臀膏爽身粉二合一為膏狀，乾後會形成一層粉膜，是一款好用的多功能嬰兒護理產品。不刺激配方能很好地作用於寶寶肌膚，而其粉末質地能吸收多餘水分。 - KR 
 *採用99%天然原料。 
使用說明：
name: Bees 小蜜蜂护臀膏爽身粉二合一

product_description:
Bubble T 泡沫 T 柠檬香草&绿茶沐浴啫喱让您的身心重焕活力；其保湿配方旨在清洁、舒缓肌肤，为全身的肌肤补充营养。
这款沐浴啫喱蕴含有抗氧化剂枸杞浆果和柠檬萃取物的混合物，能够温和地祛除杂质，而不是引起肌肤丧失水分，与此同时，使肌肤散发着绿茶和柑橘那令人兴奋的芳香，让您感觉精力充沛。
name: T 泡沫 T 沐浴啫喱——柠檬香草&绿茶 200ml

product_description:
MenScience 日常洗体液是一种多功能洁肤液，可使皮肤和毛孔超级洁净、光滑，更有活力。 乙醇酸和水杨酸有助于溶解晦暗的堆积物，以及深入清洁毛孔和毛囊。
MenScience 日常洗体液最适合已失去活力和敏感的皮肤，建议将其用于日常清洁，以使皮肤光滑并且焕然一新。 其独特的配方可使皮肤光滑并恢复活力，从而一面溶解死细胞和晦暗的堆积物，一面温和地去除汗水、污泥和杂质，进而迅速彻底冲掉污垢。 这种洁肤液可恢复皮肤的天然柔软度和健康外观，将污垢和残留物从毛孔和毛囊中清除。
日常洗体液含有乙醇酸和阿尔法羟基酸 (AHA)，可使皮肤更光滑，更柔软，还可以减少细纹、干斑和黑斑的出现；含有水杨酸， 用于治疗痤疮、向内生长的毛发、头屑，以及减慢衰老迹象的出现；含有尿囊素，是一种源自植物的高级抗刺激剂和舒缓剂；含有芦荟提取物；含有尿素，是一种保湿剂，能够吸水并留住水分；含有茶树提取物。
使用说明：
name: 日常洗体液 (354ml)

product_description: Australian Bodycare溫泉系列除臭劑是天然止汗劑，採用獨特輪滑球瓶包裝，適合每天使用。此溫和配方不含酒精和鋁，蘊含茶樹油，防止導致異味的細菌，全天感覺清爽。無刺激，足夠安全，可在腋下脫毛後使用。 - KN
name: Bodycare 温泉系列除臭剂 (65ml)

product_description:
Ideal for re-energising after exercise, ManCave's Cedarwood Shower Gel is a lightweight, invigorating formula developed to awaken the skin and senses.
Harnessing the powers of stimulating Black Pepper Oil, Tea Tree and Cedarwood, the refreshing body wash naturally cleanses the skin, whilst delivering superior hydration to leave the body feeling soft and smooth from top to toe. Imparts a deep forest fragrance.
name: Cedarwood Shower Gel 200ml

product_description: 用Skin紧肤葡萄籽Body油 （来自 Kneipp品牌）从头到脚深层滋润肌肤 。 利用Sandalwood和葡萄籽、Jojoba和葵花籽油的强大功效，该产品快速吸收的配方能提高弹性，使肌肤呈现更光滑、更健美的外观，而维生素A和E的混合物则可提供抗氧化保护，使全身肌肤滋润、柔软可人。
name: Skin紧肤葡萄籽Body油（100ml）

product_description:
Refresh hardworking hands with the Cowshed Dirty Cow Freshening Hand Wash; a luxurious formula originally developed for the bedrooms at five star, English country hotel, Babington House.
The best-selling formula is created using Grapefruit, Petitgrain and Lavender Essential Oils, which provide a gentle yet effective cleanse, whilst also toning the skin. Also enriched with Vitamin E, the soothing soap restores healthy moisture levels to skin.
Finished with a refreshing scent, the hand wash leaves hands cleansed and rejuvenated.
name: Dirty Cow Freshening Hand Wash

product_description:
Nuxe旗下的多功效沐浴露是一款专为男士打造的三合一创新产品。 该产品可以同时用于面部、身体和头发的清洁，具有提振精神效果的配方能够起到保湿和滋润的效果，给您一种清新以及活力重新焕发的体验。
该产品的主要成分是植物提取物，可以让皮肤感觉柔软和滋润秀发的功效。 所有男士的必备之品！ K.D.
name: Men Multi-Use Shower Gel 200Ml（多功效沐浴率）

product_description:
KORRES 高丝香草肉桂身体乳可带给您的肌肤持久的保湿效果。 这款营养丰富的保湿身体乳拥有木制脉动，可有效复调香草的芳香。
这款身体乳具备特殊的粉末质地，让肌肤具备柔光效果。 它所蕴含的维他命 B5、羊毛脂和荷荷巴油可增强肌肤的弹性，而活性芦荟汁可增强免疫系统。
Lookfantastic 提示：
这款身体乳非常适合结合 KORRES 高丝沐浴露使用，以让肌肤更持久带有香味。
使用说明：
name: 高丝香草肉桂身体乳（200ml）

product_description:
Westlab  喜马拉雅山岩盐，英国领先的浴盐专家，让身体排出毒素。 其纯粹配方源自数百万年以前的喜马拉雅山，含有八十多种矿物质，包括可舒缓并修复受损肌肤的镁，以及可促进细胞更新的再生钙质。
盐有助于改善营养物质的吸收，促进血液循环，刺激人体的消化系统和神经系统，清除毒素，令全身感觉清爽健康、容光焕发。 钾是一种专注于减轻压力和焦虑的成分，也可最大限度地降低高血压的风险。 E.N.
name: 喜马拉雅山岩盐 2kg

product_description:
使用傑森抗氧化蔓越莓沐浴露(900ml) 溫和清潔滋潤肌膚。這款舒緩產品內含蔓越莓油和蘆薈，搭配維他命E 和維他命原B5，令肌膚乾淨保濕，預防因壓力帶來的皮膚潮紅和皮疹。 - KR 
 不含對羥基苯甲酸酯、月桂基/月桂醇聚醚硫酸酯或鄰苯二甲酸酯。 
 使用說明：
name: 杰森抗氧化蔓越莓沐浴露 (900ml)

product_description:
本品可滋养肌肤，使肌肤焕发活力。 这款柔和的产品具有修复特性，可为肌肤添加精油而治愈肌肤急性损害部位，确保肤色均匀，肌肤更洁净。
其修复性尤其适用于需要修复的肌肤，使其含水量充足、富有弹性、柔软细嫩。 C.R
name: 终极滋润修复乳 (400ml)

product_description:
使用 Westlab 死海盐，护理瘙痒或干性肌肤；这一品牌是英国领先的浴盐专家。 其含有高品位的镁，适用于容易发生湿疹、痤疮和牛皮癣的皮肤，可恢复和重新平衡肌肤；而钙和钾则支持肌肤的自然修复过程并补充矿物质。
死海 (Dead Sea) 以其低污染水平以及对健康和福祉的多种好处而倍受认可，含有可放松肌肉的溴化物和富含维生素的杜氏绿藻，可实现抗氧化保护和细胞更新。 有助于为肌肤补充水分，实现最佳的保湿水平，令全身肌肤柔软光滑。
name: 2kg

product_description:
Sarah Chapman 专业洁面手套让您在家就可以体验沙龙级的洁肤效果。这款专业的洁面手套采用双效棉纤维双层设计，内层的海绵结构可有效保持高效洁肤所需的温度和水分，其佩戴的舒适设计让洁肤变得更轻松简单。
其略微粗糙的一面可温和地祛除肌肤表面的角质，吸出污垢和杂质，而带有细纹的另一面非常适合卸除眼妆。 适合所有类型的肌肤，让您拥有梦寐以求的亮白剔透，让您的肌肤活力四射。
name: Chapman 专业四指洁面手套

product_description: 日晒后使用 KORRES Yoghurt Cooling Gel，令肌肤恢复清新活力。 这款可被快速吸收的凝胶提供即时镇静效果并舒缓肌肤，实现持久舒适。 这款晒后凝胶富含酸奶。这是一种滋养成分，也是乳糖、蛋白质、矿物质和维生素的天然来源。这款产品可深层滋润肌肤表面，令肌肤平静滋养。E.N.
name: Yoghurt Cooling Gel (150ml)

product_description:
Reveal a refreshed complexion with the Peter Thomas Roth Un-Wrinkle Peel Pads; a gentle yet effective daily peel that chemically exfoliates the skin to restore a natural glow to the visage, whilst preparing the face for products to follow.
The pads utilise a 20% proprietary solution that combines Alpha, Beta, Gamma and Amino Acids. The acids blend with potent botanical extracts and antioxidants to perform an exfoliating action to skin when the pad is swept across the face. The peeling treatment also boasts moisturising properties, which ensure the complexion is calm and comfortable during exfoliation.
After use, the look of fine lines, wrinkles and enlarged pores are reduced, leaving the visage youthful and clarified. Ultra-convenient to use, the pads leave skin soft, smooth and visibly supple.
name: Thomas Roth Un-Wrinkle Peel Pads

product_description:
体验 Embryolisse Foaming Cream Milk 的洁净舒爽。这是一款保湿、无皂乳液，有助于清洁和滋养最干燥和最敏感的肌肤。
这款洗面奶具备超高脂肪霜剂所拥有的丰盈乳状质地，含有甜杏仁油和乳木果油，能温和有效地舒缓和清洁肌肤。 泡沫洗面奶非常适合于所有肌肤类型，令肌肤柔软、丰满和舒适。 - K.N.
name: Foaming Cream Milk (200ml)

product_description:
REN海藻及鼠尾草沐浴露，带给您美好的淋浴体验。 配方含海藻提取物和精油，如：天竺葵、丝柏、迷迭香、鼠尾草等，该沐浴露可改善肤色、使肌肤重新焕发活力。
内含100％的天然香料，不含硫酸盐及合成色素。 本品可护理肌肤，使肌肤活力再现。
使用说明：
KORRES Santorini Vine Body Milk 用希腊葡萄的新鲜果味勾起了对圣托里尼崎岖景观的想象。 这款保湿产品受海上空气和火山土壤的影响，为肌肤提供绝佳保护。 这款身体乳富含杏仁油、芦荟、维生素原 B5、牛油果油、羊毛脂和荷荷巴油精华，持久补水，增强肌肤柔软度，令肌肤充分滋润。 其中，芦荟将为肌肤提供卓越的保护，免受自由基损伤，并提供维生素 C、E 和锌等营养成分。 LB
name: Santorini Vine Body Milk (40ml)

product_description:
採用無香型配方，內含綠茶萃取物，維他命E 和玉米澱粉，帶來舒適的清爽感覺，提供持久保護，讓您一整天感覺自信舒適。 
保持清爽，就用傑森女士天然清爽無香型體香棒。不含苯甲酸酯類和氫氯酸鋁，可抑制汗水異味，不會掩蓋香水的氣味。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森女士天然清爽无香型体香棒 (75G)

product_description:
让 Organic Surge 薰衣草润甲护手霜滋养辛劳的双手，采用富含抗氧化成分的配方，能够为双手和指甲提供舒缓护理。 经临床证明，适用于敏感性和易发湿疹的皮肤。
添加了多种天然护肤成分，包括有机乳木果油和可可脂，能够快速吸收；还融合了有机薰衣草和天竺葵精油，锁住水分，采用深层保湿配方，有效滋润肌肤，对抗干燥和皮肤刺激。 使用后，双手将变得柔嫩水润，起到保护和滋润的功效。
name: Surge 薰衣草润甲护手霜（75ml）

product_description:
Cleanmarine Krill Oil gel capsules are an easy-to-consume food supplement to provide you with essential Omega 3 acids, which contribute to healthy heart, brain, eye and joint function as well as helping to enhance your mood and improve concentration.
Why choose Krill Oil over Fish Oil? Krill are shrimp-like crustaceans that provide a more sustainable and ethical source of Omega 3 with zero by-catch. The acids within Krill Oil are bound to phospholipids, a major component of human cell membranes, thus are much more rapidly absorbed than the fatty acids from fish oil supplements.
Krill Oil is also rich in Astaxanthin, a natural antioxidant, and there’s no fishy aftertaste. When taken on a regular basis, the Krill Oil supplements help maintain a healthy blood pressure and support normal brain function.
name: Krill Oil - 60 Gel Capsules (500mg)

product_description:
Rediscover youthful skin with Skin Republic Neck and Décolletage Repair, an anti-ageing sheet mask treatment that provides deep level repair to help firm, smooth and lift the appearance of your skin.
Delivering nutrients and intense moisture with close and continuous contact, the 20 minute treatment is dedicated to rejuvenating and hydrating the delicate skin around your neck and décolletage. Combining Collagen with CoQ10 and Mulberry Bark Extract, the treatment peforms a firming and plumping effect on skin whilst brightening to reveal a more youthful look; fine lines and wrinkles are diminished and the severity of freckles and age spots are reduced. Rich in vitamins and antioxidants, it helps fight free radical damage and slows down signs of ageing. Its dose of Aloe and Liquorice work in tandem to lock in moisture and restore suppleness and youthful vitality.
Skin is glowing, radiant and revitalised.
Key Ingredients:
Collagen - maintains skin elasticity and strength.
CoQ10 - a naturally occurring enzyme essential for good health.
Mulberry Bark Extract - a natural skin brightener and anti-inflammatory.
Liquorice - helps restore suppleness to dry skin.
Green Tea - antioxidant that protects against free radicals.
Aloe - natural moisturiser that encourages natural collagen and elastin production.
Witch Hazel - naturally astringent and helps control water loss.
Vitamin E - a potent antioxidant with anti-ageing and moisturising properties.
Rice Bran Oil - rich in antioxidants to help fight free radicals and slow down signs of ageing.
Bearberry/Arbutin - improves clarity and helps diminish dark spots and pigmentation.
Vitamin C - an antioxidant that helps slow down free radical damage.
The Benefits of Using a Sheet Mask:
Sheet masks utilise a Transdermal Delivery System that ensures nutrients, nourishment and moisture are delivered deeply and effectively. Their breathable, 'second skin' nature allows for faster absorption than traditional masks and creams. They are also more hygienic.

product_description: This value triple pack of Slendertone Replacement Pads provides three sets of adhesive pads to replace old pads in your Slendertone Abs Belt. Super easy to swap with minimal fuss, these patented pads last for up to approximately 20 sessions for great body toning. In order to maintain effectiveness, the pads need to be replaced regularly as they lose intensity over time. Achieve the body you’ve always dreamed of.
name: Replacement Pads - Abs Belt (Triple Pack)

product_description: Lano Rose Hand Cream Intense 采用超纯级绵羊油（Nature's Wonder Moisturiser™，具备与人类肌肤油脂极其相似的分子结构）制作而成，为非常干燥的双手和指甲提供深层滋润。 这款护手霜具备丰盈、柔滑的质感，含有抗氧化玫瑰油和抚慰牛油果油，功效得以加强，可滋养和滋润干燥的双手，提供如丝般柔滑的防护膜，实现持久保湿。 这种强化配方可迅速被肌肤吸收，高效滋润双手并恢复角质层。 肌肤和指甲感觉滋养和滋润。 也可兼作一款优秀的护脚霜。
name: Rose Hand Cream Intense

product_description:
Experience a nourishing cleanse with KORRES Almond Cherry Shower Gel.
Working to lift away impurities whilst intensely hydrating, the shower gel's moisturising properties make it ideal for every day, and its dose of wheat proteins create a protective shield on skin to maintain normal hydration levels. Skin feels clean and deeply nourished.
name: Almond Cherry Shower Gel 250ml

product_description:
Liven up bath time with the Spongellé Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals. Forming the adorably cute silhouette of a classic yellow duck, the multi-use sponge has been specifically designed for kids, harnessing proprietary infusion technology to deliver an in-built body wash system for effortless multi-tasking.
Dirt and grime is effortlessly swept away without the use of harsh chemicals, and each sponge is infused with a delectable ‘fruitilicious’ scent and soothing extract of Chamomile. Have fun at shower time while ensuring your little ones are left feeling squeaky clean.
name: Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals - Duck

product_description:
Introduce yourself to FOREO’s innovative oral-care line with the FOREO ISSA Play Toothbrush; a revolutionary toothbrush that encourages healthy teeth and gums, whilst adding a playful pop of colour to the bathroom.
The ISSA Play utilises the same intelligent technology as the previous ISSA toothbrushes, yet arrives as a battery-powered model. The toothbrush combines sonic pulse technology with a unique, hybrid brush head, which is effective in eliminating plaque, preventing cavities and discouraging tartar build-up. Delivering 9000 high-intensity pulsations per minute, the toothbrush thoroughly cleans and visibly whitens teeth, whilst comfortably massaging gums to promote strong and healthy results.
The ISSA toothbrushes are safe and ultra-hygienic as they harbour considerably less bacteria than regular nylon brushes. The ISSA Play boasts a hybrid brush head, which is crafted using antibacterial silicone bristles to the outer and PBT polymer bristles to the centre. The silicone bristles gently massage gums to prevent damage, whilst the polymer ones provide a more vigorous clean.
Easy-to-use, the ergonomic toothbrush is ideal for daily use and the lightweight design ensures it is travel friendly. The Swedish-designed brush is completely waterproof, which allows for easy cleaning and even in-shower use, which is ideal for those with busy lifestyles. Cost-effective with no changeable brush heads, the ISSA Play is the perfect introduction into the ISSA range. Discover a new kind of clean.
name: ISSA Play Toothbrush - Black

product_description:
Experience a revolutionary cleanse with the Spongellé Spongology Body Wash Infused Back Buffer in 'Lavender & Eucalyptus' from the brand's Shower with Nature Collection. The eco-friendly back buffer has been designed to easily cleanse those hard to reach areas with its time-released body wash.
Utilising Proprietary Infusion Technology that offers a guaranteed number of washes (over 30), the saturated buffer expertly cleanses, exfoliates and massages skin; it combines organic extracts to expertly lift away impurities whilst softening and hydrating. Its unique surface changes as you squeeze, from a gentle exfoliator to a soft, silky texture with rich and creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth, purified and revitalised.
name: Spongology Body Wash Infused Back Buffer - Lavender & Eucalyptus

product_description:
Garnier 终极燕麦保湿滋润身体乳，舒展营养肌肤。 本款修复型活性护肤品，主要是保护外表皮，为肌肤深度补水，滋润虚弱的细胞，缓解肌肤压力。
燕麦乳及白杏仁霜中含舒缓成分，可舒缓、软化、修复肌肤。丰富精致的五香气味代表活泼华丽。  C.R
name: 终极燕麦保湿滋润身体乳(200ml)

product_description:
苾麗絲檸檬與鼠尾草纖體磨砂膏 
這款磨砂膏與苾麗絲最熱賣的檸檬與鼠尾草身體乳霜有同樣的香氣。淋浴前打圈按摩，該磨砂膏中的細小顆粒有助於帶走死皮與多餘角質，使您的肌膚如絲綢般飽滿光滑。
name: 柠檬和鼠尾草纤体磨砂膏 12oz(340g)

product_description:
Pamper your skin with the Peony Blossom scented You Have My Heart on a String Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé. The red, heart shaped sponge is ideal for the shower and arrives with a useful hanging ribbon for when it is not in use.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin. The dual sided sponge comprises a soft side for cleansing and toning, whilst the textured side stimulates circulation and exfoliates the body.
The innovative buffer is infused with Peony Blossom fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a subtle, yet energetic aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 14 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.
name: You Have My Heart on a String Body Wash Infused Buffer - Peony Blossom

product_description:
使用本品可柔滑肌膚和喚醒感官，清爽清潔，讓肌膚舒爽，絲般柔滑。 
本品採用芳香的綠薄荷精油和天然海鹽晶體製成，可清潔和去除肌膚死皮。海藻和蜜蜂護理肌膚，具有豐富的抗氧化劑，澳洲堅果油為肌膚提供甜美水分。適合各種類型皮膚，讓肌膚柔滑。不含對羥基苯甲酸酯、石油化學產品、硫酸鹽和人工色素。
name: 绿薄荷海盐磨砂膏 (350ml)

product_description:
Garnier终极滋润营养油，可软化滋润肌肤。 质地轻盈柔和，使肌肤光滑，易于涂抹，可快速被肌肤吸收，为肌肤深度补水、保护放松肌肤。
具有天然加强特性，保护肌肤抵御杂质。油脂的淡淡亮光使肤色明显闪耀光泽。 C.R
name: 终极滋润营养油（150ml）

product_description:
使用 BAKEL Suncare Healthy Tan Secret Anti-Ageing Tan Accelerator，带给您亮泽的棕褐色肌肤。 这款产品在防晒霜之前使用，经临床证明可加强肌肤的自然防护，抵御紫外线的有害影响。
配方富含抗氧化剂矛榈属油，有助于肌肤快速形成棕褐色并抵御衰老。 此外，油柑子可抵御日照形成的氧化损伤及雀斑，形成更均匀的棕褐色。 本品无伤害性，适合素食者使用，且适用于所有肌肤类型。 – I.M
Bakel 的所有产品均利用 100% 天然活性成分，确保接触肌肤的任何成分均具备高品质，且天然纯净。 Bakel 的每款产品均不含香料、酒精、人工色素、防腐剂或动物衍生物，且经过皮肤测试，过敏风险最低。 Bakel 产品建立在客观确认和科学证明之配方的坚实基础之上，适用于所有肌肤类型并可抵御肌肤衰老的主要原因。
name: Suncare Healthy仿晒秘密Anti-Ageing仿晒促进霜 (200ml)

product_description: 一款蘊含沙棘油、維生素、礦物質和必需脂肪酸的潤膚油，給予肌膚呵護與保護，非常適合孕婦使用。 Cowshed 的植物配方完全天然，不含對羥基苯甲酸酯、石油化學產品和硫酸鹽，適合素食主義者使用，包含獲得認證的有機成分。
name: 超凡柔美妊娠紋精油 100ml

product_description:
Envelop skin in a heavenly aroma with the Infusion Blanc Moisture Soap from MÁDARA. Suitable for both the hands and body, the wash is designed to cleanse, soften and hydrate the skin, whilst delivering a sensual fragrance.
The shower gel boasts a heady aroma, consisting of White Jasmine Flowers, blending with soft Meadowsweet and an alluring hint of Butterfly Orchids. Offering cleansing and moisturising properties, the luxurious formula leaves the hands and body clean, soft and aromatically fragranced.
name: Infusion Blanc Moisture Soap 300ml

product_description: 此款Love Boo Happy Baby Shower - Body Wash and Top To Toe含有两款具有滋养功效的沐浴露——一个适合母亲使用，另一个适合婴儿使用。 此款温和的产品经过专家调配，配方中有具有滋润和软化功效的成分，即使是最敏感、最娇嫩的肌肤也可以使用。 - L.M.
name: Boo Happy Baby Shower - Body Wash and Top To Toe

product_description:
MONUspa Hand and Nail Cream 是一款迷人的丰盈调理霜，可修复舒缓双手，使之柔滑、丰润。 外出时务必携带这款美妆必备品！
MONU 被专业理疗师使用，采用最纯净成分，具备独特美容保养效果，可提供肌肤保养所需的有益成分。 MONUspa Hand and Nail Cream 融合了令人振奋的柠檬和薰衣草香味，使您同时获得嗅觉享受。 将本品放入手袋随身携带，令双手整天保持柔软光滑！
使用说明：
name: Hand and Nail Cream (50ml)

product_description: Based on the best-selling Havana fragrance range, the Archipelago Botanicals Boticario di Havana Body Wash, scented with Ylang Ylang, Tobacco Flower and Bergamot, is a gentle, exfoliating body wash packed with antioxidants and AHA’s to hydrate, cleanse and detoxify the skin. With a fresh citrus finish, the body wash is suitable for both men and women and is ideal for daily use for beautifully moisturised, deliciously scented and silky soft skin.
name: Botanicals Boticario di Havana Body Wash 891ml

product_description:
傑森有機杏仁護手霜身體乳採用杏仁和杏仁油製成，植物構成豐富。這款日常護理乳液有保濕營養的功效，為肌膚提供長久保濕。 
特別適用於乾性皮膚，使用後，肌膚如絲般光滑，光澤閃耀。 -SA 
 不含對羥基苯甲酸酯或鄰苯二甲酸鹽 
 使用說明：
name: 杰森有机杏仁护手霜身体乳

product_description:
Achieve touchably soft, smooth skin with the Anne Semonin Exfoliating Shower Gel; a refreshing formula that works to eliminate impurities from the body without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Enriched with natural Cellulose Extracts (derived from biodegradable wood pulp), the shower gel gently buffs the skin's surface to diminish dead skin cells, whilst antioxidant Vitamin E protects and regenerates to leave the body detoxified, revitalised and refined. Imparts a luxurious fragrance of Jasmine and Green Tea.
name: Semonin Exfoliating Shower Gel 200ml

product_description:
Enjoy an uplifting soak with the Energy Burst Bath & Shower Drops from NEOM’s Scent To Boost Your Energy™ collection. Designed to deliver therapeutic benefits to the mind and body, the bath and shower drops leave skin smooth and comfortable, whilst boasting a rejuvenating scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of sun dappled Grapefruit, Lemon, and Rosemary, the formula envelops skin in a refreshing aroma that encourages clear, positive thinking. Complete with Vitamins A and E, alongside skin-loving Safflower oil, expect to feel hydrated and refreshed.
name: 活力能量西柚柠檬沐浴油

product_description:
Show your skin and hair who's boss with the men-ü Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel and Create & Shape. The pair work in synergy to leave your skin clean and fresh, and your hair styled to perfection.
Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel (100ml):
An invigorating shower gel enriched with a host of active ingredients and moisturising agents to leave skin clean and refreshed. Transforming into a rich lather, the concentrated formula delivers Pro Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E to keep skin soft and protected. Infused with a spicy, fruity scent to energise the senses.
Create & Shape (100ml):
A flexible hold styling formula that allows you to shape and re-shape your hair with medium hold and natural shine. Adding texture and definition to your hair, the fibrous formula will help to smoothen frizz while keeping your style in place.
name: Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel 100ml - Create & Shape

product_description: 使用 Crabtree & Evelyn Caribbean Island Wild Flowers Body Polish，清除当天的杂质。 这款泡沫身体磨砂膏含舒缓的芦荟、葡萄皮和鳄梨石颗粒，滋润肌肤，去除角质，令肌肤光滑、清洁、亮泽。 深层补水，令肌肤享受甘油和豆油的滋养，同时散发蜘蛛兰、野花、热带柑橘和海风的清新。 - K.N
name: & Evelyn Caribbean Island Wild Flowers Body Polish (175g)

product_description:
Synergising the brand's skincare expertise and the finest ingredients from around the world, Dr Botanicals present the Advanced Body Cream. Suitable for all skin types, the rich, renewing formula melts effortlessly onto skin to replenish moisture and deliver long-lasting hydration for restored comfort.
Working to soften dry or mature skin and rebalance combination or oily skin types, the lightweight body cream is infused with a blend of botanical extracts, including elderflower, coconut oil, jasmine and shea butter to deeply nourish the body, whilst antioxidant vitamin E protects from environmental aggressors and fights against signs of ageing. Boosts elasticity and minimises the appearance of wrinkles, revealing younger-looking, smoother and brighter skin. E.N.
name: Botanicals Advanced Body Cream (200ml)

product_description: Treat dry, eczema-prone skin to the Supersalt Dead Sea Skin Repair from Westlab, the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Harnessing the powers of mineral-rich Dead Sea Salt and essential oils of Lavender and Chamomile, the bath salts help to moisturise and protect delicate skin, whilst relieving feelings of itchiness for long-lasting comfort. Enriched with Magnesium, Calcium and Potassium, Dead Sea Salt rebalances, repairs and restores softness and suppleness.
name: Supersalt Dead Sea Skin Repair

product_description:
本品具有抗過敏功效，無香型不含苯甲酸脂類物質，能讓寶寶肌膚免受強光刺激，抵禦有害射線，同時不刺激嬌嫩肌膚。 
讓寶寶安全地在陽光下玩耍。配方特別適合嬌嫩肌膚，保護的同時呵護肌膚。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森地球最佳婴儿护理矿物质防晒霜 SPF30+ (113G)

product_description:
Jack Black  Epic保湿型护手及指缘修护霜，用以滋润舒缓干燥疲劳的双手。 专为男性朋友配制，可被肌肤快速吸收，能深度滋润保护肌肤，避免皲裂，散发出生姜和马鞭草的清香。
内含功效强大的尿囊素和甘油，可软化双手和角质层；抗氧化剂和澳洲坚果油等成分，可深层滋润调理肌肤。 尤其适用于粗糙的肘部和双脚，使其重新焕发活力，肌肤恢复光滑舒适。 E.N.
name: Black Epic 保湿型护手及指缘修护霜

product_description:
本品舒緩安全，為您提供持久保護。富含有機認證的茶樹油，維他命E，玉米澱粉，為您提供溫和舒適的清爽感覺。 
鎮靜清爽，就選傑森薰衣草體香滾珠。該舒緩除臭劑不含羥基氯化鋁，全天為您提供保護。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森薰衣草体香滚珠 (85G)

product_description: Omorovicza 黃金光澤精油使膚發更加有光澤。頭髮和身體都將更加柔亮，給肌膚和頭髮更加細緻的照顧，使其散發自然光澤。使用Omorovicza 黃金光澤精油為你的肌膚提供滋潤和保濕，也可以與杏核油混合使用滋養肌膚，也可以和混蘿蔔油混合促進膠原蛋白的生成。這個產品的閃亮點是每一次金子粒子在臉上移動都會使肌膚更加亮澤。
name: 黄金光泽精油

product_description:
Tweezerman微之魅專業腳銼工具 
兩種干淨小巧​​的專業美體工具合二為一，每側都採用了微之魅專業技術，讓雙腳在修腳後保持舒爽。時髦優質磁性設計，便於輕鬆保存工具，適合在家和差旅途中使用。便用艙便於收集死皮，清空也很容易。不銹鋼微型銼輕鬆有效去除死皮和減少老繭，同樣優質的鎳質磨光銼摩擦肌膚，使肌膚觸感柔滑。
name: 微之魅专业脚锉工具

product_description:
Experience the sumptuous fragrance of Molton Brown's Rosa Absolute Bathing Oil; a delicately scented elixir inspired by mysterious paintings of Lombardia's Late Renaissance period.
Releasing notes of Italian Rose, sweet Blackcurrant, aromatic Geranium and rich Patchouli, the intoxicating elixir will seduce your senses, whilst restoring velvety soft, supple and perfectly pampered skin with a delicate scent. Housed in a luxurious gift box.
name: Brown Rosa Absolute Bathing Oil 200ml

product_description:
Invigorate your senses and soften skin with the AromaWorks Nurture Body Oil, a nourishing blend of five essential oils that help soothe both the body and mind whilst enveloping skin in moisture.    
Offering a sensual aromatherapy experience, the oil combines a harmonic blend of crisp May Chang, sweet Roman Chamomile and delicate Sandalwood with Organic Coconut Oil to leave skin feeling intensively nourished and soothed. Discover your inner calm whilst improving skin texture.
name: Nurture Body Oil 100ml

product_description:
利用坚硬、光滑胡桃木精美雕刻而成，Hydréa London椭圆胡桃木沐浴刷具有人体工程学设计，非常适合沐浴和水疗使用。 通过光滑弯曲的可拆卸手柄，其完美设计可让它伸到更长的距离。 
凭借其独特轮廓的刷头和编制皮带拉手，Hydréa London椭圆胡桃木沐浴刷经过完美设计，适合手握，以便进行牢靠刷洗。 这款当代身体沐浴刷将完美搭配最时尚的浴室，是提升精力和健康的简单、自然方式。 
Hydréa London椭圆胡桃木沐浴刷可刺激淋巴系统，排除体内毒素，帮助减少脂肪，同时刺激血液循环，促进细胞再生。 其去角质功能可去除死皮细胞，并防止向内生长毛发，令肌肤光滑、新鲜。  定期温和刷洗将让您的身体恢复青春，从内至外散发光彩。 
使用说明：
name: London - 胡桃木沐浴刷

product_description:
Be kind to young skin with the Oat & Camomile Gentle Baby Wash from MÁDARA. The mild formula is designed especially for delicate skin, perfect for babies and children.
Infused with Camomile and Oats, the wash produces a soft foam, which gently cleanses the body hands and face. Leaving skin clean and happy.
name: Organic Baby & Kids Oat & Camomile Gentle Wash 200ml

product_description:
利用 Dr. Hauschka沼泽薰衣草舒缓护肤油调理肌肤；这款可快速吸收的护肤油旨在令肌肤彻底舒缓、温暖和舒适。 加入马栗树、马尾草和沼泽提取物，消融日常生活的紧张和压力，促进平静的睡眠。
其独特配方利用创新调和工艺方法精心混合橄榄油，将混合物加热至37℃的体温，令肌肤滋养特性转移至护肤油中。 利用舒缓薰衣草的温和香味深入放松、保护和软化肌肤。 E.N.
name: Hauschka沼泽薰衣草舒缓护肤油（75ml）

product_description:
Let your troubles melt away with the AromaWorks AromaBomb Quad Set, a combination of four lavish bath bombs that turn an everyday bath into a luxurious spa-like experience. Enriched with nourishing essential oils and sensual fragrances, it makes the perfect gift for a friend or loved one.
Nurture AromaBomb
Release the stress of the day with the Nurture bath bomb, a detoxifying blend of essential oils and salts to deliver a therapeutic bathing experience. Enriched with Lavender, May Chang and Sandalwood for a sweet, relaxing aroma, the bath bomb contains Pink Himalayan Sea Salt and calming Calamine to help soothe both the body and mind.    
Serenity AromaBomb
Made from the finest salts and powders, the Serenity bath bomb blends four pure essential oils with detoxifying Himalayan Sea Salt and calming Calamine to leave you feeling relaxed and at ease. Enjoy a Zen-like bathing experience and let your troubles melt away as the warm, citrus fragrance powered by Lemongrass and Neroli envelops your senses.
Inspire AromaBomb
A luxurious blend of Himalayan Sea Salt and Calamine combine to deliver a therapeutic bathing experience. The Inspire bath bomb envelops the body in scents of purity, with notes of fresh Lime, Bergamot and Geranium combining to create a fruity fragrance and a comforting aroma.
Soulful AromaBomb
The Soulful bath bomb infuses the water with essential oils and helps combat feelings of anxiety and stress to leave you feeling truly relaxed. A lush blend of Himalayan Sea Salt and Calamine combine to deliver a therapeutic bathing experience. It envelops the body in scents of purity, with notes of Juniper Berry, Patchouli and Bergamot combining to create a warm, spicy fragrance and a comforting aroma.
name: AromaBomb Quad Set

product_description: 这款辛辣味沐浴露含天然蔬菜、橄榄油等成分，不含对羟基苯甲酸酯。 添加有辛辣异国木材、香根草、广藿香、雪松等成分。基本琥珀香味由劳丹脂、麝香橡、白松香、树脂等混合而成。带给您愉快的地中海风格淋浴体验。
name: Ambra Nera 沐浴露 (250ml)

product_description: Revitalise skin from top to toe with the Anthony Exfoliating and Cleansing Bar; a dual-action soap bar for the face and body. Infused with skin-polishing Jojoba Spheres, the luxurious formula effortlessly eliminates impurities and buffs away dead skin cells, whilst moisturising Shea Butter and Coconut Oil restore softness and suppleness. Suitable for all skin types, its dose of Cucumber Extract and Grapefruit fragrance promise to leave the face and body feeling soothed, refreshed and hydrated.
name: Exfoliating and Cleansing Bar 198g

product_description:
Invigorate the skin and senses with Natural Spa Factory's Lime and Lemongrass Body Scrub; a revitalising, awakening formula that works to revive tired, aching bodies.
Fortified with vitamin-rich Sweet Almond and Grape Seed Oils, the exfoliating salt scrub gently buffs away dead, dull skin cells, whilst providing antioxidant protection to shield from free radical damage. Envelops the body with an uplifting cocktail of Lime and Lemongrass, leaving you feeling restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
name: Spa Factory Lime and Lemongrass Body Scrub

product_description: Catering specifically for men, the You & Oil Nourish & Invigorate Soap delivers a deep cleansing action to leave you feeling refreshed and revitalised around the clock. Enriched with Olive and Coconut Oils, the soap diminishes dirt and impurities whilst locking in moisture and protecting skin from environmental aggressors.
name: & Oil Nourish & Invigorate Soap for Men 100g

product_description:
用Kneipp 均衡 Lavender Body Wash ，体验舒缓的清洁过程，它的无皂、pH值平衡配方在进行温和清洁的同时使人身心放松。
注入天然Lavender油，这款芳香沐浴露可以轻松去除污垢及杂质，同时缓解消除紧张情绪。 它的镇静香气可激发幸福的感受，让您在结束忙碌和辛苦的一天后获得均衡。 Skin感觉清新、柔软。
name: Body Wash（200ml）

product_description:
Pamper hardworking hands with the Manuka Doctor 24K Gold & Manuka Honey Hand Oil; a hydrating solution that effortlessly melts into hands, leaving skin nourished and nails strengthened.
The hand oil is fortified with 24k Gold, Manuka Honey and a variety of luxurious Plant Oils, which work in synergy to envelop hands in a veil of essential and long-lasting moisture. Not only hydrating dry hands, the oil helps to restore elasticity to skin to leave hands visibly firm and supple.
name: Doctor 24K Gold & Manuka Honey Hand Oil 25ml

product_description:
Slough away dead skin cells with the Coconut and Lychee Body Buff from Natural Spa Factory. The luxurious, fine grain salt scrub is blended with Coconut pulp, Lychee seeds and Grape Seed oil, guaranteed to leave skin smelling good enough to eat.
Ideal for those with sensitive skin, the scrub is enriched with Coco Nucifera, which is naturally antibacterial and antifungal, as well as thoroughly moisturising. The formula is also rich in Vitamin E and a blend of proteins, which help to keep skin smooth and protect against dehydration. Skin is left protected against premature ageing, including fine lines and wrinkles, as well as defending against free radicals.
name: Spa Factory Coconut and Lychee Body Buff

product_description:
Centrum Advance Multivitamin Tablets are perfect for those with on-the-go, busy lifestyles that mean it isn’t easy to maintain a completely balanced diet, delivering essential vitamins and minerals to supplement your nutritional needs.   
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 25 key nutrients with all 13 essential vitamins to support vitality and immunity while contributing to normal vision and heart health.
B Vitamins help to release food-based energy for an overall boost, plus Vitamin C supports the immune system and increases antioxidant levels. Vitamins A, C and Biotin maintain healthier looking skin, while Calcium improves the normal function of digestive enzymes to enable a normal metabolism. Feel at your best with the quick and easy-to-take daily food supplement.
name: Advance Multivitamin Tablets - (60 Tablets)

product_description:
Empower the spirit with the Elemis Life Elixirs Fortitude Bath and Shower Elixir; a luxurious bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst encouraging feelings of confidence.
Intelligently combining 19 essential oils, including Geranium, Cedarwood and Ylang Ylang, the sensuous fragrance seeks to promote strength and determination. Simply apply to running bath water, or to the body whilst showering and the silky oil will help you to find your inner resolve.
Skin is nourished and delicately scented.
name: Life Elixirs Fortitude Bath and Shower Elixir 100ml

product_description:
Experience an invigorating cleanse with Lancôme Tresor La Nuit Shower Gel, a refreshing body wash infused with the intoxicating scent of the Tresor La Nuit fragrance.
Enriched with cleansing agents, the shower gel transforms into a rich lather to gently lift away dirt and impurities. Skin is left feeling soft, supple and delicately fragranced with notes of Raspberry, Damascena Rose and Vanilla.
name: Tresor La Nuit Shower Gel 200ml

product_description:
Awaken your senses with the Anti-Fatigue Home Spa Scented Water from PUPA; an ultra-fine mist that fuses together Cedarwood and Vetiver for a bold, unisex fragrance to uplift and invigorate.
A delicate balance of effervescent Orange Oil notes and transparent water accords create a fresh and positive scent, with Lavender Oil transporting the mind to an undulating field of hazy purple flowers. Suitable for all over body use, the addition of Bamboo extract leaves skin feeling comfortable, toned and supple.
name: Home Spa Scented Water - Anti-Fatigue 150ml

product_description:
Soothe both your skin and mind with the Anti-Stress Home Spa Massage Cream from PUPA. The velvet-smooth, emollient-rich formula effortlessly absorbs into skin, ideal for an indulgent massage with aromatherapy benefits.
Enriched Pearl extract, it cocoons skin in a soft veil of moisture and light reflecting pigments, creating a youthful visage. The addition of Patchouli Oil creates a familiar, warm scent that instantly calms the mind and alleviates stress. Skin feels smooth and supple while your senses feel relaxed and tranquil.
name: Home Spa Massage Cream - Anti-Stress 250ml

product_description: Purify skin with the Fig and Vanilla Hand Wash from Natural Spa Factory. Combining the alluring earthy tones of Fig with the delectable sweetness of Vanilla, the sulphate-free hand wash is formulated with naturally-extracted Coco Glucoside for an indulgent creamy lather and Vitamin-E rich Tocopherol for powerful antioxidant protection. Suitable for daily use, skin is left feeling softened, cleansed and hydrated.
name: Spa Factory Fig and Vanilla Hand Wash

product_description:
Sambucol免疫之王泡腾片是一种保健品，有助于提高免疫系统。 本品含活性成分AntiVirin®、维生素C、锌和抗氧化物质，有助于增强身体天然的抵抗系统。
本品具有香浓的浆果香味，不含昏睡成分、酒精和谷蛋白。 只需将一片泡腾片放入一杯开水（已不沸腾）或凉水，溶解后即可享用。 适合四岁及以上的儿童。 - L.M.

这款瑰珀翠喷泉护手霜采用屡获殊荣的乳木果油配方，令双手光滑柔润。适合干燥粗糙的皮肤。
这款瑰珀翠喷泉护手霜的配方采用海洋和植物萃取物，糅合薄荷和薰衣草香型，清爽怡人。乳木果油和香草配方可舒缓滋养干燥或粗糙的双手。这款护手霜糅合清新海风的怡人香型，让您感觉像漫步在海边。
使用说明：
name: & Evelyn 瑰珀翠喷泉护手霜 (250G)

product_description:
这款 Jurlique 护手霜柔滑而不油腻，令干燥而疲惫的双手恢复活力。 这款护手霜配方独特，富含令人振奋的天然草本精华，欧洲樱草油、夏威夷果油、鳄梨油和牛油果油，能够深入滋润双手。 天竺薄荷和香橙花的温和香气使其备受青睐，为柔软双手注入新生。
使用说明：涂抹 1-2 团乳液至手心，轻轻按摩直至吸收。
name: Clarity Hand Lotion (500ml)

product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the 100% Pure Lilac Lady Sports Sponge, a naturally sustainable cleanser perfect for after a workout. Delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water, it helps revive tired and aching muscles and keeps skin feeling supple.
The innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; getting rid of sweat and dirt whilst stimulating blood flow and cell renewal. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the sponge is presented in a handy travel pouch so that you can keep the rest of your sports kit dry. Suitable for use with or without a cleanser, just add water and experience an all-natural, refreshing cleanse that will leave skin feeling smooth and revitalised.
name: Konjac Sponge Company 100% Pure Lilac Lady Sports Sponge

product_description:
XEN-TAN 强力喷雾，是一款完美的喷雾剂。如果白天忘记晒肤，您可轻松涂用本品，这样清晨您将会容光焕发。 细雾很容易洒遍肌肤，使皮肤即刻变为深色。这样华丽的自晒黑肤色将保持7天。
XEN-TAN强力喷雾，香味轻柔，不含苯甲酸酯类。使可怕的化学假晒黑永久地成为历史。 这种轻柔不油腻的细雾，令肌肤持久保持橄榄色。使用本品后肌肤会瞬间发出光泽，其功效与使用XEN-TAN乳液或摩丝等同。 您只需要喷涂即可外出。
使用说明：
name: 强力喷雾（148ml）

product_description:
We put our hands through a lot, so The Hero Project have developed the Hand Rehab™ Diamond Dusted Hand & Nail Therapy with SPF 20 to give them the pampering they deserve. The rich, ultra-hydrating hand cream melts into skin without feeling greasy, imparting a smooth, supple texture with additional protective benefits.
Subject to continuous washing, multi-tasking and damaging UV rays, hands are one of the first places to show signs of ageing. The luxurious Hand Rehab™ contains a powerhouse blend of moisture-rich Hyaluronic Acid and Aloe Vera for long lasting hydration, as well as finely-milled Diamond Dust, which gently buffs away dead skin cells and impurities while strengthening nails and tidying cuticles.
As a result, hands appear brighter and feel sumptuously softened, with the appearance of wrinkles and dark spots visibly reduced. Give your hands the extra TLC they deserve with this multi-tasking beauty treat.
name: Hero Project Hand Rehab Diamond Dusted Hand & Nail Therapy with SPF 20 75ml

product_description:
这款Emergen-C草莓口味泡腾粉包含多袋原配方Emergen-C泡腾粉。 这款产品富含1000毫克的维生素C和其他能够提高免疫力的抗氧化剂，补充7种不同的B族维生素，自然提升能量水平，另外，在锻炼之后电解质还能为身体补充能量！
专门为成年人配制，这款保健饮品还特别添加了真果萃取物，更添营养。 Emergen-C是您释放能量、提升免疫力的不二之选，配合动静相宜的生活方式和均衡饮食。 - L.M.

Treat yourself or a loved one to the Evening Primrose Ribbon Box from Weleda. Combines a creamy body wash, skin-softening body lotion and fruity fragrance spray, all wrapped in a branded gift box.
Evening Primrose Revitalising Body Wash (200ml)
A fresh, floral shower cream developed for mature skin. Harnessing the powers of Macadamia Nut Oil and Organic Evening Primrose, the luxurious body wash delicately cleanses skin, whilst imparting a relaxing fragrance to leave you feeling calm and restored. Expect soft, smooth and supple skin from top to toe.
Evening Primrose Age Revitalising Body Lotion (200ml)
A lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that works to nourish and hydrate without greasy residue. Fortified with Shea Butter and Organic Evening Primrose Oil, the skin-softening lotion conditions and replenishes, whilst enveloping the body with a precious fragrance of Magnolia, Cardamom and Sandalwood.
Jardin de Vie Onagre (50ml)
A precious fragrance inspired by the floral-fresh scent of blooming Evening Primrose Flowers. Notes of Magnolia are enhanced by Cardamom and soft Sandalwood accords to create a mysterious, powdery scent. Housed in a vibrant purple bottle. Suitable for vegans.
name: Evening Primrose Ribbon Box (Worth £35)

product_description: 蘊含白芒花籽油的溫和、卓效保濕產品，輕柔呵護寶寶細嫩的肌膚，為寶寶打造清新暢爽的沐浴體驗。眾所周知，白芒花籽油是最穩定的植物油之一，安全持久。 Cowshed 的植物配方完全天然，不含對羥基苯甲酸酯、石油化學產品和硫酸鹽，適合素食主義者使用，包含獲得認證的有機成分。
name: 小牛有机润肤乳霜 200ml

product_description:
Bioglan 红磷虾油 500mg（30粒）是天然有效、极具创新的维生素补充剂系列产品之一。 红鳞虾油通过GMP认证，由专业疗养人士配方，富含最纯净的Omega-3 ，所含的抗氧化成分是鱼肝油的八十多倍。
红鳞虾油胶囊源自南太平洋的纯净水域，采用环保可持续的方式合理取材，融合了富含omega 3的优质鱼油与鳞虾油，保持心脏和心血管健康，促进大脑与眼部的健康，对抗自由基。
除了出色的抗氧化性能，红鳞虾油胶囊还提供丰富的脂肪酸，脂肪酸在体内是通过磷脂的形式传递（磷脂是组成细胞膜的主要成分，负责细胞运输和细胞识别）。 提供丰富的天然虾青素，无鱼腥味*。 - K.N
name: 红磷虾油 500mg（30粒）

product_description:
Caudalie歐緹麗卡本內去角質身體緊緻霜是歐緹麗葡萄溫泉療養Vinotherapie Spa的明星產品。本款緊緻磨砂顆粒較大，遇水會變為水乳狀，可讓肌膚光滑，滋潤，並有加倍纖體的功效。適用於任何既想要深層去角質又想要纖體的人。 
富含葡萄籽碎粒、紅糖、法國吉倫特（Gironde）純正蜂蜜以及6 種可以去水腫和橘皮組織的純天然精油，與葡萄籽纖體精華油中的有效成分一樣。 
使用方法： 每週使用2次。肌膚潤濕後塗抹。以打圈的方式按摩全身，集中在胃部、髖部和大腿。然後徹底沖洗乾淨。在Caudalie歐緹麗葡萄籽纖體精華油之前使用纖體效果更佳。
name: 150g

product_description:
Achieve a sun-kissed, streak-free glow with the Q10 Self Tan Mousse from Sienna X. Easy to apply, the weightless formula glides on effortlessly and delivers a guide colour that slowly intensifies to reveal a beautiful golden tan.
An innovative blend of Q10 and Vitamin E provide anti-ageing benefits, whilst natural Blackcurrant, Babassu and Pomegranate leave skin soft, smooth and deeply nourished. Can be used on the face and body for a natural-looking, long-lasting tan that fades slowly and evenly.
name: X Q10 Self Tan Mousse 200ml

product_description:
Soften and nourish your skin with Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Nectarine Blossom Hand Cream, an ultra-hydrating hand treatment infused with a luxurious, refreshing fragrance.
Working to moisturise, condition and calm dry skin, the velvety cream expertly comforts hardworking hands, cocooning them in hydration whilst delivering a fragrance powered by a blend of real Honey, Green Tea and delectable Nectarine.
name: Arden Green Tea Nectarine Blossom Hand Cream 30ml

product_description:
Soothe tired, dehydrated and dry skin with the Moisturizing Home Spa Salt Scrub from PUPA. Expertly formulated with a natural blend of White Salt and Water Lily Extract, the gentle exfoliator effortlessly buffs away dirt, dead cells and impurities for skin that feels smoother and replenished.  
Experience a subtle tingling sensation as the advanced formula releases Active Oxygen, optimising the delivery of essential nutrients for maximum benefits and alleviating the look of lumps and bumps for a supple, firming effect. Recreate a spa-like ritual from the comfort of your own home and achieve revitalised, hydrated and softened skin.
name: Home Spa Salt Scrub - Moisturizing 350g

product_description: Love Boo 媽媽身體乳蘊含乳木果油和可可油以及雷公根（這是一種可促進膠原蛋白生成和血液循環的神奇成分），可有效減少脂肪團和妊娠紋。
name: Boo 妈妈身体乳

product_description:
使用这款舒缓沐浴露，让您的身心平静舒缓。 只需添加一瓶盖 Aromatherapy Associates 深度放松沐浴油在您的浴缸中，即可获得身心平衡和总体的幸福感。
Aromatherapy Associates 深度放松沐浴油有助于镇静和安定您的思绪，特别是当因过于疲劳而无法集中思绪时使您消除压力感。 从百忙当中抽出时间来呼吸一下新鲜空气，这个沐浴露仿佛是一个文件柜，它使您的大脑条理化，思路清晰。
注意事项：
建议在怀孕期间使用本品
将本品置于盒内储存或避免光线直射
一旦打开，本品最好在6个月内使用
name: Associates 深度放松沐浴油（55ml）

product_description:
The A’ kin Brightening Rosehip Oil with Vitamin C is a plant-based treatment that works to brighten skin tone and smooth its texture without feeling greasy.
It’s rich in organic Rosehip Oil, which is brimming with essential fatty acids, and Vitamin C, a natural antioxidant that helps reduce signs of premature ageing including discolouration and damaged pigmentation.
The concentrated formula quickly melts in, working to lock in hydration and stimulate natural collagen production, resulting in fine lines and wrinkles appearing visibly reduced. Suitable for all skin types, the natural serum unveils a revitalised and smoother looking complexion with a radiant glow.
name: Brightening Rosehip Oil with Vitamin C 20ml

product_description:
Unveil brighter and revitalised skin with the Green Tea and Coconut Oil Body Polish from Natural Spa Factory. An ideal alternative to more abrasive salt and oil scrubs, the sugar-based body polish offers a gentler exfoliation process that allows the rich oils to deeply penetrate skin’s surface layer for effective nourishment.
Boasting a vivid green natural colouring, the mild scrub has been formulated with Coconut Oil and extract of Matcha Green Tea for a potent dose of antioxidants and minerals. It works to eliminate dead skin cells and dry skin whilst building protection from free radicals and toxins that can cause premature ageing, leaving skin feeling smooth, refined and re-energised.
name: Spa Factory Green Tea and Coconut Oil Body Polish

product_description:
Jason 杰森地球最佳幼儿牙膏帮助儿童尽早实现口腔健康。本牙膏可安全温和清洁牙齿，同时乳酸钙使牙龈健康，牙齿强健。
本品带有草莓和香蕉味，非常安全，适合用于 6 个月到 3 岁的宝宝。每天使用可养成口腔清洁习惯，同时保持儿童牙齿干净清爽。
使用说明：
name: 杰森地球最佳幼儿牙膏 (50G)

product_description:
Emjoi MICRO Pedi電動修腳器 
 Emjoi MICRO Pedi 電動修腳器是一款突破性設備，可輕鬆有效地去除腳部死皮和硬繭。這款設備可溫和呵護柔軟敏感肌膚，有效去除腳部硬皮，為腳趾提供最理想的護理。 Emjoi MICRO Pedi 電動修腳器與使用刀片清除死皮的金屬刮刀相比更加安全，該產品使用蘊含微量元素的滾輪，每秒30 圈的轉速，有效去除死皮硬繭。讓小滾輪幫您完成最難的工作，您盡可輕鬆享受最理想的護理效果。
name: MICRO Pedi 电动修脚器

product_description:
KORRES Santorini Vine Shower Gel 可形成丰富的泡沫，清洁和更新肌肤，并赋予活力和水果清香。 非常适合每天使用，其小麦蛋白配方可让本品在皮肤表面形成一层保护膜，维持肌肤的润泽度，确保肌肤不干燥。
这款滋养沐浴露富含维生素 B2，可改善肌肤的新陈代谢，促进营养物质的吸收；亦含有维生素 B5，可促进肌肤细胞再生，令肌肤更年轻，从头到脚舒缓、滋润和软化肌肤。 适合所有肌肤类型。 - L.M.
name: Santorini Vine Shower Gel (250ml)

product_description:
Meet the needs of sensitive teeth with the Janina Ultrawhite Whitening Sensitive Toothpaste; a low abrasion formula that gently and effectively whitens teeth, whilst reducing feelings of sensitivity.
Developed specifically for sensitive teeth, the toothpaste seeks to decrease sensitivity to cold, heat, contact and acids to eliminate feelings of discomfort. The gentle formula is safe for daily use, thoroughly cleaning teeth with a combination of antibacterial agents. The toothpaste protects against tartar and calculus, whilst preventing plaque development.
The whitening toothpaste utilises a patented Bromaine Complex, which combines natural enzymes to visibly whiten teeth without using harsh abrasives. Ideal for those with surface staining or people desiring a brighter smile, the sensitive toothpaste leaves teeth and gums clean, comfortable and healthy, as well as visibly whiter.
name: Ultrawhite Whitening Sensitive Toothpaste 75ml

product_description: ManCave present the Deodorant Stick; an easy-to-apply, naturally derived formula to eliminate odours. Fortified with Acai Fruit Oil and an invigorating blend of Peppermint and Lime, the alcohol-free deodorant protects the underarms for up to 24 hours, leaving you feeling fresh and confident around the clock.
name: Deodorant Stick 75ml

product_description: A rich blend of macadamia nut oil and shea butter, this Somerset Meadow Hand Therapy works to deeply moisturise your hands to leave your skin silky soft. Formulated with antioxidant-rich vitamins C and E, this cream nourishes the skin and leaves your hands gorgeously fragranced. Boasting an aroma that's reminiscent of a gorgeous spring day, this Somerset Meadow Bath and Shower Gel from Crabtree & Evelyn is the perfect feminine scent for the modern woman.
name: & Evelyn Somerset Meadow Hand Therapy (100g)

product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Balance Me Rose Otto Body Cream; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula dedicated to softening and conditioning from top to toe.
Harnessing the powers of Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil and antioxidant-rich Arctic Cloudberry, the luxurious moisturiser replenishes and rejuvenates, whilst nourishing and protecting for long-lasting comfort. Skin feels smooth, supple and hydrated with a delicate Rose fragrance. Housed in a convenient pump bottle for mess-free application.
name: Me Rose Otto Body Cream 280ml

product_description:
Experience summer in your hands with Crabtree & Evelyn Summer Hill Hand Therapy Cream. With luxurious and natural ingredients to care for your skin, this lovely hand cream will leave your hands wonderfully nourished.
A rich cream made with always reliable and precious shea butter, Crabtree & Evelyn Summer Hill Hand Therapy Cream helps to soothe and moisturise your dry hands. With a beautiful and familiar fresh scent of field lilies and wildflowers to calm and condition your hands, this hand cream will leave your skin feeling silky smoothed and well cared for.
Directions of use:
name: & EVELYN SUMMER HILL HAND THERAPY (100G)

product_description:
KORRES 杏仁油和金盏花护手霜将带给双手应有的呵护，专为修复并滋养双手肌肤而配制，混合了多种维生素原B5成分。
采用质地轻易、不油腻的配方，富含杏仁油和金盏花，为人体最易暴露的双手肌肤重新注入活力。 KORRES 杏仁油和金盏花护手霜富含杏仁油，能有效改善肌肤的水润度和弹性，让肌肤变得柔嫩年轻。
使用说明：

product_description: Caudalie 欧缇丽浪漫清幽玫瑰沐浴凝胶具有清新而又扣人心弦的清香，焕发着波尔多葡萄园中淡雅的玫瑰芳香和大黄的清爽气息。 不含皂基的奢华配方采用纯植物原料。 这款丝滑香水适用于所有类型的肌肤，包括极为敏感的肌肤，它可温和地清洁肌肤，为肌肤补充水分，焕发清新优雅的芳香。

product_description:
MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey Blend is derived from Leptospermum Scoparium, a plant unique to New Zealand; its flowers are powerfully fragrant and full of nectar which attributes Manuka Honey with its rich, dark and full-bodied flavour.
MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey is certified to contain a minimum of 250mg/kg methylgyoxal. Methylgyoxal is a naturally occurring compound in Manuka Honey that lends the substance its remarkable and unique properties. No other system of measurement gives such a clear and simple indication; the higher the MGO™ rating, the higher the Methylglyoxal content.
name: 400+ Pure Manuka Honey Blend

product_description:
Who run the world? (Girls).Be Your Best is an awesome blend of vitamins designed for active women looking to boost their multivitamin intake to support their physical and dietary needs.
This impressive blend of micronutrients including vitamins C, E and D contribute to the normal functioning of the immune system following intense exercise. These vitamins, along with the other potent mineral ingredients contribute to the normal function of the cardiovascular, respiratory and muscular systems whilst you sweat it out. These comprehensive ingredients are scientifically designed to help improve recovery time and avoid you becoming prematurely fatigued during exercise.
Be Your Best is a great addition to every active lifestyle, helping you to achieve your exercise goals by supporting both performance and recovery. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.

product_description:
Achieve a flawless, streak-free tan with the SKINNY TAN Mousse in Ultimate Dark; a convenient tanning foam that delivers long-lasting results. Working on both the face and body, the fluffy formula guarantees an enviable ultra-deep tan, without an unwanted orange-hued finish.
Enriched with two, certified natural tanning ingredients, the lightweight mousse quickly and effortlessly glides over skin, offering a dark sun-kissed glow that can last up to fourteen days. The self tan also boasts organic Aloe Vera and active Caffeine, which ensure skin is thoroughly and comfortably hydrated, whilst perfecting the face and body by reducing the appearance of blemishes and cellulite.
The tanner is intelligently created with a makeup guide colour, which allows you to see where the product has been applied to, and therefore produce more even results. Please bear in mind that the guide colour is designed to be darker that the tan developing underneath.
Finished with a fragrant dose of organic Coconut, the tanning mousse leaves skin beautifully bronzed and smelling delicious.
name: TAN Mousse - Ultimate Dark 150ml

product_description:
Centrum Women Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed to support women’s health and wellbeing, delivering adjusted levels of vitamins and minerals for optimum efficacy and benefits.
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, contributing to healthy skin, hair and nails as well as supporting sustained energy release and a normal immune system.
24 key vitamins and minerals work in tandem to boost vital resources, including Iron and Folic Acid, which sustain regular blood formation, while Biotin, Zinc and Selenium help revitalise hair and nails. Vitamins E, C and Copper seek to protect cell constituents from oxidative damage to delay deterioration. The daily food supplement is an easy, ideal solution for ongoing health maintenance.
name: Women Multivitamin Tablets - (30 Tablets)

product_description:
Introduce yourself to FOREO’s innovative oral-care line with the FOREO ISSA Play Toothbrush; a revolutionary toothbrush that encourages healthy teeth and gums, whilst adding a playful pop of colour to the bathroom.
The ISSA Play utilises the same intelligent technology as the previous ISSA toothbrushes, yet arrives as a battery-powered model. The toothbrush combines sonic pulse technology with a unique, hybrid brush head, which is effective in eliminating plaque, preventing cavities and discouraging tartar build-up. Delivering 9000 high-intensity pulsations per minute, the toothbrush thoroughly cleans and visibly whitens teeth, whilst comfortably massaging gums to promote strong and healthy results.
The ISSA toothbrushes are safe and ultra-hygienic as they harbour considerably less bacteria than regular nylon brushes. The ISSA Play boasts a hybrid brush head, which is crafted using antibacterial silicone bristles to the outer and PBT polymer bristles to the centre. The silicone bristles gently massage gums to prevent damage, whilst the polymer ones provide a more vigorous clean.
Easy-to-use, the ergonomic toothbrush is ideal for daily use and the lightweight design ensures it is travel friendly. The Swedish-designed brush is completely waterproof, which allows for easy cleaning and even in-shower use, which is ideal for those with busy lifestyles. Cost-effective with no changeable brush heads, the ISSA Play is the perfect introduction into the ISSA range. Discover a new kind of clean.
name: ISSA Play Toothbrush - Wild Strawberry

It’s enriched with Safflower Seed Oil to soothe and soften as well as Glycerin, which acts as a natural magnet for intensive hydration. The fatty acids help to balance your complexion by mimicking the same nourishing oils and pH balance found in skin already, with Palm and Palm Kernel Oils regulating oil production and stimulating cell reproduction. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect nourished, ultra-cleansed skin with a radiant glow.

If you’re looking for a natural deodorant look no further. The Weleda Sage Deodorant takes its strength from lemon juice and essential oils of sage, rosemary, pine, clary sage, eucalyptus, lavender, oakmoss, thyme, tea tree, peppermint and ylang-ylang. Suitable for vegans, it fights odours without hindering natural skin functions. It is aluminium salt free, dries quickly and leaves no sticky residue whilst containing biodynamic sage leaf oil which cleanses, purifies and deodorises naturally. LB
Directions for use: In the morning after washing or at any time of the day. For most people one application lasts all day. The natural formulation can be used when required, up to three times a day or use as a fragrant body mist. Do not spray in the direction of the eyes or mucus membranes.

美體油還包含調理肌膚的大豆油，其中的必要脂肪酸非常豐富，還有可促進肌膚再生的金盞花提取物，可修復受損肌膚，使肌膚絲般柔滑。多功能美體油適合用作按摩油或浴油，在刮鬍或上蠟後使用，還可舒緩手部或腳部的肌膚，不留任何油漬殘餘。 - RH

product_description:
Polish and perfect skin with the REN Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Salt Anti-Fatigue Exfoliating Body Scrub; a luxurious body balm that works to smooth the skin.
Effortlessly massaging over the body, the Sea Salt infused scrub simultaneously sloughs away dead skin cells, promotes cell renewal and activates microcirculation, which in turn can relieve feelings of muscle fatigue. A hydrating blend of Atlantic Kelp Extract and Microalgae Oil helps to replenish comfortable moisture levels, whilst infusing skin with essential minerals.
Finished with a signature dose of REN’s anti-fatigue essential oil blend, the anti-fatigue exfoliator not only polishes and pampers skin, but has stress-alleviating effect on the mind. Expect a silky smooth body with skin boasting a healthy glow.

product_description: 利用来自  Dr. Hauschka 的薰衣草檀香爽肤Body Wash彻底温和清洁肌肤 。 利用木瓜籽提取物和植物表面活性剂轻松融化污垢和杂质，同时薰衣草和澳大利亚檀香可散发深入放松香气，营造纯粹安宁的氛围。 向日葵和鳄梨油的混合物防止过度干燥，令肌肤洁净清爽，柔软舒适，而不会剥离水分。 E.N.
name: Hauschka薰衣草檀香爽肤Body Wash（200ml）

product_description: 本品中含白睡蓮，洋甘菊和鱷梨，有助於修復肌膚彈性，讓肌膚柔軟保濕。具有天然芬芳，能溫和清洗保濕，特備適合乾燥肌膚。姜味芬芳還能緩解孕婦晨吐。

product_description: Dr. Hauschka的足部滋润霜舒爽、抚慰双脚以获得持久舒适。 可迅速吸收，为干燥的足部提供水分，不油腻的霜膏可以用作日常润肤护理或足部焕肤按摩。 融入荷荷巴油和橄榄油焕肤混合物滋润破裂、坚硬的粗糙皮肤，获得完美呵护，超级柔软、光滑的双脚。 E.N.
name: Hauschka足部滋润护肤霜（75ml）

product_description:
利用来自Dr. Hauschka的薰衣草檀香舒缓护肤霜完美呵护肌肤。 快速吸收而且不油腻，它的滋养配方加入柠檬香膏和酢浆草提取物，以促进肌肤更新和平衡，从而获得柔软、光滑的肌肤。
澳洲坚果、杏仁和鳄梨油混合物支持皮肤的保护屏障，而熏衣草和檀香的温润香气令身体和感官获得抚慰和舒缓。 保湿和抚慰肌肤，以或恶持久舒适。 E.N.

product_description:
青柠 洗手液可与丰富的REN 青柠益生元护手霜同时使用。  这款柠檬香护手霜具有抗菌性，很容易被皮肤吸收，令双手倍感清新。
REN青柠益生元护手霜是一种轻型清新、容易被皮肤吸收的护手霜。其配方含西西里柠檬油及益生元低聚糖等，可防止手部及指甲部位细菌再生、同时滋润营养双手。
使用说明：

bliss著名的润肤配方，无香型，因此您可根据个人喜好，将其与任何您钟爱的香水搭配。 涂抹少量的 bliss 轻盈润肤霜，就会使肌肤得到滋润，美白如钻石。
bliss纯粹润肤脂，可快速为肌肤补充水分。即使最干燥的皮肤也感觉超柔软。 内含维生素A和维生素E，可对抗自由基；其他成分如：山金车提取物，可促进肌肤愈合（尤其适用于暴露在阳光下的皮肤使用！）。 这款润肤脂富含抗氧化剂和皮肤调节剂，使肌肤超光滑水润。
使用说明：
name: 轻盈润肤霜 (200ml)

product_description: 利用来自 Dr. Hauschka 的玫瑰滋养沐浴精华液深入放松和调和身心。 结合温暖的流动清水，该爽肤沐浴液带来一种温和玫瑰的奢华香气，营造出一种纯粹宁静的氛围。 一种混合杏仁和荷荷巴油的滋养软肤液，可防止肌肤过度干燥，获得散发淡淡香气，从头到脚完美呵护的肌肤。 适合儿童。 E.N.

product_description:
Treat your skin to the benefits of Trilogy's Pure Plant Body Oil; a reparative, nourishing formula infused with Rosehip, Sweet Almond and Apricot.
Suitable for sensitive skin and for the entire family, the luxurious, certified natural oil delivers long-lasting moisture and hydration, whilst soothing and rejuvenating skin without greasy residue. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.
name: Pure Plant Body Oil 110ml

product_description:
StriVectin 丰润手部护理霜能够对抗五大最显著的手部肌肤衰老迹象，缓解疲劳、干燥、纤薄和肤色不均的肌肤，让它变得柔嫩丰盈，重现年轻状态。
手部肌肤很可能是接触外界最多，使用最频繁的皮肤，因此，StriVectin 丰润手部护理霜融合了强大的肌肤丰盈成分和提亮成分，另外还添加了超级滋润的牛油果油和各种精油，让手部肌肤丰盈紧致。 NIA-114 活性成分有助于重建并强化肌肤的天然屏障，让肌肤放松并恢复活力。
使用说明：
name: SD™ 护手霜（60ml/2oz）

product_description:
此款磨砂手套是MenScience日用沐浴露的完美补充，令肌肤超级清洁、柔软、健康。
MenScience 磨砂手套可去除死皮细胞、立即改善整个肌肤外观。 去除死皮细胞后，肌肤会立即光滑、得到再生。
深层清洁可去除杂质、清洁毛孔，使整个身体格外干净、充满活力。立即呈现出健康均衡的肤色。
使用说明：
採用100% 蒟蒻製成，這款產品能去除皮膚的死細胞，溫和去除身體角質。這款海綿帶給您奢華的清潔享受，幫助您去除污垢和內生毛髮，保持肌膚光滑彈性。這款獨特的身體清潔海綿採用人體工程學設計，採用6 種波紋，是您泡澡或淋浴的終極護膚夥伴。 -SA

product_description:
Invigorate your senses and skin with the Anti-Fatigue Home Spa Massage Cream from PUPA. The velvet-smooth, emollient-rich formula effortlessly absorbs into skin, ideal for an indulgent massage with aromatherapy benefits.
Fortified with extract of Bamboo, the cream envelopes skin in a soothing veil of moisture and nutrients, leaving skin feeling toned and balanced. A harmonic blend of Orange Oil and Cedarwood create a revitalising fragrance that lingers. Skin feels supple and softened while your senses feel uplifted and recharged.
name: Home Spa Massage Cream - Anti-Fatigue 250ml

product_description:
Energise the mind and body with Weleda's Sea Buckthorn Ribbon Box; a refreshing body wash, fast-absorbing body lotion and characteristic fragrance leave you feeling revitalised from top to toe. Housed in a gift box.
Sea Buckthorn Body Wash (200ml)
Ideal for use in the morning or to regenerate after a hard day at work, the body wash gently cleanses skin, whilst imparting an invigorating fragrance of Orange, Mandarin and Grapefruit. Infused with Sea Buckthorn Oil, an ingredient rich in vitamins and antioxidants to protect against environmental stresses.
Sea Buckthorn Body Lotion (200ml)
A rich, rejuvenating formula that absorbs quickly into skin to nourish and hydrate without greasy residue. Harnessing the powers of Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil, Mallow Extract and Shea Butter, the lightweight lotion softens and conditions, whilst enveloping the body with a fresh, fruity fragrance from top to toe.
Jardin de Vie Agrume (50ml)
A fresh, energetic fragrance to uplift the mind. Opening with sparkling Grapefruit accords, the revitalising scent is enhanced by sweet, juicy Mandarin before settling on a soft, powdery Sandalwood base. Simply spritz onto skin to experience the characteristic fragrance. Suitable for vegans.
name: Sea Buckthorn Ribbon Box (Worth £35)

product_description:
Indulge skin with the Revitalizing Home Spa Salt Scrub from PUPA. Harnessing the powers of Orange Salt extracted from Australia and extract of Coralline Alga, the natural exfoliator gently polishes away dirt and impurities, working to penetrate skin tissue for a firming effect, resulting in a smoother and more refined silhouette.
Experience a subtle tingling sensation as the advanced formula releases Active Oxygen, optimising the delivery of essential nutrients for maximum benefits. Recreate a spa-like ritual from the comfort of your own home and expect skin that feels softened, supple and toned.
name: Home Spa Salt Scrub - Revitalizing 350g

product_description:
Experience the unrivalled effects of Karin Herzog's Professional Cleansing, a cleansing gel that performs a vacuum like effect to expertly draw away dirt, sebum and impurities from the skin.
Enriched with a host of nourishing essential oils, including Rose, Geranium and Glycerine, the gentle, waxy formula nourishes and hydrates whilst eliminating dirt and makeup (including waterproof eye makeup) without irritating or upsetting the skin's natural pH balance. Working to decongest skin and eliminate grime from pores, the best-selling cleansing gel leaves skin feeling fresh, bright and radiant.
name: Herzog Professional Cleansing Cream

product_description:
Institut Esthederm 纯粹洁面泡沫，可卸掉所有彩妆、去除所有污垢。同时呵护肌肤表层的生态系统。 其亮度及通风的质地令人舒适、使肌肤超柔软。
本产品温和有效，适合所有皮肤类型，能彻底清洁肌肤。 重新平衡皮肤表面的生态系统，肌肤明显更洁净、更健康，肤色清新、容光焕发。
name: Esthederm 纯粹洁面泡沫150ml

product_description: L'Oréal Sublime Bronze Gradual Tan 中瓶装是一款天然的古铜色剂。 让您的假期肌肤看起来健康、美丽。 欧莱雅实验室已经开发出一种日常保湿乳液，让你逐步形成天然古铜色，仿佛你刚刚度假回来。 L'Oréal Sublime Bronze Gradual Tan 富含Hydralium，强效滋养肌肤，使之滋润 24 小时，帮助保护肌肤免受干燥。 含少量 Soft-Tan，一种美黑成分，让您逐渐获得天然的古铜肤色。 使用说明：
name: Paris Sublime Bronze Gradual Tan - 中瓶装(200ml)

product_description:
Envelope skin with freshness with the Rebalancing Home Spa Scented Water from PUPA; an ultra-fine mist that blends aromatherapy oils with precious botanical extracts for a multi-sensory experience.
Heart notes of essential citrus oils including Orange and Lime bring positivity and brightness, while extract of Tiarè Flower layers skin with a gentle caress of nutrients and moisture.
Balsamic hints of Mint and Eucalyptus invigorate the senses, while Lavender brings a touch of femininity. Skin feels refreshed, hydrated and balanced while the mind feels a sense of wellbeing and calm.

product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn present the Pink Pineapple Luxury Duo; a shimmering dry oil and rich body cream perfumed with a blend of sparkling Pink Prosecco, precious Rose and succulent Pineapple. Presented in a floral gift box.
Rose Pineapple Shimmer Oil (100ml)
A luxuriously scented dry oil that can be used on the face, body and hair. Infused with moisturising Rice Bran, Apricot Kernel and Argan Oil, the lightweight, non-greasy formula softens and nourishes, whilst imparting a subtle golden shimmer.
Rose Pineapple Body Cream (200g)
A rich, ultra-nourishing formula to soften, hydrate and comfort skin without greasy or sticky residue. Fast-absorbing and lightweight, it envelops the body with notes of Pink Prosecco, juicy Pineapple and delicate Rose Petals. Skin is smooth and supple with an elegant fragrance.

product_description: 要获得一个豪华的沐浴体验，在您的身体上使用减压 Herbal 柑橘及 Orange 沐浴油（来自 Kneipp牌）。 用柑橘和Orange的天然精油强化，清爽配方会浸泡掉您所有烦恼和忧虑，增强积极性，释放日常生活的压力。 Skin变得柔顺，周围笼罩着令人振奋的香氛。

product_description:
使用Kneipp 享受生活 Body Wash唤醒并活化肌肤；它是一款无皂、pH值平衡的配方，使机体从头到脚清爽。
该沐浴露中注入May Chang和柠檬的天然精华油，可去除污垢和杂质而不会导致过度干燥或肌肤紧绷，其恢复元气的香味使您神清气爽，让您在每次使用后感觉重新焕发活力。
name: Wash（200ml）

product_description: MÁDARA's Herbal Deodorant delivers long-lasting protection against wetness, body odours and perspiration without leaving stains or marks. With a certified organic formula, the roll-on deodorant blends Northern Sage, Peppermint and Chamomile Extracts with natural minerals for ultimate freshness. Fast-drying.
name: Herbal Deodorant 50ml

product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the 6 Wave Bath Sponge with Bamboo Charcoal, a 100% naturally sustainable product delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water. Enriched with detoxifying Charcoal, it works to destroy blemish-causing bacteria and is an effective natural treatment for acne-prone, oily skin types.
The innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; eliminating impurities and blackheads whilst active minerals absorb excess oils. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the ergonomically designed sponge is suitable for use with or without a cleanser and is perfect for use in the shower or bath. Simply add water and experience an all-natural, rejuvenating cleanse that will leave skin feeling fresh, clean and clear.
name: Konjac Sponge Company 6 Wave Bath Sponge with Bamboo Charcoal

product_description:
这款奢华的 Seascape Island ApothecaryLes Petits Body Lotion可以深层滋养和滋润肌肤，是一款必备之物，可以为您的美丽养生法增光添彩。 它蕴含100％ 天然Lavender和洋甘菊精油，可以舒缓及软化肌肤，同时保持肌肤水润，您一定会喜欢这款润肤露。
这款润肤露不含苯甲酸酯类、硅树脂和石油，同时含有泽西蜂蜡可以锁住水分，保护娇嫩的肌肤，令您全身的肌肤让人一见就想亲吻。 K.D.
name: Island Apothecary Les Petits Body Lotion (300ml)

product_description: Soak away daily tension with the AromaWorks Nurture AromaBomb Duo Set. Fortified with detoxifying Himalayan Sea Salt and soothing Calamine, the luxurious bath bombs allow you to experience a therapeutic bathing ritual; helping you to de-stress and unwind after a long, tiring day. Expertly blended with pure essential oils, the AromaBombs release relaxing notes of May Chang, Roman Chamomile and Sandalwood to leave you feeling calmed, restored and rejuvenated. Individually wrapped and presented in a gift box.
name: Nurture AromaBomb Duo Set

product_description: Pamper dry and wanting skin with Mizon’s Enjoy Fresh-On Time Sweet Honey Hand Cream. Based upon an emollient-rich Shea Butter formula, it seeks to replenish moisture levels and smooth the appearance of callouses and cracks with a layered infusion of Hyaluronic Acid and nourishing raw Honey. The lightweight treatment rapidly absorbs to leave skin feeling smooth, softened and protected.
