product_description:
Burt's Bees present the Nuts About Nature Gift Set; a trio of skincare treats that work to moisturise, condition and comfort from top to toe. Housed in a branded box, making it the perfect pampering gift for yourself or a loved one.
Almond and Milk Hand Cream (57g)
Rejuvenate tired hands with this non-greasy, luxurious cream. Enriched with sweet almond oil and vitamin E, its natural formula nourishes and moisturises dry hands, whilst conditioning nails. Beeswax replenishes skin, leaving hands soft and silky smooth.
Coconut Foot Cream (120g)
Transform tired feet with this luxurious foot cream. Enriched with coconut oil, an intensely moisturising ingredient to rejuvenate dry, cracked and hard skin, leaving feet smoother and hydrated. Refreshing peppermint oils and a hint of rosemary will soothe skin to deliver long-lasting comfort.
Coconut and Pear Lip Balm (4.25g)
A natural lip balm to hydrate lips so you can achieve the perfect pout. Specially formulated with coconut oil, pear extract and shea butter to restore moisture, the balm leaves lips soft and fragranced with a refreshing, tropical scent.
name: Bees Nuts About Nature Gift Set

product_description:
Combat signs of ageing with the ‘Bust’ and ‘Neck’-Cessity Firming Duo from bliss. Complete with a branded wash bag, you can expect perky-looking breasts and a tighter, more toned chest no matter where you are.
bliss fabgirl™ leave it to cleavage™ Soufflé (100ml)
Enhance your bust and décolléte area. Fortified with light diffusers and adopofillin™, an active ingredient that works to firm and plump skin, the powerful bust cream creates a lifted effect, whilst a moisturising blend of Coconut Oil and Shea Butter smoothens and softens. Its pearlescent, whipped formula absorbs quickly into skin, helping to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles over time.
bliss thinny thin chin™ Neck Firming Cream (50ml)
Instantly tighten and improve the look of crepey skin with the innovative neck cream. Its Botanical Age Fighting Complex hydrates, smoothens and firms skin, whilst antioxidant Evening Primrose defends against free radical damage to reveal brighter, younger-looking skin. Combining a Dual-Action Tightener and pumpkin seed-derived Resilience Enhancer, the fast-absorbing formula protects collagen and elastin to leave skin smooth and supple.

product_description:
Pamper skin with the Nourish & Nurture Soap for All Skin Types from You & Oil. Perfect for daily use, the naturally-derived soap bar contains a delicate selection of luxurious yet nourishing essential oils that work in tandem to purify and hydrate.
Sunflower Seed Oil regulates moisture levels, while Marigold Oil soothes irritations. Transforming into a refreshing foam upon application, it sweeps away dirt and grime while protecting against environmental aggressors. Skin feels clean, soft and replenished.
name: & Oil Nourish & Nurture Soap for All Skin Types 100g

product_description:
用Xen-Tan 非 DHA 瞬时美黑乳液迅速获得美丽、古铜色的外表 。 这款不含 DHA 的美黑乳液在短短 60 秒内即可变干，它会一直留在您的肌肤上，直到您决定把它洗掉为止，您甚至可以在睡觉时使用，因为它不会转移到您的衣服或床单上。
这款美黑乳液呈纯粹的棕褐色，您可以如己所愿地使用，获得自己想要的黑色，如此您可以完全控制自己皮肤黝黑的程度。 这款美黑乳液的气味也好闻，它将使您的肌肤闻起来芬芳迷人！ - L.M.

product_description:
FIT 神奇肌肉按摩精华液，用以舒缓肌肉酸痛。专为男性朋友配制而成，以缓解训练后的肌肉紧张、加快肌肉恢复。
本款精华液内含薄荷、生姜、金缕梅等成分，使身体凉爽、舒适、可对抗炎症，促进肌肉的快速修复。采用 OXY-FIT-10 技术（一种独特的氧气输送系统），可促进细胞再生，使人放松舒缓、充满活力。 - K.N

product_description:
為您提供持久保護的清爽感覺，使用安全溫和，含有有機認證的蘆薈凝膠，玉米澱粉，維他命E 和甘菊，讓你一整天自信滿滿。 
保持一天清爽自信，就用傑森蘆薈體香滾珠。不含苯甲酸酯類物質，酒精和氫氯酸鋁，其特有的全天然原料能讓您得到周到的保護。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森芦荟体香滚珠 (85G)

product_description:
Oral-B Floss Action Brush Refill Heads 配备了微脉冲刷毛，能深入渗透牙齿，以去除牙菌斑和食物残渣。 提供卓越的清洁功效，能深入难以达到的部位，象牙线一样不费吹灰之力清洁牙齿。 E.N.

product_description:
Shiffa's Pregnancy Body Oil is an uplifting formula that helps to relieve itching tummies, soothe inflammation and minimise stress.
Expertly blended with nourishing oils of Mandarin Orange, Chamomile, Evening Primrose and Apricot Kernel, the lightweight, non-greasy formula combats feelings of tiredness and exhaustion to promote a restful night's sleep.
Ideal for the stomach, bust and hips, the multi-tasking body oil conditions and moisturises skin; helping to prevent the formation of stretch marks for a toned, firmed appearance. Calms and relaxes the mind whilst alleviating heavy legs and swollen ankles tin inspire a happy, comfortable pregnancy.

product_description:
PAYOT 柏姿 24 小时补水紧致身体乳具有舒缓肌肤的功效，它是一款营养丰富而不油腻的身体乳，能够提供持久的保湿作用，让您的肌肤焕发青春活力。
它可在肌肤表面形成一层舒适的薄膜，其配方中所蕴含的重焕水分复合物有助于保湿，增强肌肤的紧致度，使其看起来更加年轻。 其保湿和具有保护作用的天然配方有助于强化肌肤的保护膜，使其更加柔软，有效为其补充营养，增强肌肤的弹性.
让您尽享持久的保湿作用，让您的肌肤更加舒适，使其看起来更加年轻。

product_description:
Ila Spa 活肤排毒身体磨砂膏（250g）将带给您柔软光滑的肌肤。 当您感到疲惫或精力不足时，这款能量磨砂膏将让肌肤重新恢复活力，融合了高山薰衣草、天竺葵和香茅等成分，能够刺激血液循环并增强免疫系统。
特别添加了喜马拉雅盐晶体，能有效去除角质，让肌肤如丝般柔滑；还有营养丰富的摩洛哥坚果油和玫瑰果油，以及能够消除脂肪的杜松子。 富含多种高效矿物质，促进肌肤新生和排毒，带给肌肤和感官纯粹的享受。 - L.M.
name: 活肤排毒身体磨砂膏 250g

product_description: 該產品不含對羥基苯甲酸酯、石油化學產品和硫酸鹽、人造香精和色素。適合素食主義者使用，而且從未經過動物測試。
name: Cow Pat 保湿润手霜 300ml

product_description:
The Neroli Hydrating Body Oil from Dr Botanicals is a delicate blend of essential oils brimming with minerals and vitamins, working to repair and pamper skin. Fast absorbing and non-greasy, the potent serum has a delicate fragrance and effortlessly melts in.
Created using only the finest natural extracts, the main ingredient of Neroli Oil aims to minimise the appearance of fine lines and imperfections, whilst antioxidant-rich Sweet Almond Oil helps balance tone and texture. Crambe Oil is a natural emollient, leaving skin feeling silky soft and nourished.
name: Botanicals Neroli Hydrating Body Oil 50ml

product_description:
Pamper dry, cracked and rough skin with the yes to Coconut Head to Toe Hydrating Balm; a rich, plant-based body butter that infuses skin with an ultra-moisturising blend of Coconut, Sweet Almond and Avocado Oils.
Enriched with natural emollients Shea Butter and Beeswax, it’s ideal for use on elbows, hands and knees or wherever you feel needs a little extra care.
name: to Coconut Head to Toe Hydrating Balm

product_description:
Achieve that holiday glow with the Vani-T Bronzing Glaze; an instant self tan gel suitable for both the body and face, based upon naturally sourced extracts and ingredients.
Designed to give you a deep, long lasting fake tan, the non-sticky formula delivers immediate colour coverage while the tan develops. Fortified with vitamin-rich Quandong and Australian Kakadu Plum extracts, it also helps moisturise and nourish skin, helping to minimise dry patches and ensure an even, streak-free coverage.
A delectable blend of essential oils provide free radical protection as well as odour prevention, leaving skin feeling soft, smooth and radiant with a gorgeous, healthy-looking tan.
name: Bronzing Glaze 150ml

product_description:
Centrum Men 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed to support the changing needs of men’s health and wellbeing over the age of 50+, delivering adjusted levels of vitamins and minerals for optimum efficacy and benefits.   
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 24 key nutrients with all 13 essential vitamins to support vitality and immunity while contributing to normal vision and heart health.  
Vitamin B sustains normal energy release from food for an overall boost, while Vitamin C, Zinc, Copper and Selenium combine to support a normal functioning immune system. Vitamin A and Vitamin B2 promote eye health, with high levels of Vitamin B1 to support a normal heart function. Age doesn’t mean you have to slow down, and this daily food supplement provides all the resources to keep you feeling in your prime.
name: Men 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets - (30 Tablets)

product_description:
Prolong the life of your tan with the Sunescape Hydrating Body Butter; a rich, luxurious cream that utilises exotic nut oils, antioxidants and fruit extracts to moisturise and condition skin.
Harnessing the powers of Shea and Cocoa Butters, the fast-absorbing formula delivers intense nourishment to revive and repair skin, whilst Mango Fruit and Buriti Oil restore softness and suppleness from top to toe. The body is smooth, hydrated and scented with a delicious Coconut fragrance.
name: Hydrating Body Butter

product_description: Awaken your senses with the Suprême Homme Shower Gel from Swedish professional footballer, Zlatan Ibrahimović. Working to cleanse from dirt and impurities, the lightweight, powerful formula creates a rich lather on the skin to refresh and revitalise without stripping moisture. Infuses the body with the signature Suprême fragrance of zesty Lemon, Ginger, invigorating Rosemary, Lavender and rich Cedarwood.
name: Ibrahimovic Suprême Homme Shower Gel 200ml

product_description:
利用 Jurlique柑橘护手霜 滋润粗糙干燥疲倦的双手；它是一款营养丰富而不油腻的护手霜，可让您的手部肌肤恢复天鹅绒般的柔软丰盈，同时散发着舒缓的柑橘芳香。
深层滋养和焕发活力，该快速吸收润肤霜加入杏仁和红花籽油，抚慰、舒缓肌肤，令双手长效保湿，舒适轻松。
天然抗氧化剂和基于植物的营养成分可有效防止肌肤免受环境因素的损伤，有助于维持年轻肌肤的丝滑感。 内置于品牌礼盒中，非常适合送给喜欢的人或作为自己的一份礼物。 E.N.
name: Cream（40ml）

product_description:
Re-energise and lift tired, dull skin with the Anti-Fatigue Home Spa Salt Scrub from PUPA. Expertly formulated with a delicate blend of Hawaiian Green Salt and antioxidant-rich Bamboo Extract, the natural exfoliator gently buffs away dirt and impurities while delivering an anti-water action, which penetrates skin tissue for a firming effect, reducing the look of lumps and bumps.
Experience a subtle tingling sensation as the advanced formula releases Active Oxygen, optimising the delivery of essential nutrients for maximum benefits and effectively creating the appearance of a sculpted silhouette. Recreate a spa-like ritual from the comfort of your own home and achieve skin that feels sumptuously soft, toned and revitalised.
name: Home Spa Salt Scrub - Anti-Fatigue 350g

product_description:
The brushworks HD Combination Tweezer Set in 'Red' is a must-have collection for grooming and perfecting your eyebrows. A well groomed brow will expertly frame your face.
Handcrafted from high quality stainless steel, the tweezers have been perfectly aligned for performance and precision, and are durable and easy to clean. Each tweezer features a slanted, straight or pointed tip for targeting specific brow/skin concerns such as loose strays or painful splinters.
Slanted Tweezer - Perfect for tidying up stray hairs on larger areas.
Straight Tweezer - Perfect for holding false eyelashes in place and  applying delicate nail art.
Slanted Point Tweezer - A multi-purpose tweezer for tidying and grooming your arches.
Pointed Tweezer - A precision tweezer ideal for ingrown hairs and removing splinters.
name: HD Combination Tweezer Set - Red

product_description:
Cleanse and condition your skin with the Zirh Vitamin Edition Body Bar. Suitable for all skin types, the bar utilises an expert blend of vitamins and antioxidants to leave your skin smooth, youthful and protected.
Fortified with soothing Oat Straw and extracts of Orange, Chamomile and Cucumber, the refreshing soap effortlessly eliminates impurities, whilst delivering intense moisture and hydration. Skin is cleansed, energised and awakened.
name: Vitamin Edition Body Bar 6.3oz

product_description:
使用本品，帶回夏日精華。採用奢華天然配料，呵護肌膚，讓肌膚芬芳柔軟，讓您充分享受洗浴時光。 
使用說明：
name: & Evelyn 瑰柏翠夏日山峰芬芳沐浴皂 (3X100G)

product_description:
Treat your skin to The Ritual of Dao - Calming Treat Small Gift Set from Rituals. Housed in luxurious packaging, the trio combines a refreshing spray, nourishing cream and gentle shower gel that promise to leave the body feeling cleansed, hydrated and cared for.
The Ritual of Dao Anti-Perspirant Spray (50ml)
With a powerful, fast-drying formula infused with organic White Lotus and Yi Yi Ren, the deodorant applies effortlessly to deliver 24 hour freshness, without leaving marks or stains. Skin is soothed, revitalised and comforted.
The Ritual of Dao Body Cream (70ml)
With a rich, creamy formula that absorbs quickly to soften and moisturise, the lightweight cream harnesses the nourishing properties of Yi Yi Ren to leave skin silky, supple and smooth. Delivers a gentle fragrance of organic White Lotus so you can experience a calmed, relaxed and restored body with a delicate scent.
The Ritual of Dao Foaming Shower Gel (50ml)
Transforming into a rich foam on contact with water, the refreshing shower gel delicately lifts away impurities whilst nourishing and moisturising the body. Enriched with organic Yi Yi Ren and White Lotus, skin feels revitalised, soft and supple with a subtle fragrance.
name: The Ritual of Dao - Calming Treat Small Gift Set

product_description:
FOREO ISSA™逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷刷头 – 宝蓝色采用顶级硅胶材质，不含BPA和邻苯二甲酸盐等有毒化学成分。与Foreo ISSA逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷相配备，刷头可抑制细菌滋生，保持口腔和牙龈的彻底清洁。设计智能并符合人体工学，3D灵活性刷头可以触及口腔内任何缝隙。刷头可使用整整一年，价值持久。– I.M
– I.M
name: ISSA逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷刷头 – 宝蓝色

product_description:
Refresh and calm your senses with the this works Stress Check Breathe In; an aroma-therapeutic roller ball. Boasting a therapeutic blend, breathe in effortlessly delivers product to skin and can reduce feelings of stress by simply inhaling or massaging into pulse points.
The dreamy scent is enriched with Eucalyptus to counter physical and mental fatigue, whilst Frankincense essential oil delivers antiseptic benefits. Complete with Lavender oil, Stress Check helps those suffering from insomnia, nervous tension and hypertension. Expect to feel de-stressed and thoroughly relaxed.
name: works Stress Check Breathe In 8ml

product_description:
Transform your skincare routine with the Mama Mio First Trimester Oil Bundle. Combining a trio of bestselling Mama Mio products, the bundle is designed to treat and nourish skin in order to cope with hormone changes that occur in the first trimester of pregnancy. Host to a moisturising body oil, luxurious body lotion and refreshing facial wash, each product within the bundle is suitable for use whilst pregnant and will leave skin thoroughly nourished.
The Tummy Rub Oil 120ml
Help protect your skin against pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Oil. Enriched with Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids, the oil is able to build the skin's strength and elasticity, helping to relieve itching tummies. Specially formulated with a blend of Organic Oils to lock in moisture and provide maximum protection to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, the luxurious oil works to hydrate skin.
Megamama 150ml
Help nourish and replenish dry skin with Megamama, a super-rich omega body lotion. The luxurious cream contains Omega oils and powerful antioxidants to help strengthen and shield skin from free radical damage and environmental stresses. Enriched with Chia and Pumpkin seed, the cream leaves skin hydrated. Legs and arms can be particularly needy during pregnancy, causing skin to look tired and dull. Megamama allows you to experience a boost in radiance and reveal skin that is bursting with moisture. Suitable for use while pregnant and nursing to make skin feel moisturised and subtly fragranced for the whole day.
Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash 100ml
Gently cleanse skin with the foaming Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash. Specially formulated with Tea Tree oil and Green Tea Leaf, the wash helps keep skin hydrated and provides powerful antioxidants that shield skin from free radical damage and environmental stresses. The luxurious formula contains a blend of natural, Coconut-derived cleansers enriched with organic Omegas and Vitamins to nourish skin. Experience skin that is full of moisture with a boost in radiance for a brighter complexion.
name: Mio First Trimester Oil Bundle (Worth £74.50)

product_description: Udo's Choice Infant’s Blend Microbiotics provide an easy-to-consume powdered blend of ‘friendly’ bacteria (probiotic), specifically selected for children under 5 years old, to support the immune system functionality and encourage proper digestion. Microbiotics are the beneficial lacto and bifido bacteria that occur throughout the digestive tract and are essential in replenishing healthy gut flora, which helps to reduce gas, bloating and constipation.
name: Choice Infant's Blend Microbiotics - 75g

product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set from Holistic Silk. Housed in a luxurious organza bag, the collection includes a pair of massaging slippers and a sleep-inducing eye mask with limited edition print.
Holistic Silk Lavender Eye Mask
Crafted from Dupion silk, characterised by its luxurious sheen, the oversized mask features a super soft cotton velvet lining for ultimate comfort and a ribbon tie fastening to allow a custom fit. Filled with real Lavender for a relaxing, soothing fragrance, the sleep-inducing eye mask rests on the cheekbones and forehead to block out the light, allowing you to experience a moment of pure tranquillity. Ideal for home or travelling, you can wake up feeling restored and refreshed with reduced stress. Dimensions: 24cm x 12cm.
Holistic Silk Massaging Slippers
Featuring comfortable magnetic insoles with multiple perforated massage nodules, the slippers help to massage the reflex points in your feet, stimulating the nervous system and enhancing the body's metabolism. Ideal for yoga, travelling or even in the office, the cosy, lightweight slippers improve circulation, whilst gently soothing and relieving aching, heavy legs. Perfect for in-flight use to prevent swelling. Adorned with an elegant print and bow. Non-slip. Small: UK 3-4 / EU 36-37. Medium: UK 5-6 / EU 38-39. Large: UK 7-8 / EU 40-41.
name: Silk 眼罩拖鞋礼品装 - 玫瑰主题

product_description:
Discover a multi-functional super balm with Mama Mio Superstar in a Jar; a versatile formula that works to hydrate, heal and protect dry skin. The creamy wax tackles an array of skincare issues that occur all over the body, ranging from the lips to heels and elbows to knees.
The hydrating balm blends into a luxurious, fragrance free oil, which is gentle yet effective on sensitive skin types and delicate pregnant noses. Fortified with Baobab Oil, the vitamin-rich oil envelops skin, hair and nails in an essential veil of nourishing moisture, which also boasts anti-ageing qualities.
A healthy dose of Beeswax and Almond Oil work in synergy to deliver anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant benefits, as well as healing action to ensure skin is healthy and protected. Complete with a skin-loving blend of Camellia Seed oil and Olive oil, the lightweight balm leaves the body moisturised and rejuvenated. Expect Mama Mio’s Superstar in a Jar to become a household essential.
name: Mio Superstar in a Jar - 15g

product_description:
Cleanmarine Krill Oil for Women gel capsules are an easy-to-consume food supplement to provide you with essential Omega 3 acids and vitamins to help regulate hormonal activity, reduce tiredness and alleviate the symptoms of PMS.
Each one contains Soy Isoflavones, which are similar to oestrogen on a cellular level, and Vitamin D3, known for sustaining life, building strong bones and modulating the immune system. Added Vitamins B1, B2 and B6 help to support a healthy nervous system and keep your energy levels in check. And of course, Krill Oil itself contributes to healthy heart, brain, eye and joint function as well as helping to enhance your mood and improve concentration.
Why choose Krill Oil over Fish Oil? Krill are shrimp-like crustaceans that provide a more sustainable and ethical source of Omega 3 with zero by-catch. The fatty acids within Krill Oil are bound to phospholipids, a major component of human cell membranes, thus are much more rapidly absorbed than the acids from fish oil supplements. Krill Oil is also rich in Astaxanthin, a natural antioxidant, plus there’s no fishy aftertaste.
name: Krill Oil for Women - 60 Gel Capsules (600mg)

product_description:
可用 Institut Karité Paris 乳木果洗肤霜（薰衣草）这种有滋润作用的洗液护理皮肤；这是一种不含脂肪酸盐的洗体液，成分丰富，质地细腻。
这种洗体液含有 25% 的乳木果油（这种成分则富含维生素，对皮肤有强效滋养和舒缓作用），可温和地清洗皮肤，因而既能清除污泥和杂质，又能使皮肤滋润、舒适并且受到保护。 这种配方护肤品成分丰富并且有舒缓作用，可形成令人舒适并且有水合作用的保护层，使身体触感极其柔韧并且焕然一新。
富含令人放松的薰衣草芬芳。
name: Karité Paris 乳木果洗肤霜 - 薰衣草 (500ml)

product_description:
Natural Birthing Company's Pure Bliss is a postnatal compress solution that works to calm and relieve feelings of discomfort in your intimate area after child birth.

The award-winning blend of Hypericum and Calendula can be used straight after labour, and is suitable for use on stitches, tears, haemorrhoids and general intimate discomfort, including caesarean section wounds. The calming formula promotes natural healing and helps to comfort your delicate area after birth.
name: Birthing Company Pure Bliss Soothing Postnatal Compress Solution 50ml

product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Venice' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts a luxurious fragrance of Red Geranium, Rice Cloud and Cotton Flower to relax the senses.
name: Dante Dolce Vivere Venice Soap 250g

product_description:
Re-energise and strengthen the skin and mind with the Mauli Spirited Body Oil; an uplifting, multi-tasking treatment based upon Ayurvedic traditions to help balance Kapha energies that help bolster the immune system, helping to combat flu symptoms and feelings of lethargy.
Initially formulated as part of a luxurious spa treatment at the Bulgari Hotel, the oil contains a specific selection of essential oils that are renowned for healing properties both physically and mentally.
Enveloping skin in a conditioning veil of softness and nutrients, the aromatic blend contains stimulating heart notes of Eucalyptus, Juniper Berry and Giner, known for their restorative benefits. Revitalising accords of Peppermint, Cinnamon and Frankincense lift feelings of listlessness, while a base of Sweet Almond and Grapeseed works to boost a sluggish metabolism and alleviate blocked sinuses. Feel rejuvenated and inspired.
name: Spirited Body Oil 130ml

product_description:
Refresh and revitalise with the Alpha-H Liquid Gold Luxe Resurfacing Body Cloths; dual-purpose cleansing and exfoliating wipes that improve texture and tone.
Infused with Glycolic Acid and botanical ingredients, the towelettes feature a textured side to gently buff away dead skin cells and impurities, and a smooth surface that restores softness and suppleness.
Ideal for combating rough, dry and flaky areas, or preparing for self-tan application, the body is left feeling smooth, hydrated and refined. Housed in resealable packaging for use on-the-go.
name: Liquid Gold Luxe Resurfacing Body Cloths

product_description:
Nourish skin with the KORRES Yoghurt Body Milk; a hydrating formula that leaves the body smooth, refreshed and delicately scented.
The moisturising milk smoothes over skin, delivering a veil of essential and long-lasting moisture that eliminates areas of dryness. Enriched with Almond Oil, the luxurious solution delivers anti-inflammatory benefits and a comforting, soothing feel. A calming dose of Aloe Vera encourages cell regeneration and skin healing, whilst hydrating Shea Butter shields the body from UV aggression and therefore prevents wrinkle formation.
Providing a pampering, moisturising experience, the body milk leaves skin touchably soft and ultra-smooth, as well as thoroughly nourished and hydrated.
name: Yoghurt Body Milk 200ml

product_description: Treat your skin to luxurious moisture with the Kukui Oil Wonder Balm from Connock London. Infused with a unique blend of Kukui oil, Monoi cocoa butter, Mango butter and Beeswax, the formula works to soothe and moisturise areas of dry skin. Ideal for lips, cuticles, elbows, knees and heels, the balm is designed to calm irritated skin and leave it visibly suppler.
name: London Kukui Oil Wonder Balm 10ml

product_description:
用沐浴油系列（来自Kneipp品牌）Treat您的身心。 该套装产品组合了品牌的6种奢华沐浴油，可促进您的身心改善，让您常年感到体力恢复和活力焕发。
Kneipp Herbal沐浴平衡Lavender（20ml）
注入使人舒缓的Lavender Essential Oil，其配方可产生纯净而安宁的香味；有助于消除疲劳，祛除压力和紧张，让您在忙碌的一天后感到重新焕发活力。
 Kneipp Herbal柑橘和Orange减压沐浴露（20ml）
用柑橘和Orange的天然精油强化，清爽配方会浸泡掉您所有烦恼和忧虑，增强积极性，释放日常生活的压力。
 Kneipp Herbal山金车关节和肌肉修复沐浴露（20ml） 
豪华的沐浴油运用山金车提取物（一种以焕发活力而著称的成分）的功效，能够在体力活动后舒缓和放松肌肉紧张，而迷迭香、卡布雷乌瓦和松树精油则会让身体感到温暖和舒适。
 Kneipp Herbal缬草和啤酒花甜梦沐浴露（20ml） 
混合缬草Essential Oil和啤酒花提取物，放松浴疗可以舒缓和镇静身心，同时有助于让您在紧张忙碌的一天后得到放松。 享受宁静的时刻，为晚间完美的睡眠做准备。
 Kneipp Herbal享受生活May Change和柠檬沐浴露（20ml） 
清爽的May Chang和增添兴致的柠檬散发着有复原作用的柑橘香氛，激发积极心态，改善您的情绪，让您感到快乐、满足和平衡。
 Kneipp Herbal冷季Eucalyptus沐浴露（20ml） 
这款温暖和舒缓的沐浴油适合在感冒和流感季节使用，可清除鼻窦炎症。 富含Eucalyptus油，这款护理产品也可以在夏季被用于缓解过敏，如花粉热。

Ingenious Beauty 终极胶原蛋白+是一款创新性的口服美容护肤营养补充品，它采用科学配方，旨在补充体内的胶原蛋白和透明质酸，以及帮助应对因阳光和环境污染而给肌肤带来的损伤。
其设计旨在使肌肤吸收尽可能多的营养成分，胶囊中仅含有三种 100% 纯天然成分，每种成分都具有让肌肤看起来更年轻、更活力的作用。
海洋胶原肽能够帮助修复肌肤的结构，减少皱纹，锁住水分，以确保维持肌肤的弹性。 透明质酸能够减缓水分经表皮流失的速度，维持肌肤的水分含量。 有机胡萝卜虾青素具有独特的分子结构，可起到强效抗氧化剂的作用，经实践证明，具有修复紫外线损伤和降低肌肤受有害射线的不良影响。
经临床实践证明，服用本品 10-20 天的时间即可有效淡化皱纹和细纹，持续服用 40 天，即可使细纹和皱纹淡化 26%。 使肌肤更有光泽，同时显著增强秀发、双唇和指甲的整体活力。
name: Beauty 终极胶原蛋白 + 美容护肤营养补充品（120 粒）

product_description:
本品採用純天然礦物鹽，具有抗菌功效，形成保護屏障，抵禦引發異味的細菌，為您提供全天24 小時保護。

product_description:
使用Oral-B Precision Clean Toothbrush Head Refills能让您的牙齿和齿龈常保健康。 它的先进刷毛系统比普通牙刷能去除更多的牙菌斑；牙间刷的毛尖则能深入难刷部位，强效洁齿。
这款补充装刷头能强效亮白牙齿，触感温柔。Indicator®刷毛如果半截已褪色，就表明需要更换刷头。 E.N. 
请注意：兼容所有振动式/旋转式的Oral-B 牙刷（pulsonic 除外）。 为了实现最佳效果，牙医建议每三个月更换一次刷头。

Harnessing the nourishing powers of Shea Butter, Avocado Oil and Aloe Vera, the rich balm revitalises dry, aching feet, whilst delivering an uplifting fragrance blended from Grapefruit, Clary Sage and Rosemary Essential Oils.
Foot File and Socks

product_description:
Freezeframe 祛妊辰纹橡皮擦让您的肌肤重拾自信，这款创新型的身体甘油采用干细胞技术，有助于明显减轻衰老的迹象，仅需两周的时间就能让全新的妊辰纹淡化 50% 以上。 该技术最初用于帮助治疗三度烫伤，经临床证明，该配方可有针对性地祛除明显的暗沉、红血丝，缩小妊娠纹。
这款祛斑精油采用干细胞刺激技术™（由来自干细胞的脂肪能量制成）和具有舒缓肌肤功效的肽， 它可轻松涂抹到肌肤上，而在肌肤表面留下油腻的残留物，它可针对性地祛除新旧妊辰纹，同时有效降低肌肤表面的张力，使肌肤更加光滑。

效果如何？ 
临床实践证明，使用 12 周后，新妊辰纹的显著红血丝可淡化 92%，而陈旧顽固的妊辰纹可显著淡化 94%。
这款身体精油可有效最大化减少严重的妊辰纹，它还蕴含有糖蛋白和 MMP 抑制剂，通过强化肌肤和增强肌肤的弹性，可有助于抵制新出现的妊辰纹。 这款保湿精油与液体可可脂相结合，不会让肌肤有油腻的感觉，使肌肤更加光滑，肤色更均匀，同时还有保护肌肤的功效。
name: 祛妊辰纹橡皮擦 80ml

本品内含山金车、桦树和金缕梅等成分，可完美地舒缓身心压力。
使用说明：

和深度古铜肤色伴侣 Xen-Tan Moroccan Tan 问好。 这种创新乳液结合的 Xen Tan 所信赖的摩洛哥坚果油肤色配方，滋养你的皮肤，让古铜色美黑效果更持久。 柔滑轻盈，可以毫不费力地在皮肤上滑动，立刻给您想要的肤色，逐渐渗入，长效持久，滋养的橄榄油美黑成分会让您的肌肤容光焕发。
适合所有皮肤类型，可安全地用于面部和身体，质感丝滑，胶原蛋白肽让您的肌肤焕发青春、健康光彩。 您的肌肤将散发热带椰子香，充满亮丽的色彩和异国芳香。
name: Moroccan Tan (148ml)

product_description:
Reveal transformed skin with the Mauli Radiance Exfoliant; an award-winning, multi-tasking treatment that seeks to alleviate dryness, minimise the look of discolouration and inspire a healthy-looking glow.
Traditionally a preserve of royalty, the mixture of finely ground botanicals with mineral-rich clay is India’s natural answer to microdermabrasion processes, buffing away impurities and absorbing excess oil to leave skin looking refined and polished.
Brimming with antioxidants and vitamins, the opulent blend contains soothing Indian Sandalwood to help diminish the appearance of scars, while Kashmiri Saffron works to even out redness and impart radiance. The additions of pure Rose Otto, Vetiver and Tumeric strengthen cell renewal and create a protective barrier against excessive melanin production to combat dark spots and dullness.
Presented in a darkened jar for optimum preservation and complete with an engraved steel portion spoon and muslin cloth. Mix with your daily cleanser for a revitalising scrub or add to rose water or milk for a deeply nourishing mask.
name: Radiance Exfoliant 30g

product_description:
Hydrate and protect with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Nail & Cuticle Therapy; a restorative cream that promotes healthy-looking nails and cuticles without greasy residue.
Harnessing the powers of Red Sea Algae and antioxidant-rich Green Seaweed, the luxurious treatment nourishes and protects against breakage and environmental aggressors, whilst softening dry, flaking cuticles to leave them perfectly pampered. Shea Butter and Glycerine deliver intense moisture and encourage natural, healthy nail growth.
name: & Evelyn La Source Nail & Cuticle Therapy 15g

product_description:
Murad慕拉維生素C美體緊膚霜200ml 
本品質地超豐富，蘊含增強肌膚彈性和光澤的維生素C，15 分鐘內可提高40% 的肌膚緊緻性，同時恢復最大水份。 
 附加特性和成分： 
 使用說明： 
如需全身補水和緊緻，按摩推入肌膚。
name: 慕拉维生素 C 美体紧肤霜 200ml

product_description:
Fake Bake的这款豪华美黑露让您在瞬间拥有出众的光芒。 独有的色彩混合配方，卓效遮盖不规则肤色，让您拥有一身至美无色差的金黄古铜肤色。
只选用最上等的天然衍生成分，质地轻盈不粘结，不会堵塞毛孔。 使用方便，可用肥皂和清水洗净，无颜色残留。
- - 使用随附的手套在洁净、清新的皮肤上均匀地涂一层美黑油。
- 在一天结束时洗掉。
name: Bake Bronzer Wash Off Instant Tan (125ml)

product_description:
Sonic Chic最新豪华版电动牙刷是一款便携式、可充电牙刷。其结构紧凑、设计轻便。 本款设备配备防护性通风盖，非常适合旅游时携带。 也可在健身房、外出工作间隙使用。
本款牙刷由声波驱动、具有双速功能。两种设置模式：模式一为每分钟震动28000次； 模式二每分钟震动32000次，清洁程度加深。 它含一个两分种的象限计时器，可指示刷牙者何时可将牙刷移动至不同的牙齿部位进行刷洗。 本款牙刷的刷头是一个超软刷毛，精准度很高，可轻松到达不易刷洗部位，每次均可带给您舒适的牙齿清洁体验。
name: Chic 豪华版电动牙刷 （Silver）

product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin with the Kukui Oil Nourishing Collection from Connock London. Housed in a zipped wash bag, the kit includes three luxurious products infused with Kukui Oil, sourced from a small factory on the Hawaiian island of Oahu.
Kukui Oil Soap (100g)
Harnessing the powers of Kukui Oil and Shea Butter, the vegetable-based, creamy soap creates a rich lather to gently eliminate impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Skin is soft, supple and delicately fragranced.
Nourishing Hand Cream (50ml)
A deeply moisturising hand cream that works to combat dry, rough skin whilst fighting visible signs of ageing. Infused with Kukui Oil, rich in essential fatty acids, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula delivers intense hydration, and its dose of antioxidant Vitamin E shields from environmental factors that can lead to fine lines, cracking and chapping.
Wonder Balm (10ml)
Infused with a unique blend of Kukui Oil, Monoi Cocoa Butter and Beeswax, the luxurious formula works to soothe and moisturise areas of dry skin. Ideal for lips, cuticles, elbows, knees and heels, the non-greasy balm is designed to calm irritated skin for long-lasting comfort.
name: London Kukui Oil Nourishing Collection (Worth £35)

product_description:
可用 Gallinée La Culture 润体乳给全身以无微不至的呵护；这是一种吸收迅速的深层滋养配方护肤品，有恢复触感柔软的光滑皮肤的作用。
这种有补水作用的润体乳，已用该品牌已获专利的益生元、益生菌和乳酸的三合一复合生物制剂强化，可发挥最佳补水作用，以使皮肤得到强效滋润，而抗氧化剂睡菜提取物则可使皮肤紧致，甜杏仁油有再生和焕肤作用。 会使身体看起来柔韧、健康，并且明亮红润。
name: La Culture 润体乳 (200ml)

product_description: Treat your skin and senses to the Il Frutteto Citron and Bergamot Soap from Nesti Dante. Crafted in Florence using traditional methods and natural ingredients, the vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and rejuvenates, whilst energising and refreshing to leave skin feeling soft and supple. Housed in decorative packaging, the soap bar makes an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.
name: Dante Il Frutteto Citron and Bergamot Soap 250g

product_description:
转型豪华型日霜是 XEN-TAN  最畅销的自晒黑日霜。您可在最新的、先进豪华型系列产品中找到该产品。 目前生产的 236 ml的日霜更受欢迎。它提供了相同的功效、更便捷的应用。
尤其是对于如今壮大中的逐渐美黑市场，转型豪华型 XEN-TAN  日霜可为您提供每日皮肤所需的水分。因该款日霜包含自晒黑成分，使用后您会拥有闪亮的橄榄色皮肤。 这些产品均带有新鲜香草的香味。 其先进的配方会令您感觉到好像是太阳在亲吻您的皮肤。肌肤每天都水润、极度柔软、而不会发黄、也不留任何痕迹。
使用说明：
name: 日霜（236ml）

product_description:
Love Boo 寶寶洗浴護膚小套裝禮品裝包含4 件天然產品，為寶寶創造最開心的沐浴享受！配合使用這款神奇禮盒中的產品，可滋養舒緩寶寶肌膚，給媽咪寶貝帶來無窮樂趣！ 
這款套裝包括以下產品：
name: Boo 宝宝洗浴护肤小套装（4 件装）

product_description:
将 bliss防止毛发倒生棉片浸泡在去角质的α和β羟基酸中，添加植物舒缓剂，可防止打蜡后或剃须后毛发内生长。 每天使用，可保持皮肤光滑舒缓，最重要的是不结块。
内含的燕麦提取物可处理皮肤过敏、红肿、瘙痒；令肌肤舒缓的薰衣草油，具有愈合肌肤的魔力。 金缕梅花水具有愈合肌肤伤口、抗炎等功效，使肌肤闪耀光泽。甘醇酸可去除 死皮细胞，使肌肤更光滑。 本品也适合男士在剃须后使用，防止剃须颠簸。
使用说明：

KORRES茉莉Body润肤膏有甜美的花香味道，让您闻后感觉心旷神怡！ 这款使身体光滑和保湿的润肤霜可涂在身上的任何部位，给人以典雅复古的感觉，非常适合干燥的手肘、脚跟和膝盖。
KORRES茉莉花Body润肤膏利用乳木果油与葵花籽油、杏仁和酪梨油相结合的功效，滋润您缺水的肌肤，使其恢复弹性和光滑，让您拥有柔软有馥郁芳香的肌肤。
使用说明：
name: 茉莉花 Body 润肤霜 (125ml)

product_description:
Centrum Performance Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed for those with active and sporty lifestyles, delivering essential vitamins and minerals to supplement your nutritional needs and give extra support for energy release.   
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 23 key nutrients to support physical endurance and energy release.
B Vitamins help to unlock energy reserves taken from food for an additional boost, while Iron, Ginkgo Biloba and Pantothenic Acid work in tandem to maintain a healthy and active mind for enhanced stamina and performance.  
Vitamin B1 supports the normal heart function, plus Vitamin C boosts antioxidant levels and contributes to support of the immune system. Ideal for those who regularly exercise and play sports, the daily supplement ensures you feel ready and at your best.
name: Performance Multivitamin Tablets - (60 Tablets)

product_description:
利用 Menage日常Hand Repair改善和恢复干燥、过劳的双手；这是一款可被迅速吸收的手霜，旨在改善、保护和恢复舒适双手。
其丰富、不油腻配方瞬间形成一个保护屏障，抵御自由基的伤害，同时令双手肌肤无比柔嫩，并改善柔韧度。 E.N.
name: Repair（75ml）

product_description:
Achieve a long-lasting tan with the Weekly Self-Tan Lotion Medium from UTAN and Tone. The best-selling formula envelops skin in a refreshing scent, as well as delivering a golden tan for up to a week.
Ideal for fair to medium skin tones, the lotion is effortlessly applied and offers an instant bronzed-look and streak-free results. The tan is complete with UTAN and Tone’s Body Sculpting complex, which works to flush toxins from the skin and visibly tone and firm the surface. Skin is left supple and sun-kissed.
name: and Tone Weekly Self-Tan Lotion Medium 200ml

product_description:
傑克⋅布萊克Pit Boss抗汗香體膏 
保持體味清香，適合敏感型肌膚。防止異味和出汗，溫和配方不刺激皮膚。香體膏不污染衣物，香味清淡。 
 使用說明： 
沐浴後在乾淨的皮膚上使用。轉動香體膏底部，露出香體膏。僅少量用於腋下（腋窩塗一下）。
name: Black Pit Boss 杰克⋅布莱克 Pit Boss 抗汗香体膏 (78g)

product_description:
Experience a complete tanning routine with the 4 Piece Discovery Set from UTAN and Tone. Combining to deliver a streak-free, golden glow, the set contains a pre-tan body scrub, self-tan lotion, tan intensifier and a nourishing night crème. Skin will be supple, nourished and sun-kissed.
Body Smoothing Before Scrub 100ml
Prepare your skin for self-tan with the Body Smoothing Before Scrub. The scrub is designed to exfoliate the body, ridding skin of dead and dry skin cells, which will aid in achieving an even tan. Enriched with Olive Fruit and Sweet Orange essential oils, the scrub delivers luxurious hydration to skin, whilst Camomile offers a soothing feel. Expect thoroughly nourished skin that is ready for self-tanning products.
Firming Body Weekly Self-Tan Lotion 100ml
Achieve a long-lasting tan with the Firming Body Weekly Self-Tan Lotion. The best-selling formula envelops skin in a refreshing scent, as well as delivering a golden tan for up to a week. Ideal for fair to medium skin tones, the lotion is effortlessly applied and offers an instant bronzed-look and streak-free results. The tan utilises UTAN and Tone’s Body Sculpting complex to flush toxins from the skin, which visibly tones and firms the body.
Firming Body Everyday Lotion Gradual Glow 100ml
Top up your tan with the Gradual Lotion Medium. Ideal for medium to dark skin tones, the lotion is designed to be used to intensify and build on existing real or fake tans until the desired level of colour is achieved. Enriched with an organic tanner, the silky lotion can be used as a regular body lotion, yet delivers a streak-free, sun-kissed finish. The tan is complete with a Body Sculpting complex, which works to flush toxins from the skin and visibly tone and firm the surface. Skin is left supple and sun-kissed.
Nourishing Night Creme 25ml
Achieve a holiday glow with the Nourishing Night Creme. Offering nourishment whilst skin is most receptive to repair, the creme is designed to moisturise and care for skin, as well as delivering a gradual tan. Antioxidant rich, the formula is enriched with Vitamins C, B and K, alongside potent Hyaluronic Acid. The innovative Night Creme provides essential moisture to skin, whilst an organic tanner develops a gradual sun-kissed glow overnight. Used consecutively, the tan can be built up to deliver your desired colour and deepness.
name: and Tone 4 Piece Discovery Set

product_description:
Lock Stock & Barrel天然洗发美发土，富含强韧而有聚集质感的啫喱，使头发无油光、蓬松好看。
Lock Stock & Barrel天然洗发美发土，内含硅藻土及膨润土等成分，为您呈现不羁的磨砂质感；其他成分如：啫喱、二氧化硅、浮石等，带给您独特的凝土发质。
使用说明：
name: Stock & Barrel天然洗发美发土（60g）

product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Body Lotion; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that delivers intense moisture and hydration without greasy residue.
Fortified with a Hydra Marine Blend of antioxidant-rich Green Seaweed and Blue Sea Kale, the luxurious lotion softens and conditions skin, whilst Shea Butter and Vitamin E nourish and protect. Expect soft, supple skin with a fresh sea breeze scent to rejuvenate the mind and body.
name: & Evelyn La Source Body Lotion 500ml

product_description:
Sukin 洗手液結合芳香植物、柔化荷荷巴油和鱷梨油及舒緩蘆薈與補水玫瑰果油，清潔滋潤雙手，非常合適工作繁忙的雙手。洗手液可去除過多的油和污垢，讓雙手感覺順滑，非常乾淨。 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。 100% 認證的碳平衡公司旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA
name: 洗手液 (250ml)

product_description:
Treat dry, sensitive skin to the nourishing and reparative properties of NUXE Rêve de Miel® Body Cream, a rich, moisturising formula that cocoons skin in a veil of hydration and comfort.
Helping to relieve feelings of irritation and tightness in dry skin, the replenishing cream contains Honey and Sunflower and gently envelops the body to promote soft, supple results. It expertly restores and replenishes hydration whilst soothing to leave dry skin feeling comfortable and relieved. Infused with a comforting fragrance.
name: Rêve de Miel® Body Cream for Dry Skin 400ml

product_description:
FIT紧致塑形精华液，专为男士设计，以打造更加有形的健硕身体。
本款精华液富含生物活性成分及天然成分，包括脂肪抑制咖啡因和朝鲜蓟叶提取物等，针对皮下脂肪，打造更有型、更明显的肌肉。 非粘性质地，可迅速被肌肤吸收，使肤色更光滑、更均匀。 采用 OXY-FIT-10 技术，以促进细胞再生。 - K.N
name: 紧致塑形精华液100ml

product_description:
Experience the powers of the Aromatherapy Associates Revive Morning Roller Ball; an intense pulse point therapy to energise the mind and body for a refreshing start to the day.
Expertly blended with invigorating Grapefruit, Rosemary and Juniper, the stimulating formula can be used throughout the day to boost your mood. Perfect for travelling or carrying in your handbag, the revitalising solution leaves you feeling awake and ready to face the busy day ahead.
name: Associates Revive Morning Roller Ball 10ml

product_description:
这种有舒缓和止痛作用的创新型康复霜有深层康复作用，可减轻关节疼痛和扭伤，减少炎症引起的不适，以及缓解疼痛肌肉的紧张度。 这种康复配方中富含薄荷醇、龙血竭、MSM、山金车和柳草，立即就能缓解疼痛，而且效果持久。 这种康复膏可在锻炼前后使用，以改善效果并加快恢复速度。
可在运动之前使用，以便做肌肉准备活动，以及加快血液循环。  可在运动后使用，以治疗已有的疼痛，以及使疼痛的肌肉得到恢复。 随时均可用于缓解紧张和有压力的部位，尤其是颈部和肩部。

product_description:
Sarah Chapman 的夜间身体修复乳可紧致和滋润干燥的肌肤，改善肤色和肤质，让肌肤更加光滑年轻。 其强劲的配方中含有维他命 A、C 和 E，以及摩洛哥坚果、山茶花、猴面包树萃取的混合物，可焕活肌肤，让肌肤更加光滑而有光泽。
这款修复乳适合各种肌肤类型，其抗氧化配方中含有高度浓缩的 Matrixyl® 五胜肽和 Collageneer® 胶原蛋白促成剂，可增强肌肤的弹性和紧致度，刺激新陈代谢，减少氧化作用，让肌肤更加丰盈有活力。 该品牌的明星级鲜花精油香味淡雅，可平静舒缓身心。 E.N.
name: Chapman 夜间身体修复乳（120 毫升）

product_description:
Awaken your skin with the Nectarine and Honey Blossom Body Salt Scrub from Natural Spa Factory. The luxurious salt scrub boasts an oil-based formula that delivers intense hydration to the skin, alongside a soothing effect. The formula easily absorbs into the skin without leaving a greasy residue or clogging the pores, which can lead to blemishes.
Enriched with Apricot Kernel oil, rich in Vitamin A and E, the scrub works to renew skin cells and thoroughly nourish the skin, whilst also defending against free radicals. Suitable for even sensitive skin types, the formula contains Grape Seed oil that aims to visibly tighten skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving the body younger looking and incredibly smooth.
name: Spa Factory Nectarine and Honey Blossom Body Salt Scrub

product_description: This Works最新 助眠润肤乳液  ，是一款二合一乳液，使肌肤焕发年轻光彩，同时帮助您进入深度睡眠。 内含纯精油和有效活性成分如：氨基酸和视黄醇等，使您清晨醒来后肌肤如天鹅绒般柔软光滑、光彩照人。 E.N.

product_description:
本品為品牌手部護理系列的新產品，用料來自巴賓頓別墅的Walled Garden，富含天然薄荷油，可鎮靜驅蟲，以及有機油，清潔同時提亮手部膚色。本品可溫和清潔雙手，令肌膚清爽同時保持濕潤。 
使用說明：
name: 高效清新洗手液 (300ml)

product_description: Jack Black旗下的Jack Black Epic Moisture Extra Rich Body Hydrator （354ml）是具有润肤功效的身体乳液，不仅使用效果名校，同时涂抹在身上不会有任何厚重感。 这款保湿产品的成分中富含具有丰富乳木果和古布阿苏果油脂的混合物，不使用苯甲酸酯类、硫酸盐或邻苯二甲酸盐， 使用效果十分明显。同时，本产品中也采用了先进的技术，以及多种天然植物，例如有机绿茶和坚果油，从而让皮肤看起来富有光泽，具有持久的良好保湿作用。  - E.D
name: Black Epic Moisture Extra Rich Body Hydrator （354ml）

product_description:
Energise skin with the Nesti Dante Romantica Gillyflower and Fuchsia Soap; a fragrant, vegetable soap bar that is hand-crafted in Italy using the saponification method. Arriving wrapped in thick textured paper finished with a decorative floral print, the soap is an ideal gift, or the perfect treat to yourself.
Traditionally made utilising natural, raw ingredients, the soap gently cleanses skin to eliminate traces of dirt and impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. Romancing the senses, the cleansing bar boasts a sensual scent of gillyflower and fuchsia, which work in synergy to deliver an uplifting fragrance that will invigorate the mind and body.
name: Dante Romantica Gillyflower and Fuchsia Soap 250g

product_description: Say hello to soft and supple skin with a longer lasting tan with the TANWORX Hydrating Body Lotion. Suitable for use every day all over the body, this lavish moisturiser boasts unique soft focus technology containing vitamin E and blackcurrant seed oil to reduce the appearance of fine lines, increase elasticity and restore moisture. You'll be left with naturally radiant, supple and bronzed skin all over. K.D.
name: Hydrating Body Lotion (200ml)

product_description:
Institut Karité Paris Shea 法国巴黎乳油木果脂学院亮采面膜可有效滋养您的肌肤，这款乳状的面膜可有效温和地清洁肌肤和祛除角质，让肌肤更加柔软、亮白。
其配方中含有 20% 的乳油木果脂，是一种蕴含丰富维他命的营养成分，可增强滋养和舒缓功效，天鹅绒般柔软的质地可使其清除所有杂质和暗沉的死皮细胞，使肤色更清新，令肌肤恢复自然光泽。 这款舒适的面膜适用于敏感型肌肤，最好每周敷用一至两次，以使肌肤更加柔软、丰盈。
name: Karité Paris Shea 法国巴黎乳油木果脂学院亮采面膜 50ml

product_description: This Works最新 助眠修护乳液，其二合一配方，可对抗肤色不匀，皮肤干皱等问题，同时帮您进入深度睡眠。 结合了纯精油、多果酸、抗氧化剂维生素E和超保湿透明质酸等成分，让您早晨醒来后即可拥有活力健康的肌肤。 E.N.
name: Works 助眠修护乳液 120ml

product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set from Holistic Silk. Housed in a luxurious organza bag, the collection includes a pair of massaging slippers and a sleep-inducing eye mask with limited edition print.
Holistic Silk Lavender Eye Mask
Crafted from Dupion silk, characterised by its luxurious sheen, the oversized mask features a super soft cotton velvet lining for ultimate comfort and a ribbon tie fastening to allow a custom fit. Filled with real Lavender for a relaxing, soothing fragrance, the sleep-inducing eye mask rests on the cheekbones and forehead to block out the light, allowing you to experience a moment of pure tranquillity. Ideal for home or travelling, you can wake up feeling restored and refreshed with reduced stress. Dimensions: 24cm x 12cm.
Holistic Silk Massaging Slippers
Featuring comfortable magnetic insoles with multiple perforated massage nodules, the slippers help to massage the reflex points in your feet, stimulating the nervous system and enhancing the body's metabolism. Ideal for yoga, travelling or even in the office, the cosy, lightweight slippers improve circulation, whilst gently soothing and relieving aching, heavy legs. Perfect for in-flight use to prevent swelling. Adorned with an elegant print and bow. Non-slip. Small: UK 3-4 / EU 36-37. Medium: UK 5-6 / EU 38-39. Large: UK 7-8 / EU 40-41.
name: Silk Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set - Tibetan Orange (Various Sizes)

product_description: Seascape Island Apothecary舒缓睡眠油（8ml）蕴含100％的天然油脂，可以让您在紧张忙碌的一天结束后，放松和舒缓您的身心。 - L.M.
name: Island Apothecary Soothe Sleep Oil（8ml）

product_description:
Experience an intense yet comfortable massage with the HoMedics Handheld Shiatsu Massager; a convenient, handheld device from the leading innovators in home massage. Arriving with three, interchangeable massage heads, the massager is the perfect tool for relieving tension and soothing aching muscles.
The three massage heads help to vary the massage experience and target your needs. The Wave Head offers a smooth massage with minimal kneading, whilst the Arc Head delivers an invigorating massage for working into areas of muscle tension and the Roller Head provides a deep tissue massage to eliminate tight knots. The massager boasts an auto pulse programme that relaxes aches and pains as the device glides across the treatment area. Offering various speed options, the Shiatsu massager allows you to tailor your massage experience to your needs.
The lightweight massager is ergonomically designed with an easy-grip handle. This allows the device to reach all areas of need with minimal effort. Working on the entire body, including those hard-to-reach areas, the massager arrives with a soft mesh cover. This can be placed over the head for additional comfort when targeting sensitive areas of skin such as the face.
Compact yet powerful, the device is ideal for at-home use as well as for relieving pain on-the-go. Expect feelings of stress and anxiety to simply melt away, muscles will feel at ease.
name: Handheld Shiatsu Massager

product_description:
NAÏF舒缓Baby油专为宝宝娇嫩的肌肤而研制，吸收迅速，带来从头到脚的滋养和活力。
婴儿油富含天然棉籽油和洋甘菊，有保湿肌肤所必需的脂肪酸，令肌肤光滑，如天鹅绒般柔软。 尤其适合干性及敏感型肌肤，长时间持久舒适，身体不油腻。

Treat skin to a veil of hydration with the Cowshed Gorgeous Cow Body Lotion; a nourishing moisturiser with a delicate, feminine scent.
Combining Shea and Cocoa Butters, the body lotion envelops skin in long-lasting moisture, which is able to eliminate areas of dryness, whilst leaving the body enviably smooth. The hydrator also boasts a fragrant blend of calming Lavender, Ylang Ylang and Moroccan Rose Essential Oils, which lends skin a sweet and floral scent that seeks to boost your mood and soothe the mind.
Expect touchably soft skin, without an unwanted greasy residue.
name: Gorgeous Cow Body Lotion

product_description: Be inspired with the Murad Creating a Healthy Life Book; an uplifting read written by Dr. Howard Murad. Containing Murad’s insights and art, the book was written to help people discover their passion in life. The content boasts personal insights and artistic talents, which show the reader how to live, look and feel better. Be inspired and discover your passion for living.
name: Creating a Healthy Life Book

product_description:
Preen and perfect your eyebrows with the Lilibeth of New York Brow Shaper; a high performance, pain-free hair removal tool to define the brow line without tweezing or waxing.
Suitable for men and women, the easy-to-use, award-winning tool features a durable stainless steel blade that effortlessly and comfortably removes even the shortest hairs, whilst its portable, fold-up design is ideal for grooming on-the-go. Can also be used on the upper lip, chin, bikini line, legs, arms, knuckles and fuzzy facial hair.
Not only great for hair removal, the Brow Shaper delivers dermaplaning benefits; it gently exfoliates the top layer of dead skin cells to allow better absorption of moisturisers and serums, whilst helping make-up to sit more evenly.
name: of New York Brow Shaper - Hot Pink (Set of 2)

product_description: Leighton Denny present the Mint Marvel Balm; a multi-beneficial formula that works to soften and replenish areas of dry skin. Enriched with a moisturising blend of Marula Oil, Vitamin E and Grapeseed Oil, the non-greasy balm hydrates, softens and restores long-lasting comfort. Ideal for nails, cuticles, lips, elbows and knees.
name: Denny Marvel Balm 30ml - Mint

适合所有肤质，Gentlemen's Tonic温和Body Wash提供清洁和促进活力功效，同时可保持肌肤的天然水分平衡。 它含有高含量植物甘油与蜂蜜和小麦提取物，可帮助软化和调理疲惫的肌肤。
Gentlemen's Tonic温和Body Wash使用薄荷醇清爽、焕发、凉爽和除臭肌肤，同时生姜提取物作为强大的抗炎剂，可帮助刺激和激发肌肤表面活力。
该Gentlemen's Tonic系列包括基于植物来源的天然材料，它们来自可持续和可再生资源，为男性肌肤和头发健康而专门配制。

product_description:

Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin. Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Coconut Verbena fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a Coconut Water, Lemon Verbena and Crisp Bamboo aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 14 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin. Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Papaya Yuzu fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a Yazu, Green Papaya and Muguet Petal aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 14 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

The white, snowflake shaped sponge arrives with a useful hanging ribbon for when it is not in use, which can double up as a Christmas ornament. Ideal as a gift or indulgent treat for yourself.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin.  Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Champagne fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a subtle and festive aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 5 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

product_description:
Be mindful of the environment with the Milk & Honey fragranced ‘Spongology™’ Body Wash Infused Body Buffer from Spongellé. Catering to sustainable customers, the Spongology™ buffer is eco-friendly and delivers a subtle aroma to the body.
The multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin. Enriched with a skin-loving formula and an array of organic extracts, the buffer utilises extracts of Milk and Honey. The body wash infused sponge leaves skin touchably soft and smooth and is able to create a creamy, cleansing lather for 20+ showers
name: Spongology Body Wash Infused Body Buffer - Milk & Honey

用于在紧张的一天后放松并恢复活力，由this works提供的这款Deep Sleep沐浴浸泡液是浴盐的绝佳替代品。 拥有丰富配方，瞬间滋润毛孔，同时提供放松治疗效果，让您真正放松下来。

Infuse the hands and body in an aromatic scent using the Infusion Vert Moisture Soap from MÁDARA. Ideal for in the shower or as a hand wash, the formula is designed to cleanse, soften and hydrate the skin, whilst delivering an energising fragrance.
The wash boasts an uplifting and refreshing aroma, capturing the dewy freshness of Northern Meadows. The scent comprises essences of Thyme and Lemon Balm, blended with hues of Horsetail and soothing notes of Violet Flowers. Offering cleansing and moisturising properties, the cleansing formula leaves the hands and body clean, soft and aromatically fragranced.

Cal-Metab Plus 是膳食补品，最适合用在减肥养生法中。

该Cowshed Baby 牛有机产品系列使用温和配方以呵护您的快乐天使，这款全Body霜也不例外。 它不含有害物质，非常适合用于干燥部位，使宝宝的皮肤柔软，光滑。
这款温和而有效的保湿霜含白芒花籽油，适合用于宝宝娇嫩的皮肤，Baby牛有机物全Body霜是您为宝宝作出的最佳选择。 白芒花籽油已知的最稳定的植物油之一，这保证了它的使用安全和长期效果。 Cowshed的植物配方含天然成分，无对羟基苯甲酸酯、石化产品和硫酸盐，适合素食者使用并含有经过认证的有机成分。

Add a touch of sparkle to your bathing routine with the Shimmer Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé; a multi-tasking, multi-use sponge that cleanses, exfoliates and pampers skin all-in-one.

Complete with a delicate floral scent, skin feels polished and revitalised with a radiant glow.

product_description:
Top up your tan with the Gradual Lotion Medium from UTAN and Tone. Ideal for medium to dark skin tones, the lotion is designed to be used to intensify and build on existing real or fake tans until the desired level of colour is achieved.
Enriched with an organic tanner, the silky lotion can be used as a regular body lotion, yet delivers a streak-free, sun-kissed finish. The tan is complete with UTAN and Tone’s Body Sculpting complex, which works to flush toxins from the skin and visibly tone and firm the surface. Skin is left supple and sun-kissed.

Purify and pamper from top to toe with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Body Wash; a lightweight, pH balanced formula infused with mineral-rich Dead Sea Salts to cleanse skin without stripping moisture.
Infused with extracts of Brown Algae and antioxidant-rich Green Seaweed, the luxurious shower gel gently eliminates impurities whilst enveloping the body with a crisp, revitalising fragrance of fresh sea breeze and aquatic notes. Skin is soft, supple and hydrated after use.
name: & Evelyn La Source Body Wash 250ml

product_description:
Ortigia 推出的这款 Fico d'India 护手霜是一款绝佳的手部护理产品，可以轻松放入手提袋，方便出行使用，带给您丝般柔滑、深度滋养的双手。 这款护手霜特别添加了滋润的橄榄油和具有修复功效的羊毛脂，混合了无花果和雪松木的清新香气，质地浓稠，是您呵护双手的必备产品。 - R.H
Ortiga 是一家制作香皂和香薰产品的意大利公司，由 Sue Townsend 于2006年在西西里岛创立。 品牌只采用天然原料，灵感来源于西西里的美学、色彩和芬芳，带给您奢华香皂、香薰、护肤霜、蜡烛和乳液等丰富的产品。
name: Fico d'India 护手霜（75ml）

product_description:
傑克⋅布萊克深層滋潤護手霜 
強效配方，修復肌膚，為疲勞乾燥的雙手補水。質地不油膩，即使最粗糙的干燥肌膚，也可柔化肌膚，同時滋養角質層。植物性提取物還提供抗菌保護。 
 使用說明：每天塗抹雙手，保持滋潤。
name: Black 杰克⋅布莱克深层滋润护手霜 (88ml)

product_description:
Sonic Chic 最新城市电动牙刷 是一款便携式、时尚牙刷。具有结构紧凑、设计轻便等特点。 本款设备配备防护性通风盖，非常适合旅游时携带。 也可在健身房、外出工作间隙使用。
本款超声震动牙刷每分钟可震动 22000 次，其超软刷毛可轻松到达不易刷洗部位，带给您舒适的牙齿清洁体验。 配有一个替换用的刷头及一节电池。
name: Chic城市电动牙刷 （Blue Maze）

product_description: Unwind and de-stress with the AromaWorks Serenity AromaBomb Duo Set. Combining two luxurious bath bombs made from the finest salts and powders, the therapeutic bath bombs blend four pure essential oils with detoxifying Himalayan Sea Salt and calming Calamine to leave you feeling relaxed and at ease. Enjoy a Zen-like bathing experience and let your troubles melt away as the warm, citrus fragrance powered by Lemongrass and Neroli envelops your senses.
name: Serenity AromaBomb Duo Set

product_description:
this works Deep Sleep 身体油可给予极致芳香疗法体验，同时深层滋润和镇静身心，其配方不油腻，易于吸收。 它蕴含天然成分，可纾缓紧张的身体，令您进入宁静的深度睡眠。
这款身体油对高血压、神经紧张和失眠有所帮助，它融合了普罗旺斯Lavender、抗氧化葡萄油和舒缓性甘菊，同时散发出令人宁静的柔和甜美的花香气味。 您会感到水分充足、轻松自在、神采奕奕。 K.D.

product_description:
Spritz on a gorgeous golden glow with the Vani-T Liquid Sun Self Tan Mist. A cult-favourite among celebrities, the ultra-lightweight, plant-based spray tan veils skin with a medium toned, natural looking colour that gradually develops.
Enriched with Marine Collagen and Phytolin™, the anti-ageing formula nourishes and hydrates skin while improving elasticity levels and evening skin tone, ensuring smooth and streak-free results without patches or fading.
An invigorating, aromatic blend of Orange, Lemon and Bergamot Oils cover that typical fake tan smell, plus a luxurious concoction of Argan, Macadamia and Coconut Oils impart moisture and leave skin feeling supple. Ideal for quick, effortless self-tanning and radiant, healthy looking skin.
name: Liquid Sun Self Tan Mist 120ml

product_description: Purify skin with the Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Mimosa Shower Gel. Bursting with a zesty citrus fragrance, the lightweight formula works to sweep away dirt and impurities for skin that feels soft, smooth and clean. An invigorating aroma of earthy Green Tea and Sicilian Lemon mingles with delicate Mimosa flower, transforming your showering experience into a moment of summertime radiance to transport the senses.
name: Arden Green Tea Mimosa Shower Gel 500ml

product_description: FOREO ISSA™逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷刷头 – 炫酷黑采用顶级硅胶材质，不含BPA和邻苯二甲酸盐等有毒化学成分。与Foreo ISSA逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷相配备，刷头可抑制细菌滋生，保持口腔和牙龈的彻底清洁。设计智能并符合人体工学，3D灵活性刷头可以触及口腔内任何缝隙。刷头可使用整整一年，价值持久。– I.M
name: ISSA逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷刷头 – 炫酷黑

product_description:
Foreo ISSA逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷是世界上首个完全由硅胶制作的电动牙刷，是家用清洁美白牙齿的突破性解决方案。只需每天早晚使用2分钟，即可帮您有效清洁牙齿、去除牙渍，同时还可以舒适按摩牙龈，令您牙齿洁白，牙龈更健康，绽放自信笑容。牙刷由柔软、温和的无缝硅胶制成，可抑制细菌滋生，有效去除牙渍，对牙釉质温和不刺激并可预防牙龈萎缩。体积小巧好携带，使用超便捷，Foreo ISSA逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷每次充电后可使用365次，无需充电插座，刷头可使用整整一年。设计智能并符合人体工学，具有流线型的未来感设计，3D灵活性刷头可以触及口腔内任何缝隙。 确保您的口腔和牙龈健康，让您拥有更明亮、更洁白的牙齿，Foreo ISSA逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷可以刺激血液循环，让牙龈更健康，同时防止牙龈疾病。高强度脉动透过硅胶刷头传递，以一种全新方式清洁牙齿，不会像普通牙刷刷毛一样划伤牙齿，其硅胶刷头可产生足够的摩擦力清洁牙齿去除牙渍，而不会损伤牙釉质或刺激牙龈。拥有独特的WhiteTooth™技术，创新科技可刷去牙齿表面污渍，使牙齿瞬间洁白。

  为了让牙齿比珍珠更亮白，Foreo ISSA逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷具有非研磨性硅刷毛和刷头，同时刷头具有双向刷毛，可全面清洁口腔。无缝硅胶设计，提供了比尼龙刷毛更加卫生的解决方案，防止细菌堆积。 牙刷具有8速档位，方便您选择满意的脉动频率。产品振动每30秒暂停一次，提醒您清洁口腔的下一个四分之一区域。2分钟后它会再次暂停，提醒您牙齿护理程序结束。 请注意: 包装内包括USB接口充电器，但是不包括国际转换插头。
name: ISSA逸萨智能电动硅胶牙刷 – 炫酷黑

product_description:
Build an enviable tan with the Ultrasun Tan Activator for Body SPF30; a hydrating, water-resistant sun lotion that protects skin from harmful rays, whilst encouraging an even and golden tan.
Developed with broad spectrum SPF30, the effective sun cream shields the body from UVA and UVB damage, whilst an advanced active ingredients works to stimulate the production of melanin. This activates the tanning process and promotes a healthy glow. The hydrating formula delivers a veil of protective moisture to skin, which restores optimum levels during sun exposure when skin can become particularly dry.
The lightweight lotion effortlessly glides over the body, absorbing quickly without leaving behind an unwanted, greasy residue. Expect to achieve a safe and natural tan.
name: Tan Activator for Body SPF30 150ml

product_description:
Elemis 绿茶 S.O.S 喷雾，这款梦幻般的S.O.S喷雾，使人在夏季非常放松。尤其适用于旅行时使用，同时可治愈蚊虫叮咬、割伤、擦伤，修复疲惫疼痛的双脚！
茶树作为非常有效的天然抗菌剂而出名。 本品含去离子治疗草药水， 采用天然抗菌剂，针对肌肤问题部位进行最简单、最安全的抗菌。

product_description:
首个用于面部和全身的可洗掉美黑化妆品，Fake Bake Faux Glo是一款绝佳产品，它可以让您毫不费力地获得临时的棕褐色肤色以出席某些特殊场合，特别适合那些想要通过便捷方式获得美黑效果的女性。

Fake Bake Faux Glo不含羟基苯甲酸酯，适合所有肤色，是覆盖不规则肤色、使之变成自然和无纹理痕迹的棕褐色的卓越产品。  360度喷嘴产生了所有角度连续不断的喷雾（甚至包括由上至下的喷雾），同时这款超快速干燥气雾剂不会发生颜色转移。 Fake Bake Faux Glo 可以让您皮肤的外观和感觉都棒极了，它真的是达到临时美黑效果的最佳产品。
使用说明：
name: Bake Faux Glo (118ml)

product_description:

敏感注意事项：怀孕期间不建议使用。如果身患某种病症，请在使用前咨询医生。只能成人使用。放在儿童接触不到的地方。可能会出现自然沉淀。存放在箱子内，或 远离光照和热源。开封后，最好在6个月内用完。为避免浴缸表面过于光滑，请在使用后清洁浴缸。

product_description:
NUXE Sun Travel Kit SPF50 2017 combines a facial sunscreen with refreshing after-sun products to help protect and soothe your skin during and after sun exposure.
Contains at least 90.6% of natural origin ingredients.
Fondant Cream for Face SPF 50 (50ml)
A high protection sun lotion for the face. Infused with Sun and Water Flowers, the cream helps protect against premature ageing and has been specially formulated to treat fair skin and delicate areas such as the face and neckline. It melts in quickly and keeps skin safe from harmful UV rays whilst promoting a beautiful tan. Helps limit the appearance of dark spots. Photostable. Alcohol free.
After-Sun Hair & Body Shampoo (50ml)
A multi-tasking formula that gently lifts away residues that can accumulate after a day in the sun, such as UV filters, salt, chlorine and sand. Performing a refreshing cleanse on skin and hair, it contains Sun and Water Flowers, and expertly removes impurities to leave skin feeling fresh and revitalised, and hair soft and supple. Infused with an exotic fragrance.
Refreshing After-Sun Lotion (50ml)
A soothing aftersun formula for the face and body. Instantly refreshing on application, the Sun and Water Flower-infused formula helps to hydrate skin and prolong your hard earned tan. Its fresh texture leaves skin feeling relieved and comfortable. Enriched with an exotic Sweet Orange, Tahitian Gardenia and Vanilla fragrance. Suitable for all skin types.

product_description:
利用来自DS Laboratories的Nirena Premium女性Cleanser护理您身体的敏感部位，这款温和、有机凝胶清洗液专为维持最佳女性卫生和健康的阴道环境而设计。
阴道是不受肌肤保护的特殊粘膜，因此它需要专门清洗。 这款速效、高效的私密卫生凝胶不含任何可能打乱敏感部位酸碱平衡的刺激性化学物质或清洁剂，实际上它凭借多种独有化合物保持3.8- 4.2的天然阴道pH值。 与肥皂不同，它冲洗时没有可能引起干燥的残留物，可进行有效舒缓和滋润，令敏感组织柔软而光滑。
每批次产品均经仔细测试，以保护阴道菌群的完整性，它含有高纯度成分和已被证明能够提供抗菌、抗真菌和抗炎的专有天然化合物，可帮助防止感染引起的瘙痒、异味和溢液。

product_description:
MGO™ 30+ Manuka Honey Blend is derived from Leptospermum Scoparium, a plant unique to New Zealand; its flowers are powerfully fragrant and full of nectar which attributes Manuka Honey with its rich, dark and full-bodied flavour.
MGO™ 30+ Manuka Honey is certified to contain a minimum of 30mg/kg methylgyoxal. Methylgyoxal is a naturally occurring compound in Manuka Honey that lends the substance its remarkable and unique properties. No other system of measurement gives such a clear and simple indication; the higher the MGO™ rating, the higher the Methylglyoxal content.
All of our MGO™ Manuka Honey products are scientifically tested and verified to ensure you are getting consistent quality. Every batch is subjected to laboratory tests that measure various quality parameters including Dietary Methylglyoxal content. Great care is taken to ensure that the Methylglyoxal is maintained from the bee-hive to the finished product so you do not lose any of the valuable properties of this remarkable honey.
name: 30+ Manuka Honey Blend

product_description:

这款修复精华研发的初衷是实现不用打针就能将药物传送到肌肤内部，它配备有像一张纸那么薄的电池，能够产生被称为"微电流"的电动力。 与高级修复精华（将其涂抹在眼部）配对后，微电流能够专业地将精华液中的抗衰老活性成分（其中包括：30% 的透明质酸、神经肽和维他命 C）通过毛孔、汗腺和毛囊"注入"肌肤，能够瞬间吸收，功效持久；具有淡化皱纹的作用，能够消除下垂和浮肿。
眼膜和精华液协同收缩肌肤，与此同时丰盈肌肤，并为肌肤补充水分。 使用后，会使肌肤看起来更加紧致、亮泽。
‘仅护理 1 次，就会让一些女士年轻 10 岁。 进行 4 次护理后，护理部位的所有衰老迹象将会显著消失，其抗衰老功效将会让您受益终生。
可用于眼周围或鼻子和嘴部区域。
包括：
4 对微电流眼膜护理套装。
高级修复精华 8ml。

product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the 100% Pure Deluxe Travel Pack Duo, a pair of 100% naturally sustainable sponges delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water. Presented in a soft travel bag with a mesh drying pouch included, you can sail through airport security with these in your hand luggage and keep refreshed and cleansed throughout your travels.
Suitable for all skin types, the innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; eliminating impurities and stimulating blood flow and cell renewal. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the sponges are suitable for use with or without a cleanser. Simply add water and experience an all-natural, rejuvenating cleanse that will leave skin feeling smooth, hydrated and restored.
The Duo Contains:
1 x Facial Puff Sponge
1 x 6 Wave Bath Sponge

product_description:
Treat hard-working hands to the Hand Cream Ribbon Box from Weleda. Combining three of the brand's favourite formulas, the collection works to soften, nourish and subtly fragrance hands without leaving them greasy or sticky. Presented in a gift box.
Sea Buckthorn Hand Cream (50ml)
A vitamin-rich hand cream that works to give rough, dry hands a boost in moisture. Enriched with a nourishing blend of sea buckthorn and sesame oils, the non-greasy formula repairs damaged skin and restores soft, supple smooth hands. Delivers a long-lasting fruity fragrance to uplift the skin and senses.
Pomegranate Regenerating Hand Cream (50ml)
Harnessing the powers of organic shea butter (rich in fatty acids), the lightweight formula replenishes and conditions skin, whilst natural plant extracts restore supple, youthful-looking hands. Combats dryness and roughness to leave hands soft, smooth and deeply restored.
Almond Sensitive Skin Hand Cream (50ml)
With a skin-renewing formula, the replenishing hand cream transforms dry, cracked and rough skin to leave it feeling silky soft. Fortified with organic almond oil to protect against moisture loss and environmental aggressors, you can expect supple, comfortable hands with a delicate fragrance.
name: Hand Cream Ribbon Box (Worth £24.95)

product_description:
这款Seascape Island ApothecaryLes Petits 泡泡沐浴露拥有创新独特的配方，可以温和地滋养和滋润肌肤，赋予您最放松、最愉快的沐浴体验。 这款泡泡沐浴露会产生甜美的泡沫，因而这种泡沫浴很温和，可以日常进行，是敏感性肌肤的理想用品。
它富含泽西Honey，具有保护和滋润功效，蕴含的洋甘菊和Lavender 精油可令身心深度放松，您的肌肤摸起来会如丝般光滑。 它不含苯甲酸酯类、硅树脂和石油。 K.D.
name: Island Apothecary Les Petits 泡泡沐浴露(300ml)

product_description: Treat acne prone skin with the Manuka Health MGO 600+ ManukaClear Intensive Clear Gel. The breakthrough formula is developed to smooth skin texture and maintain visibly healthier skin. The gel does not contain water but instead has a base of MGO™ 600+ Manuka Honey with incredibly high levels of methylglyoxal. The natural formula works to restore a visibly healthy complexion and is ideal for sensitive, trouble prone skin.
name: Health MGO 600+ ManukaClear Intensive Clear Gel 30ml

product_description:
使用 Crabtree & Evelyn 石榴坚果葡萄籽身体磨砂膏，温和地去除死皮和暗沉的皮肤细胞，展露健康亮泽的肌肤。
Crabtree & Evelyn 石榴坚果葡萄籽身体磨砂膏特别添加了向日葵蜡球，能有效去除角质，显露光滑的肌肤。 除此之外，还混合了具有滋润嫩肤效果的石榴、向日葵、荷荷巴油、南瓜和芝麻油精华；以及蕴含丰富抗氧化剂的葡萄籽提取物，以调节肌肤。
使用说明：
name: & Evelyn 石榴 坚果 葡萄籽身体磨砂膏（175G）

product_description: Udo's Choice Super 5 Microbiotics provide easy-to-consume raspberry flavoured lozenges containing  5 specific strains of ‘friendly’ bacteria (probiotic) to support the immune system functionality and encourage proper digestion. Microbiotics are the beneficial lacto and bifido bacteria that occur throughout the digestive tract and are essential in replenishing healthy gut flora, which helps to reduce gas, bloating and constipation.
name: Choice Super 5 Microbiotics - 60 Lozenges

product_description:
Renew your skin with this Advanced Ultra-Rejuvenating Body Wash from Dr Botanicals; a sulfate-free daily cleansing wash. With a rich, luxurious texture, the body cream leaves the skin ultra-hydrated and silky soft.
The body wash is enriched with a range of botanical extracts including: Green Tea, which contains Tannins that have anti-microbial, anti-inflammatory and radical scavenging characteristics for healthy, refreshed skin; Grapefruit Oil, which has gentle antiseptic and toning properties; and Rosemary Oil, which helps to increase circulation. – E.W.
name: Botanicals Advanced Ultra-Rejuvenating Body Wash (200ml)

product_description:
泰勒老德街泰勒先生爽身粉(100g) 是一款豪華型產品，專門用於容易出現乾燥疼痛的部位，產品帶有一種清新的香辛味道，適合每天使用。 
這款男士爽身粉混合了龍嵩、薰衣草和熏香以及綠色白松香和柑橘香味，產品也特別適用於產生擦熱感的部位。 - ED
name: of Old Bond Street 泰勒老德街泰勒先生爽身粉 (100g)

product_description:
来自 Australian Bodycare 的温和沐浴乳可温和洁净肌肤，去除污垢和杂质，获得更亮丽肤色。 利用以抗菌性能而著称的茶树油特别配制，获得干净和健康肌肤。 适合所有肌肤类型，包括油性、混合性及干性肌肤。 方便的抽吸瓶允许方便可快捷地使用产品。 E.N. 
使用指南： 抽出少量产品至手上，敷在脸上，然后用温水冲洗干净。 早晨和晚上使用。
name: Bodycare温和沐浴乳（250ml）

product_description:
Filorga present the Hand-Absolute Cream; a rejuvenating, anti-ageing hand and nail cream that works to repair damaged hands and nourish weak, brittle nails.
Harnessing the powers of Shea and Cocoa Butters, the regenerating, creamy formula absorbs quickly into skin to nourish and protect, whilst clarifying Sea Lily Extract combats dark spots and uneven tone without greasy residue. Infused with a blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Collagen, you can expect smooth, firm and youthful-looking hands and stronger, shinier nails.
name: Hand-Absolute Cream 50ml

product_description: Pamper dry hands with the Elizabeth Arden White Tea Hand Cream. Rich and creamy, the softening formula quickly absorbs into skin to help alleviate rough patches and callouses, while imbuing a tranquil scent that evokes a sense of familiarity and calm. Containing delicate accords of White Tea, Turkish Rose and Italian Mandarin, it seeks to sooth both the skin and senses.
name: Arden White Tea Hand Cream 30ml

product_description:
使用 Triumph & Disaster YLF Body Wash获得一站式清洁体验，一款多用途配方，可用来清洁从头到脚的肌肤；适合快节奏的生活方式。
一个极致的多面手，这款清洁乳可用于洁肤、剃须和洗发；其营养丰富的配方采用滋补坚果油、抗菌紫檀木和有愈合作用的卡瓦卡瓦叶提取物，在温和清洁的同时滋润和保护肌肤。
清除灰尘和污垢，同时维持肌肤的天然水分含量，这款沐浴露使肌肤和头发获得均衡、滋润并散发使人振奋且略带清香的药物香味。
name: & Disaster YLF Body 沐浴露 500ml

product_description:
利用 Green People的中性/ Scent Free Deodorant 护理您的身体，这是一款针对敏感肌肤的天然、无香料滚珠体香剂。
不含毛孔堵塞和刺激性成分，该89％有机组成配方利用益生元，支持肌肤的有益菌群，利用植物活性物质如芦荟和向日葵舒缓肌肤，利用明矾抑制细菌生长。 保持卫生的同时不妨碍关键的排汗过程，体香剂会让您感觉清新、舒适，为新的一天做好准备。 - K.N.
name: People中性/ Scent Free Deodorant（75ml）

product_description: 蒟蒻6波浪身體海綿（純蒟蒻） 本品專門溫和剝落身體死皮，舒緩和清潔所有肌膚！溫和去除角質，使死皮細胞自然脫落，幫助去除污垢和內生毛髮，保持肌膚處於最佳狀態。用後肌膚將感覺順滑柔軟。不緊繃，不干燥。 蒟蒻因其有益健康的特點而著稱，在日本已有超過1500 年的使用歷史，在六世紀最初被當作一種藥材使用，對肌膚具有多種好處- 脂類、鈉、鉀、鎂、鐵、磷、銅、信、維生素A、維生素E、維生素D、維生素B1、維生素B2、維生素B6、維生素B12、維生素C、泛酸鹽、菸酸、脂肪酸、葉酸和纖維。 使用海綿後，務必將海綿放在兩手之間擠乾水分（千萬不要擰！）然後放在通風良好的地方使其乾燥（或存放在冰箱裡！）千萬不要將海綿放在潮濕的地方，如淋浴間！放置海綿的環境越清爽乾燥，海綿就越持久！每隔幾個月更換一次海綿，或者當海綿開始斷裂時更換！  • 100% 天然海綿 • 溫和去角質 • 100% 無色素 • 100% 無添加劑 • 100% 可生物降解 • 天然可持續 • 環保
name: 6 波浪身体海绵（纯蒟蒻）

product_description: Unwind and de-stress with the AromaWorks Serenity AromaBomb. Made from the finest salts and powders, the therapeutic bath bomb blends four pure essential oils with detoxifying Himalayan Sea Salt and calming Calamine to leave you feeling relaxed and at ease. Enjoy a Zen-like bathing experience and let your troubles melt away as the warm, citrus fragrance powered by Lemongrass and Neroli envelops your senses.
name: Single Serenity AromaBomb

product_description:
Kneipp 欢愉时刻 Body Wash唤醒并活化肌肤；它是一款无皂、pH值平衡的配方，使机体从头到脚清爽。
该沐浴露中注入百香果和柚子油的天然精华油，可温和地去除污垢和杂质而不会导致过度干燥或肌肤紧绷，而恢复元气的香味使您神清气爽，让您在每次使用后感觉重新焕发活力。
name: Wash（200毫ml）

product_description:
使用Kneipp's Pure Bliss s红罂粟和大麻 Body Wash抚慰和舒缓肌肤；它拥有无皂、pH值平衡的配方，可以平静和放松身心。
内含红罂粟籽、大麻、甜杏仁和佛手柑的天然油脂，这款沐浴露温和地去除污垢，不会导致肌肤过度干燥或有不舒服感觉，同时其豪华的香氛会减轻日常生活的压力和紧张。 身体变得柔软，有弹性并全面恢复精力。
name: Pure Bliss红罂粟和大麻Body Wash （200ml）

product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Weleda Heroes Ribbon Box; four of the brand's best-selling skincare treats that work to cleanse, hydrate and condition the hands and body. Presented in a gift box.
Citrus Creamy Body Wash (200ml)
An invigorating shower cream packed with essential oils of Lemon and Orange to stimulate the body and senses. For a truly awakening experience, the body wash is ideal for use in the morning or to regenerate after a hard day at work. Infused with Organic Sesame Oil, an ingredient rich in Vitamin E to deliver antioxidant protection against environmental aggressors.
Skin Food (75ml)
A replenishing, skin-repairing cream developed to combat dry, flaky skin in need of extra care. Ideal for use on the entire body, including hands, feet and elbows, its powerful formula is infused with Organic Sunflower Seed Oil and extracts of Wild Pansy, Chamomile and Rosemary to energise tired skin, leaving you feeling refreshed and revitalised. Deeply nourishing and protecting, the hydrating treatment shields against environmental aggressors to leave skin touchably soft and comfortable.
Sea Buckthorn Replenishing Body Lotion (200ml)
A rich, rejuvenating formula that absorbs quickly into skin to nourish and hydrate without greasy residue. Harnessing the powers of Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil, Mallow Extract and Shea Butter, the lightweight lotion softens and conditions, whilst enveloping the body with a fresh, fruity fragrance from top to toe.
Almond Sensitive Skin Hand Cream (50ml)
With a skin-renewing formula, the replenishing hand cream transforms dry, cracked and rough skin to leave it feeling silky soft. Fortified with Organic Almond Oil to protect against moisture loss and environmental aggressors, you can expect supple, comfortable hands with a delicate fragrance.
name: Heroes Ribbon Box (Worth £35)

product_description: ila-spa 活力能量身体护肤霜（200g）将平衡肌肤，使其恢复活力，水润健康。 富含脂肪酸、植物甾醇和欧米茄成分，具有强大的抗衰老、抗氧化功效，保护肌肤，呈现年轻态。 这款滋润霜质地轻盈不油腻，还特别混合了摩洛哥坚果油、乳木果油和纯精油。 - L.M.
name: 活力能量身体护肤霜 200g

product_description:
Compagnie de Provence's 'My Beautiful Hand Kit' combines a luxurious liquid soap with a lightweight hand cream to transform wanting skin.
Cotton Flower Liquid Soap (300ml):
A luxurious soap dedicated to gently cleansing the hands and body. Crafted from vegetable oil in a cauldron according to authentic traditions, the delicate formula contains naturally foaming Coconut Oil and is free from colouring agents, animal fats and synthetic surfactants. Its fragrance, created in Grasse (the perfume capital of the world) is delicate and powdery, powered by Cotton Flower and White Musk. Housed in an unbreakable plastic bottle. Refillable with a pump dispenser. No added parabens, silicones, mineral oils, or sulphates. Dermatologist tested.
Cotton Flower Hand Cream (300ml):
A lightweight hand cream infused with Shea Butter and Almond Oil to leave hardworking hands feeling soft, moisturised and comfortable. Melting effortlessly into skin, the antioxidant-rich cream ensures hands are left protected, supple, hydrated and delicately scented with Cotton Flower and White Musk.
name: de Provence My Beautiful Hand Kit: Cotton Flower Liquid Soap and Hand Cream 300ml

product_description:
Oskia 復興護手霜是一款奢華護手霜，帶甘菊和玫瑰香味，可軟化、舒緩和滋潤雙手。為雙手補水，對抗干燥和老年斑。 -SA 
 “我們相信，美麗肌膚的秘訣不僅依賴於護膚用品，還依賴於所攝取的食物。所以，OSKIA 產品經過專業營養設計，致力於從內到外改善肌膚” - OSKIA
name: 复兴护手霜

product_description:
Westlab  Relax死海盐浴液，使人轻松入眠。它是英国领先的浴盐专家。 带给您治疗性沐浴体验，内含独特的纯精油混合物和该品牌的标志性盐，可舒缓身心。
这款特级海盐浴液内含死海盐和助眠成分如：乳香、苦橙叶、天竺葵、橙子等。使肌肤重新平衡、恢复活力，同时放松神经系统，使人得到充分休息。 散发出使人平静的香味，助您快速入眠。 E.N.
name: Relax死海盐浴液（500g）

product_description:
Centrum Women 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed to support the changing needs of women’s health and wellbeing over the age of 50+, delivering tailored levels of vitamins and minerals for optimum efficacy and benefits.   
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 24 key nutrients with all 13 essential vitamins to support vitality and immunity while contributing to normal vision and heart health.  
Adjusted amounts of Iron and Vitamin D support changes in energy levels and environmental reactions over time, with Vitamin B6 helping to regulate hormonal activity post-menopause.  
B Vitamins help to release food-based energy for an overall boost, plus Vitamin C, Zinc, Copper and Selenium work in tandem to support the immune system. High levels of Calcium and Vitamin D maintain strong bones. Age gracefully with this daily food supplement that provides all the resources you need to keep you feeling in your prime.
name: Women 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets - (30 Tablets)

product_description:
Nourish your baby’s delicate skin with the Bébé Wild Moss Rose Body Lotion from Chantecaille; a plant-based, certified organic treatment that softens and smoothes without causing irritation.
Dermatologically tested and free from harmful chemicals, the ultra-mild formula is based upon Wild Moss Rose extract, with its gentle moisturising properties and proven ability to minimise the look of redness and alleviate itchiness.
A soothing blend of Orange Blossom, Roman Chamomile and Corn Flower Waters help refresh and calm, while Tamanu Oil is rich in essential lipids to restore hydration. Gentle enough for all ages.
name: Bébé Wild Moss Rose Body Lotion 120ml

product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Sardinia' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts an invigorating fragrance of Myrtle Nectar, Lentiscus and Helycrisum Shrub to stimulate the senses.
name: Dante Dolce Vivere Sardinia Soap 250g

product_description: Fake Bake 晒黑液，容易清洗，使用后肌肤即时变为青铜色，适合所有肤色，晒黑均匀。 完美即 PH平衡，可保护肌肤天然屏障平稳；内含自然柔滑滋润的有机硅，令肌肤焕发美丽纯粹的光芒。 不油腻、散发香草的清香。
name: Bake完美水洗即时晒黑液（170ml）

product_description:
本品搭配苗條牛套裝使用，提供一整天滋潤，同時增強肌膚，提高彈性。甜橙、葡萄、依蘭和紅桔的精油可刺激增強和調理肌膚，胡蘿蔔籽油幫助分解毒素。有何效果？擁有令人羨慕的苗條身材。 
 “用苗條牛犒勞自己吧。用它進行按摩，絕對不可能出現大象腿。” - Vogue 美容健身編輯Kelly Gilbert。
name: 苗条牛紧致身体滋润乳 (200ml)

product_description:
这款 Spanish Leather Hair & Body Wash 有 Geo 出品。 F. Trumper 是一款巧妙的产品，专为清理和清洗您的头发和身体而设计，富含令人兴奋的西班牙皮革和天竺薄荷香气。 用这款滋养奢华的产品护理您的头皮和皮肤，享受西班牙皮革香型的温暖芳香。
这款 Trumpers Spanish Leather Hair & Body Wash 可额外滋养皮肤和头皮，快速起泡，滋养皮肤。 西班牙皮革的怡人麝香，有助于舒缓您的感官和皮肤，成为沐浴的完美搭档。
name: Spanish Leather Hair and Body Wash - 100ml 旅行装

product_description:
帮助放松紧张的肩颈，同时放松疲惫的身体。没有一款泡浴治疗能像这款浴液一样含有丰富的活性成分。含有丰富的镁泻盐和山金车，也混合了我们的热门成分V-Tonic™，留兰香，柏树，薰衣草，柑橘和洋甘菊精油有助于缓解压力和焦虑，同时也能给肌肤保湿，木鲁星果棕脂,您的身心都将会得到益处。重要的是，这款产品不含有月桂基醚硫酸钠和月桂基硫酸钠（SLS）。
在流动的热水中倒入一小杯浴液，耐心等候，在放洗澡水的同时，伸展身体，清空思绪。然后踏进你的浴缸，感受重获新生的力量。Liquid Yoga富含大量的镁泻盐，因此记得使用前摇一摇哟。
name: Skincare Liquid Yoga 放松泡澡浴液 (200ml)

product_description:
Experience a luxurious bathing ritual with Balance Me's Super Moisturising Body Wash; a gentle cleansing formula dedicated to clarifying and refreshing from top to toe.
Infused with a skin-softening blend of Benzoin, Yarrow and Shea Butter, the luxurious, ultra-hydrating shower gel effortlessly eliminates impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Combats dry, flaky skin to leave it feeling smooth, supple and deeply moisturised.
name: Me Super Moisurising Body Wash 280ml

product_description:
Discover three uses in one with the Hydrating Gradual Tan Extender from Sunescape. Combining self-tanner, tan extender and moisturiser, the formula allows you to build and prolong a beautiful golden tan. Suitable for all skin tones but ideal for those with fair skin that want to build a tan slowly, the extender allows you to control the depth of tan you achieve.
Enriched with a blend of Coconut, Macadamia nut and Argan oil, the Extender delivers hydration to skin, leaving it rejuvenated.
name: Gradual Tan Extender

product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Knackered Essentials Set from Cowshed. Housed in a floral print wash bag, the collection combines a rejuvenating shower gel, body lotion and lip balm to leave skin soft, smooth and restored.
Knackered Cow Relaxing Bath & Shower Gel (100ml)
Made in England using natural ingredients, the relaxing formula blends calming Lavender and Eucalyptus essential oils to soothe over-worked muscles, whilst cleansing and nourishing skin from top to toe. Can be used as a bath soak to prepare for a restful night's sleep.
Knackered Cow Relaxing Body Lotion (100ml)
A fast-absorbing formula that works to relax the mind and body. Enriched with Shea and Cocoa Butters, the nourishing lotion replenishes moisture and hydration, whilst essential oils of Lavender and Eucalyptus help you to unwind after a long, tiring day. Delivers a fresh, herbaceous fragrance.
Lippy Cow Natural Lip Balm
A naturally nourishing balm that works to soften, hydrate and condition lips for long-lasting comfort. Enriched with Linden Blossom, Rose Geranium and Ylang-Ylang Essential Oils, you can expect smooth, supple lips that are bursting with moisture.
name: Knackered Essentials Set

product_description:
Instantly brighten the smile with the Janina Instant Whitening Spray; a convenient solution that is ideal for on-the-go.
Perfect for travelling, the compact spray can be carried in handbags or gym bags for use anywhere, at any time. The spray effortlessly mists over teeth without the need for water or brushing. Formulated with an array of active ingredients including Papain, the instant spray is able to visibly whiten the smile without the use of harsh abrasives.
Complete with an effective dose of Sodium Chloride, the spray not only brightens teeth, but prevents caries and tooth decay. The spray is sure to become a travel essential, freshening breath and topping up whitening when required.
name: Instant Whitening Spray 20ml

product_description:
Westlab Relax 死海盐身体磨砂膏 ，可轻柔地去除肌肤角质。 内含强大的精油混合物，包括：使人放松的乳香、安神的薰衣草、舒缓性天竺葵、提神的佛手钳等。特级配方，可轻松去除死皮细胞及暗沉细胞，展示健康光滑的肌肤。
内含杏、米糠、抗氧化剂维生素E等成分，用以提高肌肤弹性、保护修复肌肤、对抗肌肤炎症、软化肌肤、使肌肤得到再生。 散发提神醒脑的香味，使人充满活力，肌肤得到深层清洁。 E.N.
name: Relax 死海盐身体磨砂膏

product_description:
Organic Surge 丁香、香橙和天竺葵泡沫沐浴露（250ml）将带给您舒缓放松的清洁体验，这款令人神清气爽的沐浴露能够让您放松身心，同时让肌肤变得柔嫩，恢复活力。
特别添加了具有镇静作用的天然广藿香和辣丁香苞精油，这款芬芳的泡沫沐浴露为您的肌肤提供专家级的滋润和保湿。 混合了具有舒缓功效的芦荟和锁水功能的甘油，确保肌肤滋润有营养，长效锁水，清爽舒适。 沐浴露带有淡淡的自然清香。

product_description: 使用 MICRO Pedi 磨砂头替换滚轮（粉色）轻松去除脚上的死皮硬茧。 美容专业人士的选择，这款磨砂滚轮将带给您柔嫩光滑的双脚。 -SA
