Initially formulated as part of a luxurious spa treatment at the Bulgari Hotel, the oil contains a specific selection of essential oils that are renowned for healing properties both physically and mentally.
Seeking to eliminate toxins and balance nervous tension, the aromatic blend opens with citrus and floral notes of Bergamot, Lavender and Lime, with refreshing hints of Spearmint and soothing Sandalwood. Settling upon a base of Evening Primrose and Jojoba, it helps heal irritated tissue and promote a more positive and serene mood.

product_description:
MGO™ 100+ Manuka Honey Blend is derived from Leptospermum Scoparium, a plant unique to New Zealand; its flowers are powerfully fragrant and full of nectar which attributes Manuka Honey with its rich, dark and full-bodied flavour.
MGO™ 100+ Manuka Honey is certified to contain a minimum of 100mg/kg methylgyoxal. Methylgyoxal is a naturally occurring compound in Manuka Honey that lends the substance its remarkable and unique properties. No other system of measurement gives such a clear and simple indication; the higher the MGO™ rating, the higher the Methylglyoxal content.
All of our MGO™ Manuka Honey products are scientifically tested and verified to ensure you are getting consistent quality. Every batch is subjected to laboratory tests that measure various quality parameters including Dietary Methylglyoxal content. Great care is taken to ensure that the Methylglyoxal is maintained from the bee-hive to the finished product so you do not lose any of the valuable properties of this remarkable honey.
name: 100+ Pure Manuka Honey Blend

product_description:

The innovative buffer is infused with Quince Blossom fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a subtle yet zesty floral aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 5 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

Skin feels sumptuously soft and moisturised.
Ultimate Care Body Lotion (170g)
Treat extremely dry skin to the Ultimate Care Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing, ultra-moisturising formula that works to nourish and hydrate from top to toe. Harnessing the powers of Baobab Oil and nutrient-rich Pumpkin Seed, the lightweight lotion softens and conditions skin, whilst delivering a refreshing fragrance of Green Tea Extract. Expect smooth, supple and comfortable skin after use.
Beeswax Lip Balm with Vitamin E & Peppermint (4.25g)
Nourish and condition sore, cracked lips with this indulgent natural lip balm, bursting with Coconut and Sunflower Oils as well as essential fatty acids and vitamins. Whilst Beeswax seals in hydration, extract of Peppermint adds a refreshing tingle. Expect a softened and hydrated pout with this best-selling balm.
Tinted Lip Balm - Hibiscus (4.25g)
Moisturise whilst leaving a sheer tint on lips with the Burt's Bees Tinted Lip Balm. Formulated with popular nourishing ingredients such as shea butter, olive and coconut oils, it is made up from 100% natural ingredients. The tinted lip balm softens lips whilst leaving a pop of sheer colour and a soothing sweet taste.
Facial Towelettes with White Tea (30 Pack)
With natural cloth from FSC certified wood cellulose, the face wipes gently remove excess oil, dirt and make-up to leave skin refreshed and purified. Specially formulated with antioxidant white tea to protect skin from environmental aggressors and minimise damage caused by free radicals. A combination of botanical extracts, including cucumber and aloe leaf juice soothe and calm skin.
name: Bees Mama Bee Gift Collection

product_description:
Indulge your hands with the Nurture Hand Wash from AromaWorks. The wash is designed to cleanse the hands without depriving them of essential moisture which can lead to dry skin and even irritation.
Enriched with a blend of Aloe Vera, Castor Seed Oil and Roman Camomile, the luxurious hand wash cleanses whilst delivering moisture to the skin, providing a soothing feel. The wash also boasts the ability to visibly reduce any discolouration, psoriasis and eczema due to May Chang, Bergamot and Rose Geranium. Hands are left clean, refreshed and ultra-smooth.
name: Nurture Hand Wash 200ml

product_description:
Polish and perfect skin with the REN Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Salt Anti-Fatigue Exfoliating Body Scrub; a luxurious body balm that works to smooth the skin.
Effortlessly massaging over the body, the Sea Salt infused scrub simultaneously sloughs away dead skin cells, promotes cell renewal and activates microcirculation, which in turn can relieve feelings of muscle fatigue. A hydrating blend of Atlantic Kelp Extract and Microalgae Oil helps to replenish comfortable moisture levels, whilst infusing skin with essential minerals.
Finished with a signature dose of REN’s anti-fatigue essential oil blend, the anti-fatigue exfoliator not only polishes and pampers skin, but has stress-alleviating effect on the mind. Expect a silky smooth body with skin boasting a healthy glow.
name: Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Salt Anti-Fatigue Exfoliating Body Scrub 150ml

product_description: Dr. Hauschka的玫瑰滋养润肤霜是一款可快速吸收的调和保湿霜，旨在抚慰、滋养和保护全身肌肤。 加入玫瑰精油和玫瑰蜡，深入滋润肌肤，防止干燥，同时有机牛油果脂、杏仁油、荷荷巴油的混合物可令肌肤变得柔软嫩滑。 提供玫瑰的幽香，支持肌肤的天然屏障功能，全身恢复轻松舒适、如丝般柔滑的肌肤。 E.N.
name: Hauschka玫瑰滋养润肤霜（145ml）

product_description:
FOREO舌头清洁附件头"薰衣草"适用于任何ISSA™设备，为每日口腔卫生护理提供最后点睛之笔。
使用多孔硅制作并设计成弧形，以适应您的舌头形状，舌头清洁器提供深入而温和的洁净，以非磨蚀方式消除细菌。  
帮助您实现健康口腔和超清新口气，该附件头可抵御细菌的积聚，而且每年只需要更换一次。 它的灵活性可以防止使用过程中压力过大，其创新设计具有抑制"作呕"的效果。
name: ISSA™Lavender舌头清洁附件头

product_description:
使用本款奢華雅容瑪香薰之家再生玫瑰沐浴乳呵護肌膚。泡沫豐富，溫和清潔身體，使肌膚亮澤，如絲般柔滑。玫瑰因其對肌膚的美容效果而聞名。 
 Aromatherapy Associates 雅容瑪香薰之家再生玫瑰沐浴乳適合正常肌膚，含玫瑰、羅馬洋甘菊、檀香和蘆薈汁，使肌膚柔滑。 
使用說明： 
 Lookfantastic 說明： 只限成人使用，放在兒童接觸不到的位置打開之後，最好在6 個月內使用
name: Associates 雅容玛香薰之家再生玫瑰沐浴乳 (200ml)

product_description:
Weleda Pomegranate乳霜Body Wash清洁滋润身体，令您焕发活力并获得柔软肌肤。 加入纯精华油，以刺激感官，这款奢华沐浴露将为您的身心带来平衡。
使用印蒿檀香及橙花纯精油的微妙混合，Weleda Pomegranate乳霜Body Wash温和滋润肌肤，令肌肤焕发活力，清爽舒适。 环保和pH值平衡，让Weleda能够呵护您的肌肤，令肌肤光滑、清爽。
使用说明：
name: Pomegranate乳霜Body Wash（200ml）

product_description: Look after Baby’s skin with Baby’s Nurturing Moisturising Cream from Jurlique. The formula is both gentle and non-greasy, designed for delicate and sensitive skin, perfect for babies. The plant based formula is enriched with naturally derived moisturising botanical oils that work to gently hydrate skin, leaving it smooth and calmed.
name: Baby's Nurturing Moisturising Cream 100ml

product_description:
Treat skin to ultimate nourishment with the REN Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Microalgae Anti-Fatigue Bath Oil; a luxurious formula that refreshes skin, whilst encouraging relaxation.
Simply add a small amount to a full bath, then lay back, take a deep breath and relax. The silky oil is enriched with Atlantic Kelp Extract, which ensures skin is comfortably hydrated and ultra-smooth, whilst a blend of Plankton Extract and Microalgae Oil energises the body. Cell renewal is encouraged and stress damage is reduced.
Finished with a signature dose of REN’s anti-fatigue essential oil blend, the anti-fatigue bath oil not only hydrates and pampers skin, but has stress-alleviating effect on the mind.
name: Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Microalgae Anti-Fatigue Bath Oil 110ml

product_description:
Garnier 终极滋润修复黄油，对肌肤实施全套修复护理过程。 这款身体乳液质地浓稠，成分众多，包括：乳木果添加剂和多种补充剂。适用于为肌肤补充水分、使肌肤更快焕发活力，得到修复。
其修复性尤其适用于需要修复的肌肤，使其含水量充足、富有弹性、柔软细嫩。 C.R
name: Body 终极滋润修复黄油 (200ml)

product_description: Developed by internationally renowned footballer, Zlatan Ibrahimović, the Zlatan Deodorant Stick delivers long-lasting protection against perspiration and body odours. Gliding on effortlessly for ultimate freshness, the fast-drying, alcohol-free formula infuses skin with a masculine scent of juicy Bergamot, spicy Pepper and freshly cut Grass, enhanced by Marine accords, Driftwood and striking Leather.
name: Ibrahimovic Zlatan Deodorant Stick 75ml

product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn瑰柏翠黃金紅橘完美組合沐浴露和潤膚乳 
本產品是對經典香氛的現代演繹，其靈感來自歐洲人對柑橘古龍水的情有獨鍾，柑橘古龍水釋放的怡人香氛絲絲縈繞，從頭到腳，香味滿屋。加入桉樹和鼠尾草精華，增添明亮的草本元素，帶來當代氣息。柑橘與多葉綠色草本植物的混合物帶來一絲森林的清新之感，而少許雪松和廣藿香葉則為感官帶來熱情草本水果的享受。從而產生人見人愛、乾淨活力的香味，令肌膚散發淡淡清香，令人興奮、感覺健康。 
 Crabtree & Evelyn瑰柏翠黃金紅橘完美組合沐浴露和潤膚乳(250ml) -溫和滋養、喚醒和調節肌膚，並深層潔淨肌膚。最適合倒入流動的溫水，以便您享受清爽怡人的泡泡浴，或均勻塗抹到濕潤的肌膚上，輕揉至出現散發怡人香氛的泡沫。
name: & Evelyn 瑰柏翠黄金红橘完美组合沐浴露和润肤乳 (250ml)

product_description: Sambucol免疫之王糖浆是一种保健品，有助于提高免疫系统。 本品含活性成分AntiVirin®、超强维生素C、锌和抗氧化物质，有助于增强身体天然的抵抗系统。 本品为黑色，具有香浓的接骨木风味，不含昏睡成分，无酒精和谷蛋白。 适合3岁以上人群。 - L.M.

Mio Skincare 肌肉舒缓滚珠有助于帮助缓解紧张的肌肉结;帮助背部以及肩颈肌肉重获能量与活力！我们提升了完美健身系列产品的成分，同时使用了滚珠帮助你更好的针对性放松，温柔的按摩帮助缓解肌肉结。
含有 V-Tonic™ 和山金车富马尾，石榴和乳香提取物的混合物，帮助激活肌肉更有活力的同时镇定酸痛的肌肉。让你在健身的路上更轻松的实现不可思议的身材，只用放到健身包里既可以帮助瑜伽或健身后远离疼痛。
在双腿、脖颈、肩部、手臂以及任何肌肉酸痛的部位滚动滚珠帮助缓解紧张以及酸痛。
在肌肉紧张的部位画圈式滚动滚珠头按摩肌肉帮助迅速镇定肌肉缓解酸痛。如果你有特别酸痛的部位，可以稍稍用力的按压滚动滚珠帮助更大程度的按摩和缓解酸痛。
友情提示：这款产品旨在提供镇定效果后达到温和温暖的感受。如果产生过度刺激，我们建议您立即停止使用，并与您的医生咨询，遵循医嘱恰当使用。请不要使用在破损的皮肤、面部、眼睛以及敏感区域，只使用在小范围，有针对性的领域-用量小效果强！涂抹后请勿立即覆盖皮肤表面，请留一些时间让成分被充分吸收。
name: Skincare 肌肉舒缓滚珠 （30ml）

product_description:
艾麗美骨膠原頸部及胸部提升緊緻精華是一款革命性的抗老產品，有效減輕肌膚紋路，提高肌膚緊實度，強化肌膚彈力. 
這款緊緻精華是對抗頸部與胸部肌膚鬆弛與衰老的秘密武器，使肌膚重迴光滑，緊緻的年輕狀態。粉糰扇藻，沙棘，蜂王漿，蜂膠與歐洲聖彼得草和半日花的芳香水劑相融合，對抗老起到了極為重要協同作用。 2004年通過獨立臨床試驗。
name: 艾丽美骨胶原颈部及胸部提升紧致精华50ml

product_description: 来自Australian Bodycare的Body Lotion是一款温和抗菌、滋润肌肤的产品。 利用茶树油专门配制，这款轻质乳液提供滋养成分，可恢复干燥肌肤，保持肌肤的天然水分含量。 使用方便的抽吸瓶允许轻松涂抹，该乳液可迅速被肌肤吸收，所以您将获得 柔软水嫩的舒适肌肤，效果可持续数小时 。 E.N.  使用指南： 使用双手的手掌涂抹于肌肤上并打圈按摩。
name: Bodycare Body Lotion (250ml)

product_description:
Get into the festive spirit with the Peppermint fragranced Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé. The white, snowflake shaped sponge arrives with a useful hanging ribbon for when it is not in use, which can double up as a Christmas ornament. Ideal as a gift or indulgent treat for yourself.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin.  Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Peppermint fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a refreshing, mint aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 5 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.
name: Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer - Peppermint

product_description:
幫助乾燥，疲倦，粗糙的雙手重新恢復活力。 茱莉蔻柑橘護手霜 ;質地是滋潤卻不油膩的乳液，有助於修復手部肌膚，使其柔軟光滑，伴有清新提神的柑 ​​橘香味。 
深層滋養手部肌膚，這款易吸收的手霜含有杏仁油與紅花籽油， 能夠有效鎮靜肌膚，維持手部肌膚的長效保濕。 
含有天然抗氧化成分與植物鹽基成份，有助於保護雙手免受環境因素損害，使手部肌膚保持年輕，絲滑。包裝在品牌專用的盒子中，適合送給自己或你愛的人。 EN
name: 茱莉蔻柑橘护手霜（125ml）

product_description:
Instantly energise skin with the Cowshed Wild Cow Invigorating Body Lotion; an invigorating moisturiser that eliminates dry skin, whilst enveloping the body in a delicate fragrance.
Enriched with a skin-loving blend of premium Shea and Cocoa Butters, the body lotion delivers long-lasting moisture, which leaves the body enviably smooth and silky. The hydrator also boasts a boosting blend of Lemongrass, Ginger and Rosemary Essential Oils, which lends skin a light and oriental scent.
Expect touchably soft skin, without an unwanted greasy residue.
name: Wild Cow Invigorating Body Lotion

product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin with the Rejuvenating Rose Indulgence Gift Set from AromaWorks. Combining a luxurious candle, face serum and eye serum, the kit works to reignite a youthful glow, whilst calming and relaxing the senses. Complete with a soft embroidered headband.
Rejuvenate Face Serum Oil (30ml)
A gentle formula infused with essential oils and BioActive ingredients to calm and smoothen the appearance of skin. Targeting signs of ageing and loss of elasticity, the serum oil delivers a host of vitamins and antioxidants to help comfort and tone the skin, whilst reducing visible signs of ageing. Infused with an aromatic fragrance powered by sweet Carrot, Bergamot and floral Rose.
Absolute Eye Serum Oil (20ml)
A fast-absorbing, anti-ageing formula that works to smoothen and moisturise skin. Fortified with BioActive ingredients, the powerful serum works to minimise the appearance of dark circles and wrinkles, whilst Hyaluronic Acid delivers superior hydration to reveal a brighter, more refined eye contour. Imparts a luxurious fragrance blended from Sweet Carrot, Bergamot, Rose and Frankincense to uplift the skin and senses. Can be used as an eye mask for an intense overnight treatment.
'Essential Rose' Candle (10cl)
Infuse an fruity, floral fragrance into your abode with the Essential Rose Candle; expertly crafted from the finest Soy and Beeswax. Blending pure essential oils of Moroccan Rose, Violet Leaf, Mandarin and Patchouli, the luxurious candle creates a cloud of pure tranquillity to relax the mind and body, whilst releasing tension and fatigue.
name: Rejuvenating Rose Indulgence Gift Set

product_description:
An intensive "reactivating" Deodorant Stick, Aramis 24hr High Performance provides continuous long-term odour and wetness protection with an invigorating and masculine scent that gives the wearer a richly sophisticated edge.
Keep wetness and odour at bay with the Aramis 24hr High Performance Deodorant Stick. This long lasting deodorant works as hard as you do, ensuring you remain composed, dry and smelling great throughout the day. Notes of bergamot, cumin and jasmine express confidence and refined character with a distinctive, sensitive style.
Aramis embodies male strength and virility and is one of the few current fragrance lines for men with a strong, recognisably leathery scent boasting rice spices, leather, moss and clove blended with notes of patchouli, amber and musk.
name: Classic 24hr Deodorant Stick 75g

product_description:
The Manuka Health Propolis and MGO 500 Manuka Honey Throat Spray is a powerful combination of Propolis, MGO™400+ Manuka honey and essential oils including Myrrh, Peppermint and Aniseed for instant soothing of the mouth and throat. Alongside soothing sore throats, the spray helps to maintain oral health, boost the immune system and even freshen breath.
Blended with MGO™400+ Manuka Honey, renowned for its unique activity and antibacterial properties, the spray helps to combat a sore throat by halting the growth of Strep bacteria. The spray is also concentrated with Propolis, an ingredient gathered by bees in New Zealand and used to protect their hives against infection. Propolis within the spray works as ‘nature’s antibiotic’ due to the antioxidant and antiseptic properties of bioflavonoids.
name: Health Propolis and MGO 400 Manuka Honey Throat Spray 30ml

product_description:
Achieve a natural-looking, golden tan with the James Read Coconut Melting Tanning Balm Face & Body; a unique formula that effortlessly melts upon contact with skin, developing into an enviable bronzed glow.
Enriched with 100% Organic Coconut Oil and subtle yet effective tanning agents, the rich balm deeply nourishes skin by enveloping the face and body in a veil of moisture. The hydrating formula utilises James Read’s Tantone Technology™, which tailors the tanning result to your natural skin tone in order to deliver the most natural-looking result.
The balm smoothes effortlessly over skin and can be applied in layers in order to build the desired colour and depth of tan. Expect a beautiful bronzed glow to appear gradually and last up to five days.
name: Read Coconut Melting Tanning Balm Face & Body 150ml

product_description: The NEOM Organics Real Luxury Body Scrub will gently slough away dead skin cells, leaving your skin looking smoother and more radiant. Formulated with 97% organic ingredients, the scrub has a sugar base that's infused with safflower oil, jojoba oil and vitamin E to soften and nourish your skin. Meanwhile, the soothing fragrance of lavender, jasmine and Brazilian rosewood will calm and revitalise your senses, leaving you feeling renewed in body and mind. - L.M.
name: Organics Real Luxury Body Scrub

product_description: An intelligent body-contouring solution that helps shift stubborn cellulite, the Body Care Laser Eraser Cellulite Intelligent Solution from Nubo combines artichoke and quinoa extracts with methylxanthines to suppress the activity of fat-storing cells. Whether your cellulite is caused by ageing, weight fluctuation or hormones, this unique combination prevents the future storage of fat while stimulating the body’s innate ability to release existing fat. Boasting a totally detoxifying formula to improve micro-circulation, this treatment also utilises the latest in Thermogenesis technology, helping to tone and tighten the skin, revealing a dimple-free physique. - E.D
name: Laser Eraser Cellulite Intelligent Solution (120ml)

product_description:
Invigorate skin with the Revitalizing Home Spa Scented Water from PUPA; a delicately fragranced, ultra-fine mist that transports the senses with a zingy citrus scent.
Aromatic notes of Orange, Lemon and Yellow Tangerine are expertly layered with Cardamom and Mate Oils to create a positive, effervescently sunny fragrance with an instantly uplifting effect and sense of wellbeing. Extract of Coralline Alga delivers essential amino acids and mineral salts to give skin a boost of energy.
name: Home Spa Scented Water - Revitalizing 150ml

product_description: Pointer Swiss Cross Rubis Tweezer 的斜尖设计，方便精准修眉，帮助拔除内向生长和细小毛发。 这款高品质小镊子由环氧涂层手术级钢材制成，防酸、防磁、防锈。 可靠的 Rubis 眉夹尖部无缝衔接，边缘精确，力臂可产生轻微弹性阻力，由技术人员在瑞士手工制成，工艺达 45 步。 - L.M.
name: Tweezer Pointer Swiss Cross

product_description:
Treat dry and wanting skin with 100% Natural Jojoba and Rosehip Oil from The Jojoba Company. Suitable for all skin types, the multi-tasking treatment combines the deeply penetrating powers of Jojoba with intensively nourishing Rosehip for measurable results.
Brimming with antioxidants, essential fatty acids and vitamins, the lightweight formula rapidly absorbs into skin without feeling greasy, helping to optimise hydration levels and address uneven skin tones. Ideal for alleviating the look of stretch marks and scars, it leaves skin feeling smooth and supple with a more balanced and refined tone.
name: Jojoba Company 100% Natural Jojoba and Rosehip Oil 30ml

product_description:
Encourage a good night’s sleep with the Spa Magik Organiks Sleep Therapy Deep Sleep Lavender Bath Salts; ideal for soaking away the days worry and stress.
Allowing you to thoroughly unwind, the salts are packed with a relaxing cocktail of Dead Sea Salt, Bromide and Magesium, which also work in synergy to combat insomnia. Alongside providing superior relaxation, the salts are enriched with Jojoba and Cactus oils, which offer nourishment and skin softening benefits.
Complete with a delicate and harmonising Lavender aroma, the salts seek to improve the length and quality of sleep.
name: Magik Organiks Sleep Therapy Deep Sleep Lavender Bath Salts

product_description:
Give the gift of a long-lasting sunkissed tan with this duo from TANWORX. Whether you want to treat a friend, family member or yourself, the TANWORX Self Tanning Essentials Duo Light is the ideal package to create a flawless, even yet natural looking tan. - K.R
The TANWORX Self Tanning Essentials Duo Light contains:
Hydrating Body LotionUltra moisturising, this lotion is designed to deeply hydrate and smooth the skin in preparation for your tan. Providing a soft and non-sticky canvas, your tan can glide on easily without sticking to dry areas or becoming patchy. Use 10 minutes before self tanning for an easy application and a perfect finish that lasts.
Self Tanning Lotion - LightGiving you an instant glow allowing you to see where to apply your self-tan, the lightweight tanning lotion develops and darkens over the course of 3 hours, leaving you with a natural looking, lightly sunkissed tan. The formula glides on easily, leaving an even streak-free glow.
Tanning MittApply your tanning products quickly and easily without worrying about staining your hands. The tanning mitt has been made with a special formula-resistant barrier, protecting hands and wrists from staining. The soft mitt provides an even, streak-free tan with every product, which can then be put into the washing machine to clean when you're done.
name: Tanning Essentials Duo - Fair/Medium

product_description:
这款 Limes Body Scrub 由 Geo 出品。 F. Trumper 是一款令人振奋和愉悦的身体磨砂膏，专为去除死皮和唤醒感官而设计，令人难以置信的柑橘花香清新怡人，轻轻浸润您的肌肤。 这是一款身体磨砂膏，带有令人振奋和愉悦的清香，有助于重新唤醒肌肤。
这款 Trumpers Limes Body Scrub 完美适用于全身，含鲜榨西印度柠檬的天然汁液，每次使用都让您感受异域热带风情。 这款磨砂膏香味犀利而浓烈，令人难以置信，可以唤醒您的身体、思想和灵魂，让您的肌肤步入光滑柔顺的热带天堂。
name: Limes Body Scrub - 200ml 旅行装

product_description:
Take an aromatic journey through the hills of Florentine with Nesti Dante's Dei Colli Fiorentini Poppy Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting the intoxicating scent of Poppy. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.
name: Dante Dei Colli Fiorentini Poppy Soap 250g

product_description:
开心的被叫醒！迅速唤醒你的身体，使用这款活力沐浴露帮助洁净，提亮只需要一个步骤。不含有SLS，混合天然的清洁剂，清新的薄荷，V-Tonic™含有丰富的维他命和抗氧化成分。使用这款含有由瓜拿纳中萃取的咖啡因成分，打破清晨昏昏欲睡的状态，唤醒大脑和肌肤，以满满的活力开启美好的一天吧。
这是一款超温和却非常有效的沐浴露，我们使用天然椰子的萃取物，帮助彻底清洁，同时锁住珍贵的肌肤水分。重要的是，这款产品不含有月桂基醚硫酸钠和月桂基硫酸钠（SLS）。

product_description:
Indulge your skin with the Wild Rose Body Salt Scrub from Natural Spa Factory. The luxurious salt scrub boasts an oil-based formula that delivers intense hydration to the skin, alongside a delicate aroma. The formula easily absorbs into the skin without leaving a greasy residue or clogging the pores, which can lead to blemishes.
Enriched with Peach Kernel oil, the scrub boasts essential Linoleic and Oleic fatty acids which give the formula a unique affinity to the skin and protects the body by supporting its barrier function. Containing Rose Petals, the treatment boasts compounds to improve the skin’s metabolism and clear toxins from the body, whilst also popular to relieve feelings of stress.
Suitable for even sensitive skin types, the formula contains Grape Seed oil that aims to visibly tighten skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving the body younger looking and incredibly smooth.
name: Spa Factory Wild Rose Body Salt Scrub

product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin from top to toe with the Natural Spa Factory Geranium and Grapefruit Body Scrub; a rejuvenating formula that works to exfoliate, refresh and refine the body.
Fortified with Sea Salt, Peach Kernel Oil and Grape Seed Oil, the luxurious treatment gently buffs away dirt and impurities, whilst providing antioxidant protection and leaving skin with a tighter, firmer appearance. Envelops the body in an uplifting fragrance of Grapefruit and Geranium.
name: Spa Factory Geranium and Grapefruit Body Scrub

product_description:
Say yes to the Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Skincare Kit; a powerful trio of plant-based treatments that seek draw out impurities, combat acne breakouts and reveal a brighter, refined complexion. Ideal for oily and combination skin types.
Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Cleanser (147ml)
Containing active ingredient Salicylic Acid, the natural cleanser works to unclog pores and regulate excess sebum production, with eco-friendly Jojoba Spheres for gentle exfoliation. Charcoal draws out impurities without stripping away essential moisture, while antioxidant-rich Tomato extract delivers essential free radical protection. Skin feels clean, balanced and refreshed.
Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Mud Mask (93g)
Lavishly rich and creamy, the indulgent face mask contains a detoxifying blend of Salicylic Acid and Charcoal powder, working to dissolve dirt, excess oil and impurities. Enriched with a natural blend of Tomato, Aloe and Watermelon extracts, it infuses skin with moisture and antioxidants to reveal a clear and softened complexion.
Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Bar Soap (195g)
Suitable for face and body use, the nourishing soap bar eliminates dirt and impurities, harnessing the natural abilities of Charcoal to absorb toxins and oil. Botanical extracts of Tomato, Sunflower Seed Oil and Willow Bark deliver essential nutrients and antioxidants for skin that feels smooth, refreshed and nourished.
name: to Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Skin Care Kit

product_description:
Experience the benefits of Manuka Honey in an even more powerful form. MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey with CycloPower™ is a chewable tablet form of MGO™ 400 Manuka Honey; one tablet contains 3 teaspoons of MGO 400™ Manuka Honey and offers up to 50 times the effect of MGO™ 400 alone thanks to increased bioavailability.
CYCLOPOWER™ is the most active form of Manuka Honey available; encapsulating MGO™ 400 Manuka Honey in a cyclodextrin molecule increases the powerful benefits, and is perfect for those who do not enjoy the taste of honey (the tablets have a mild honey flavour). Each chewable tablet is convenient, easy to swallow and low GI.
name: 400+ Manuka Honey with CycloPower

product_description:
AromaWorks' Indulgence Gift Set for Men combines a hydrating aftershave lotion with a calming body wash to leave skin feeling cleansed and cooled. Complete with a flannel and scented candle for a truly therapeutic experience.
Calming Aftershave Lotion (100ml):
Infused with 13 BioActive ingredients including Mandarin and Bergamot essential oils, the hydrating formula expertly cools and calms skin; it conditions and invigorates to leave the face and neck feeling cool and looking radiant after shaving. Infused with a handsome fragrance powered by Mandarin, Bay and Cedarwood.
Calming Body Wash (300ml):
A hydrating blend of essential oils that work in synergy to help clean and refresh your skin. Infused with 10 BioActive ingredients and a citrusy, spicy scent powered by Mandarin and Bay, the body wash gently cleanses away impurities whilst conditioning and invigorating the body. Skin feels fresh and smells decadent.
Yang Candle (10cl):
Nutmeg, Ho Leaf and Mandarin.
name: Men's Indulgence Gift Set

product_description:
使用men-ü控油保濕套裝呵護肌膚，這是清潔、清爽和滋潤肌膚的三件套產品。其中包含洗面乳、啫喱和保濕霜，為肌膚注入活力，健康無油光。 - KN 
 套裝包含以下產品： 
 1 x健康洗面乳15ml ： 該深度清潔潔面乳採用無皂、Ph. 平衡配方，當您的肌膚最敏感時，適合剃須前和剃須後使用。添加防腐茶樹精油、金縷梅和蘆薈後，該清新提神的混合物有助於預防長斑和剃須刺激，同時舒緩並控制多餘油脂。該潔面乳泡沫細膩，用後肌膚高度水潤，遠離刺激。 
 1 x控油清爽啫喱15ml ： 此面部啫喱沒有香味，清潔肌膚，通過防油光去除和控製過多的油脂。本啫喱含水楊酸、金縷梅和柳樹皮，幫助去除毛孔雜質，捱過來防止長痘和毛孔堵塞，同時調理和緊緻肌膚。此配方非常適合剃須後使用，對抗倒生胡。讓臉部感覺深層潔淨、清透和顯著舒緩。 
 1 x控油保濕霜15ml ： 本面霜沒有香味，不油膩，為肌膚深層補水，同時對抗過多油脂和皮脂；痘痘剋星。此配方含對抗臉部油膩部位的油脂吸收劑，包括情況惡劣的T 區，在深層補水的同時去除過多油脂，讓肌膚健康無油光。還包含維生素E，幫助處理導致衰老的自由基。可白天或晚上使用。

product_description:
Treat skin to luxury with the Purify Body Oil from AromaWorks. The pregnancy-friendly elixir is ideal for dry, stressed and fatigued skin, whilst also boasting benefits such as reducing the appearance of cellulite.
Enriched with Coconut Oil, Vitamin E and Organic Pumpkin Seed Oil, the oil delivers hydration to the body and promotes an enviably smooth finish. The oil also provides a soothing feel to aching muscles and calms the senses with its decadent herbal scent.

Enriched with Original Seawater, the formula utilises the slimming properties of an ancient alga to help eliminate excess fat, whilst Halopteris Scoparia and Palmaria Palmata stimulate the reproduction of collagen and blood circulation to encourage fat draining. Lightweight and non-greasy, the sun screen offers a sweet summer scent and light-reflecting particles that enhance a natural tan.

Intensely moisturise your skin with the Borghese Fango Deep Hydration Finishing Treatment, a dry oil spray that deeply hydrates and calms skin.
Supporting the skin's natural moisture barrier, the treatment combines emollient Jojoba and Safflower Seed Oils with Bisabolol and Aloe to deliver deep down hydration whilst softening, calming and relieving skin. The complexion is left feeling silky and moisturised with enhanced radiance.

Cowshed 活力​​牛提神沐浴啫喱蘊含專家級提神混合成分，可令您皮膚舒爽，充滿活力。研磨的竹子和櫻桃核微粒粉末可溫和去除皮膚角質，令皮膚展現健康光彩，同時葡萄籽、西柚和柑橘精油可以醒腦提神，為皮膚補充水分。 - LM

Treat hands and cuticles to Leighton Denny's Time Repair Anti-Ageing Miracle Oil; a fast-absorbing formula that works to nourish, hydrate and soften skin.
Harnessing the moisturising powers of Rosehip Oil, Vitamin A and an innovative Timecode™ Complex, the non-greasy oil helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst delivering long-lasting hydration to leave hands comfortable around the clock. A dose of Tea Tree Oil soothes and replenishes to reveal touchably soft, smooth and youthful-looking hands.

product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set from Holistic Silk. Housed in a luxurious organza bag, the collection includes a pair of massaging slippers and a sleep-inducing eye mask with limited edition print.
Holistic Silk Lavender Eye Mask
Crafted from Dupion silk, characterised by its luxurious sheen, the oversized mask features a super soft cotton velvet lining for ultimate comfort and a ribbon tie fastening to allow a custom fit. Filled with real Lavender for a relaxing, soothing fragrance, the sleep-inducing eye mask rests on the cheekbones and forehead to block out the light, allowing you to experience a moment of pure tranquillity. Ideal for home or travelling, you can wake up feeling restored and refreshed with reduced stress. Dimensions: 24cm x 12cm.

Featuring comfortable magnetic insoles with multiple perforated massage nodules, the slippers help to massage the reflex points in your feet, stimulating the nervous system and enhancing the body's metabolism. Ideal for yoga, travelling or even in the office, the cosy, lightweight slippers improve circulation, whilst gently soothing and relieving aching, heavy legs. Perfect for in-flight use to prevent swelling. Adorned with an elegant print and bow. Non-slip. Small: UK 3-4 / EU 36-37. Medium: UK 5-6 / EU 38-39. Large: UK 7-8 / EU 40-41.

product_description:
Natural Birthing Company's Bosom Buddies Breastfeeding Oils are a must-have for all mums embarking on breastfeeding journeys. The oil blends work to help ease and relieve feelings of discomfort commonly known during breastfeeding, such as swollen breasts or tender nipples. Simply add a few drops to water, soak a flannel and enjoy a relaxing compress. Their therapeutic scents will also help to uplift your senses.
"Ooh!" for Engorged Breasts (10ml):
Specially created to help relieve the discomfort of tender, swollen breasts. The oil blend combines Geranium with Peppermint, Cyprus and German Chamomile to help you feel more comfortable. Add a few drops to water and use a flannel for a relieving compress.
"Aah!" for Low Milk Supply (10ml):
Breastfeeding is a supply and demand process; the more you do it, the more milk you produce. Combining Fennel, Lemongrass and Mandarin, this special blend can be used in conjunction with offering your baby the breast more frequently to help enhance your milk supply.
"Ouch!" for Sore Nipples (10ml):
A blend of Lavender, Neroli, Mandarin, Frankincense and Peppermint that works to relieve and moisturise sore, irritated nipples. Combined with correct positioning, it helps to promote a more enjoyable breastfeeding experience.
name: Birthing Company Bosom Buddies Breastfeeding Oils 3 x 10ml

product_description:
Soothe dry, uncomfortable skin with the ARK Intensive Hand and Nail Cream; a rich, indulgent lotion that intensely hydrates and combats moisture loss.
Enriched with Raspberry extracts and Cocoa Butter, it effortlessly melts into skin to instantly alleviate soreness and rough patches, with an Omega-rich blend of Grapeseed, Avocado, Kiwi and Blackcurrant helping to repair skin’s natural lipid barrier for long lasting results.
The addition of Keratin Amino Acid encourages strong, healthy-looking nails while anti-ageing Red Algae minimises the look of discolouration caused by sun damage. Skin feels refreshed and replenished, imbued with a natural fragrance of crisp Palmarosa and delicate Ylang Ylang.

Infused with three natural oils (Jojoba, Apricot Kernel and Sweet Almond) and vitamin-rich Caviar, the dry body oil expertly moisturises and softens skin, leaving a shimmering, radiant finish in its wake. Suitable for the body, face and hair, it delivers antioxidant action to slow down the ageing process, and enhances your skin’s tone to highlight the décolleté, arms and legs. Hair and skin is left feeling soft, glowing and enriched with a subtle amber scent. Non-sticky.

Douse your skin in luxurious comfort with Thalgo's Silky Smooth Cream, a nourishing body cream infused with a host of active ingredients to expertly soften and protect skin.
Melting effortlessly into skin, the cream cocoons the body in a veil of softness, working to smoothen and nourish with a blend of Shea Butter and Rice Germ Oil, and protect with extract of Brown Algae. Skin feels silky smooth and intensely nourished. Notes of Iris and Jasmine.

Weleda 婴儿腹部按摩油由药剂师和助产士研发而成，采用天然配方，促进婴儿的天然消化。

使用说明：

product_description: Murad 确保其每一件产品都符合其高标准。 所有产品均含有抗氧化剂、保湿剂和抗炎成分，以便呈现迷人肌肤。 这款 Collagen Support Body Cream 含有所有这些重要的成分以及其他成分。 添加了牛油果油和荷荷巴油提取物，可提供三重滋润，24 小时锁住水分；而 Collagen Support Complex 则可提升肌肤弹性，呈现桃红色的青春容颜。 LB

product_description:
Discover a multi-purpose hydrator with the Verdure Moisturising Oil from Malée Natural Science. The lightweight formula is both nourishing and luxurious, transforming the condition of dry skin, hair and nails. Ultra-versatile, the oil can be used inside a bath or directly onto skin and hair.
Inspired by Africa’s wetlands, the oil envelops skin and hair in a fresh forest green fragrance that guarantees to uplift and revitalise with warm and earthy notes of Citrus, Mint and Patchouli.
Boasting a potent blend of natural Sweet Almond, Coconut and Argan oil, the moisturising oil is rich in vitamins, fatty acids and essential moisture. The oil absorbs effortlessly and is able to penetrate and strengthen hair, skin and nails. Without leaving behind an oily or greasy residue, the treatment delivers intense hydration, leaving all areas of the body nourished and cared for.

product_description:
Who run the world? (Girls).Be Your Best is an awesome blend of vitamins designed for active women looking to boost their multivitamin intake to support their physical and dietary needs.
This impressive blend of micronutrients including vitamins C, E and D contribute to the normal functioning of the immune system following intense exercise. These vitamins, along with the other potent mineral ingredients contribute to the normal function of the cardiovascular, respiratory and muscular systems whilst you sweat it out. These comprehensive ingredients are scientifically designed to help improve recovery time and avoid you becoming prematurely fatigued during exercise.
Be Your Best is a great addition to every active lifestyle, helping you to achieve your exercise goals by supporting both performance and recovery. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.
name: Your Best

product_description:
OSKIA Renaissance 文艺复兴系列手部和身体保湿乳是一款适用于手部肌肤和身体肌肤的奢华抗衰老护肤品。 这款奢华高效的保湿乳散发着新生玫瑰和茉莉的淡雅芳香，能够显著地软化、平滑和焕活肌肤。
这款营养型保湿乳可平衡植物可利用维他命、发酵的矿物质和有效的植物活性剂，能够刺激细胞更新，具有抗衰老作用。 利用瑞士花园水芹淡化色素沉着、色斑和调节不均匀的肤色，以增强肌肤的整体光泽度，使其看起来更加年轻。 这款保湿乳蕴含有天然水果酸，能温和地祛除肌肤的角质、暗沉和干燥的肌肤细胞，为肌肤补充水分，减轻毛发角化病的症状。

product_description: 这款 Musgo Real Body Cream 易于涂抹，可恢复肌肤水润柔滑。 本配方结合甘油、橄榄油和杏仁油精华以及牛油果油，为疲倦或紧绷的干燥肌肤提供深层补水。 加香柑橘散发独特而阳刚的芳香，令肌肤水润清新。 E.N.

Treat yourself or a loved one to the Anti-Ageing Eye Mask Pillow Case Gift Set from Holistic Silk, a brand committed to fair trade and ethical production. Housed in a luxurious organza bag, the collection includes a silk pillow case and sleep-inducing eye mask.

Crafted from satin silk for ultimate comfort, the hypoallergenic pillow case prevents facial creasing, fine lines and damage to skin cells, whilst allowing hair to glide over without snagging, maintaining soft, sleek locks and minimising split ends. Made from luxurious satin silk with a comfortable ribbon tie fastening, the hypoallergenic mask works to delay signs of ageing, including fine lines, wrinkles and facial creasing, whilst promoting natural hydration and enhancing the effectiveness of your night cream. Filled with real Lavender for a relaxing, soothing fragrance, the sleep-inducing eye mask rests on the cheekbones and forehead to block out light, allowing you to experience a moment of pure tranquillity. Ideal for home or travelling, you can wake up feeling restored and refreshed with reduced stress. Dimensions: 24cm x 12cm.

The Renu Beauty Bag is an exquisite collection of 8 beautifying essentials which promise to leave your skin with a youthful glow and a fresh, vibrant complexion. Blended using high quality natural ingredients with the latest advances in skincare technology to effectively combat the three main types of ageing. - K.R
Renu Flash Relax Mask (30ml)
A luxurious gel mask, Renu Flash Relax Mask smoothes fine lines and helps firm facial contours for an instant face-lift effect.
Renu Rich Cream Cleanser (50ml)  
A luxurious cleanser which gently and effectively removes make-up without damaging the skin’s protective barrier.

A silky lotion which gently refreshes the skin after daily cleansing while protecting its protective barrier.
Renu Restoring Cream (Light) (30ml)
Scientifically developed using evening primrose and rosehip oils - a rich source of essential fatty acids - to maintain suppleness and elasticity.
Renu Restoring Cream (Rich) (30ml)
A gorgeous day moisturiser which helps to firm slackening skin and plump deep wrinkles from within.
Renu Radiant Skin Peel (30ml)     
Powerful fruit enzymes reveal instantly radiant skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and pores while papaya enzymes gently polish away dulling dead skin.
Renu Lip & Eye Active Lift (15ml)
Smooth fine lines and plump wrinkles in the vulnerable eye area.

Soften and smoothen your skin with the Spongellé Spongology Spongology Body Wash Infused Anti-Cellulite Glove in 'Milk & Honey' from the brand's Shower with Nature Collection. The eco-friendly exfoliating glove has been designed to cleanse, buff and massage skin with its time-released body wash.
Utilising Proprietary Infusion Technology that offers a guaranteed number of washes (over 20), the saturated glove expertly cleanses, exfoliates and massages skin; it combines organic extracts to expertly lift away impurities whilst softening and stimulating circulation to improve the appearance of cellulite and promote smoother, younger-looking skin. Its unique surface changes as you squeeze, from a gentle exfoliator to a soft, silky texture with rich and creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth, purified and revitalised.

product_description:
Experience a massaging cleanse with the Spongellé Body Wash Infused Buffer Duo in 'Pink Tiare', two cleansing sponges enriched with an age-defying, antioxidant-rich, time-released body wash.
Utilising Moisturising Oil Proprietary Infusion Technology that offers a guaranteed number of washes (over 30), each saturated buffer expertly cleanses, moisturises and boosts circulation; extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver work in synergy to lift away impurities whilst softening and hydrating from head to toe. The unique surface changes as you squeeze, from a gentle exfoliator to a soft, silky sponge with rich and creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth, purified and revitalised with restored elasticity. Infused with an exotic floral fragrance. Housed in a gift box.

product_description:
Transform your shower experience with the Spongellé Men's Body Wash Infused Super Buffer; a multi-use, multi-function sponge that cleanses, exfoliates and hydrates all-in-one.
Featuring a built-in body wash with proprietary infusion technology, the innovative buffer delivers a time-released lather to sweep away dirt and impurities while gently polishing the surface layer for long lasting freshness. Enriched with Coconut Oil and Vetiver Root, skin feels softened and invigorated with a subtle masculine scent.

product_description:
Take care of your body with Bodyism Ultra Probiotic, an extra-strength food supplement that promotes a healthy, happy gut.
Specifically engineered from organic, earth-grown ingredients, the alkaline supplement contains a mixed strain of highly concentrated and live bacteria, and is formulated on a unique, fermented green base to prolong bacteria life. Having a positive impact on your gut, the capsules deliver a concentrated amount of probiotics that food alone cannot provide, and are the perfect alternative for those intolerant to probiotic yogurts and dairy.
Not only beneficial to the gut and physical wellbeing, probiotics are also known to have a positive effect on the mind; cutting-edge research shows that they may increase anti-anxiety neurotransmitters in the body to promote good mental and emotional health.
Good bacteria is an essential dietary requirement to help optimise gut health; 70% of your body's defences are found in the gut, so it's vital you treat it well and keep it healthy. The capsules do not need to be stored in the refrigerator, so are perfectly portable and convenient.
name: Ultra Probiotic 185ml

product_description:
Fico D'India 手袋旅行套装能够清洁并滋润身体，外出使用也很方便。 这款散发着迷人香味的旅行套装包含迷你香皂、沐浴露、身体乳霜和浴盐，浓缩着经典的意大利风情和历史。 这款产品附带亮色的手提袋，内里为时髦的豹纹图案。 - R.H
Ortiga 是一家制作香皂和香薰产品的意大利公司，由 Sue Townsend 于2006年在西西里岛创立。 品牌只采用天然原料，灵感来源于西西里的美学、色彩和芬芳，带给您奢华香皂、香薰、护肤霜、蜡烛和乳液等丰富的产品。
单块香皂 40g：Ortigia 推出的 Fico D'india 橄榄油香皂滋润效果极佳，让您尽享预约的沐浴时光。 这款香皂混合了杏仁精油和牛奶蛋白等多种滋润成分，带给您洁净柔滑的肌肤。
沐浴露 75ml：Ortigia 推出的这款奢华 Fico d'india 沐浴露以橄榄油为基底，带有独特清新的无花果香，是您不可或缺的身体护理产品。 这款滋润的沐浴露为乳状质地，无论是淋浴还是沐浴，都能产生丰富的泡沫，带给您舒适的日常享受。
身体乳霜 75ml：Ortigia 推出的 Fico D'India 身体乳霜特别添加了具有滋润功效的橄榄油和保湿的羊毛脂，是您必不可少的美发产品，为肌肤带去温柔的呵护。 这款身体乳霜带有无花果和雪松木的浓郁馨香，深入肌肤，长效持久。 乳霜质地轻盈不油腻，丝般柔滑，非常适合用于滋润身体和双手。
浴盐 75g：您是否感到四肢疲惫，肌肤十分脆弱？  Ortigia 推出的这款 Fico D'india 浴盐便能解决这一问题。 只需取一把 Fico D'india 浴盐，便可以享受舒缓身心的沐浴时光。 Fico D'india 浴盐能够迅速溶解，让水质变得异常柔软，散发着无花果和雪松木的醉人馨香。 尽情放松享受！
name: Fico D'India 手袋旅行套装

product_description:
bliss 高保湿护手霜超级柔软顺滑，杜绝缺水肌肤，呈现迷人滋润的双手！ 这款护手霜丝滑但不油腻，亦可顺滑粗糙角质。
使用 bliss high intensity hand cream 令双手柔软顺滑。 这款软膏含柔和的甘油、滋润的葡萄籽提取物、保湿澳洲坚果油、软化维他命 B5 和抗氧化的苹果提取物，令双手超级柔软并散发细腻的柑橘香味。
使用说明：
name: 高保湿护手霜 (75ml)

product_description:
Liven up bath time with the Spongellé Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals. Forming the adorably cute silhouette of a dog, the multi-use sponge has been specifically designed for kids, harnessing proprietary infusion technology to deliver an in-built body wash system for effortless multi-tasking.
Dirt and grime is effortlessly swept away without the use of harsh chemicals, and each sponge is infused with a delectable ‘fruitilicious’ scent and soothing extract of Chamomile. Have fun at shower time while ensuring your little ones are left feeling squeaky clean.
name: Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals - Dog

product_description:
Experience an all-over pamper with May Lindstrom Skin The Good Stuff Body and Hair Radiance Oil; a luxurious, versatile oil for use on the skin and hair.
Infused with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients, including nourishing plant oils and translucent golden minerals, the silky oil moisturises and hydrates skin, whilst revitalising hair to leave it feeling soft, smooth and manageable from root to tip.
Enveloping the body with a decadent fragrance of Cocoa, Rose, Lavender and Ylang-Ylang, the lightweight elixir illuminates and rejuvenates dull skin to restore a dewy, youthful-looking glow. Skin is supple and velvety, and locks are repaired and glossy without greasy residue. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.
name: Lindstrom Skin The Good Stuff Body and Hair Radiance Oil

product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Sachajuan Shiny Citrus Body Lotion; a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that works to restore long-lasting moisture and hydration.
Fortified with the brand's unique Earth Silk Technology, the scented lotion delivers anti-ageing benefits, whilst infusing skin with a fresh fragrance of Jasmine and Citrus. Expect soft, supple skin without greasy or sticky residue.
name: Body Lotion 300ml - Shiny Citrus

product_description:
Achieve that perfect, Hollywood smile with the Mr Bright Teeth Whitening Pen; a simple, safe and effective teeth whitening treatment using a minty-fresh, plant-based formula free from damaging peroxide.
Designed for convenience and on-the-go applications, the compact pen easily fits into your pocket or makeup bag, with application taking just 30 seconds. See instant results in as little as 30 minutes, with a reduction in tooth stains and discolouration, and up to 7 shades whiter in two weeks with continued use. Clinically approved and certified, smile with confidence with the help of Mr Bright.
name: Bright Teeth Whitening Pen

product_description:
BAKEL代表道德、高品质的护肤品。 无残酷动物实验并适合素食主义者，该产品适合所有肌肤类型，并经过临床证明。
由于缺少表面活性剂，适用于即使是最敏感的肌肤，Dailycare超级细腻沐浴膏可净化肌肤而不剥夺其天然水脂膜。 肌肤将柔软水嫩，弹性十足，丰盈细腻，同时其无香精配方可推荐用于容易受刺激的过敏性和反应性肌肤。
name: Dailycare超级细腻沐浴膏（300ml）

product_description: 運用杏仁油中的礦物質、維生素和蛋白質自然滋養肌膚，還蘊含金盞花，令肌膚賦活新生。該產品不含對羥基苯甲酸酯、石油化學產品和硫酸鹽、人造香精和色素。適合素食主義者使用，而且從未經過動物測試。
name: 阳光牛 - 平衡协调按摩油 100ml

product_description:
Pamper hardworking hands with the Leighton Denny Best Defence Hand and Nail Cream; a hydrating formula with a limited edition Winter Berries fragrance.
Harnessing the hydrating powers of Glycerin, the rich moisturiser envelops the hands and nails in a veil of essential moisture, which nourishes and softens skin. Hibiscus Flower extract works to improve skin’s elasticity to reveal a firmer-looking finish, while White Mulberry Bark extract reduces the appearance of dark spots and blemishes.
Finished with a crucial dose of Cucumber Seed extract, the hand and nail cream is rich in Vitamin C, which offers a soothing sensation to skin and ensures it is free from irritation. Skin is silky soft and comfortably hydrated.
name: Denny Best Defence Hand and Nail Cream - Winter Berries 75ml

product_description:
最温和的方式让您快速入眠并彻夜舒缓肌肤。 非常适合敏感型肌肤。
BEAUTIFUL SLEEP：富含法国薰衣草油 - 被称为大自然的镇静剂。 苹果香味的罗马洋甘菊，可轻松缓解疼痛，让人焕发清新活力；柔软的柑橘味佛手柑可活跃精气神，雪松的甜香脂味可实现平衡与宁静。
BEAUTIFUL SKIN：薰衣草油的温和性众所周知，是一款完美的夜用美容油，能平衡肌肤自身的油脂生成并促进健康的新细胞形成。 含罗马洋甘菊 - 非常敏感或干性肌肤的一大福音，因其具备镇静舒缓功效。
使用说明：
挤出两满吸管本品至装有温水的深浴缸中。 为了获得更强烈的体验，可在步入浴缸之前轻轻按摩至肌肤上。 进行三次慢呼吸并放松。 从头到脚享受温和滋润，准备进入完美梦乡。
避免接触眼睛 如同所有香薰产品一样，在怀孕期间最好先咨询助产士，方可使用。
name: the Moon After Dark Bath Oil Dream (100ml)

product_description:
Repair and heal acne-prone complexions with the Erno Laszlo Oil Control Cleansing Bar. Providing a concentrated burst of potent natural ingredients, the soap bar is more than just the average cleanser, with the ability to nourish as well as heal deep within.
It works to gently eliminate oil, impurities and surface bacteria whilst breaking down dirt clogged in pores. Palm Oil is rich in fatty acids and helps to balance your complexion by mimicking the same nourishing oils and pH balance found in skin already, whilst Glycerin locks in moisture and strengthens skin structure to fight against future breakouts.
Safflower Seed Oil seals in hydration and creates a protective barrier, which helps prevent excess oil production known to cause blemishes. Ideal for combination and oily types, you can expect clean and clear skin that’s visibly transformed.
name: Laszlo Oil Control Cleansing Bar (100g)

product_description:
卡尼爾琥珀防曬乳SPF30 保護和滋養肌膚，防止受到太陽有害光的傷害。配方使用包含麥素寧濾環的專利過濾系統和抗氧化劑維生素C，增強肌膚的自然防禦，防止日曬導致的損傷和過早衰老。同時還提供強效水合作用，讓肌膚保持滋潤。 
 使用說明：在接觸太陽之前30分鐘，厚塗一層。頻繁地重新塗抹，尤其是在游泳、用毛巾擦拭和流汗後。
name: 卡尼尔琥珀防晒乳 SPF30 (200ml)

product_description:
Catering specifically for sensitive skin, the yes to Cucumbers Soothing Skincare Kit combines three of the brand's best-sellers to leave your complexion clean, calm and clarified.
yes to Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes (Pack of 30)
A pack of pre-moistened, biodegradable towelettes infused with green superfoods to cleanse and revitalise skin. Synergising Aloe Vera, Organic Cucumber and antioxidant-rich Green Tea, the soothing face wipes gently eliminate dirt, sweat and make-up without over-drying. Ideal for use on-the-go, you can expect a clear, clarified complexion with a healthy glow. 95% natural.
yes to Cucumbers Daily Calming Moisturiser (50ml)
A fast-absorbing formula that works to infuse sensitive skin with soothing and hydrating ingredients. Cooling and rejuvenating, the lightweight moisturiser blends Organic Cucumber with Aloe Vera and Sweet Almond Oil to hydrate and condition for long-lasting comfort. Expect a soft, smooth and healthy-looking complexion with a luminous glow.
yes to Cucumbers Calming Facial Mask (50ml)
A revitalising treatment developed specifically for sensitive skin in need of a gentle boost. Harnessing the powers of cooling Aloe Vera and Organic Cucumber, the soothing, five-minute mask rejuvenates and refreshes, whilst delivering long-lasting hydration to leave you with a soft, supple and comfortable complexion. 97% natural.
name: to Cucumbers Soothing Skincare Kit

product_description: 利用来自 Dr. Hauschka 的焕采腿部和手臂滋养霜缓解疲劳、酸痛的四肢。 加入迷迭香精油，该活力焕发配方可舒缓和安慰沉重的手臂和腿部，而琉璃苣有助于减少静脉曲张和橘皮组织的出现。 旨在坐或站一整天后减少水肿，让身体重新焕发活力，神清气爽，精力充沛地继续进行活动。 E.N.
name: Hauschka焕采腿部和手臂滋养霜（100ml）

product_description:
Lie back and relax with the Wild Rose Bath Cream, a natural, holistic treatment from health-based beauty brand Weleda.
Transform your bath into a luxurious, pampering experience with this indulgent bath soak, formulated with a selection of exquisite essential oils and nourishing extracts. Delicate Damask Rose imbues a familiar, relaxing scent, while Olive and Jojoba Oils deeply moisturise skin for a sumptuously smooth texture. Emerge from the water with a sense of wellbeing and skin that feels soft, supple and radiant.
name: Wild Rose Bath Cream 100ml

product_description:
Lilibeth of New York present the Grooming Essentials Kit; the brand's unique Brow Shaper and tweezers that help you to remove unwanted hair with ease. Housed in a crocodile effect case with integrated mirror, the duo is a must-have for perfectly shaped brows.
Lilibeth of New York Tweezers
Preen and perfect brows with the stainless steel tweezers. Delivering professional results, the tweezers have been specially aligned for superior pulling power, whilst the slanted tips allow you to grip even the shortest hairs. Achieve expertly defined and shaped brows with ease.
Lilibeth of New York Brow Shaper (Black)
A high performance, pain-free hair removal tool to define the brow line without tweezing or waxing. Suitable for men and women, the easy-to-use tool features a durable stainless steel blade that effortlessly and comfortably removes even the shortest hairs, whilst its portable, fold-up design is ideal for grooming on-the-go. Can also be used on the upper lip, chin, bikini line or fuzzy facial hair.
name: of New York Grooming Essentials Kit

product_description:
大豆香草咖啡豆身体磨砂膏可有效护理您的肌肤；其奢华的肌肤再生配方中蕴含有有机冷压可可油，可使您从头到脚的全身肌肤得到充分补水、祛角质和软化。
这款温和的身体磨砂膏利用罗布斯塔咖啡豆刺激血流，可最大程度地减少脂肪团和淡化妊辰纹，与此同时有机可可豆和维他命 E 可提供抗氧化保护作用，以修复和恢复肌肤。 非常适合湿疹和牛皮癣，其喜马拉雅山粉色岩盐和德麦拉拉蔗糖可祛除死皮细胞，有助于清除黑头粉刺和疹子，使肌肤更加光滑细嫩。
name: 220g——香草

product_description:
The Anti-Fatigue Home Spa Shower Gel from PUPA re-awakens and revitalises the senses while effectively cleaning skin, transforming your showering experience into an indulgent pampering session.
Skin is enveloped in a harmonic blend of aromatherapy oils, with fresh notes of Orange and Cedarwood helping to restore skin balance and soothing Lavender Oil nurturing the spirit. Hawaiian Green Salt and Bamboo extract work in synergy to tone and refine the look of skin, sweeping away dirt and impurities to leave skin feeling softened, purified and invigorated.
name: Home Spa Shower Gel - Anti-Fatigue 300ml

product_description:
Enjoy a calming soak with the Real Luxury Bath & Shower Drops from NEOM’s Scent To Instantly De-Stress™ collection. Designed to deliver therapeutic benefits to the mind and body, the bath and shower drops leave skin smooth and comfortable, whilst boasting a relaxing scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of French Lavender, Jasmine and Brazilian Rosewood, the formula envelops skin in a comforting aroma that banishes feelings of stress. Complete with Vitamins A and E, alongside skin-loving Safflower oil, expect to unwind and de-stress.
name: 薰衣草茉莉舒压沐浴油

product_description:
Preen and perfect your eyebrows with the Lilibeth of New York Brow Shaper; a high performance, pain-free hair removal tool to define the brow line without tweezing or waxing.
Suitable for men and women, the easy-to-use, award-winning tool features a durable stainless steel blade that effortlessly and comfortably removes even the shortest hairs, whilst its portable, fold-up design is ideal for grooming on-the-go. Can also be used on the upper lip, chin, bikini line, legs, arms, knuckles and fuzzy facial hair.
Not only great for hair removal, the Brow Shaper delivers dermaplaning benefits; it gently exfoliates the top layer of dead skin cells to allow better absorption of moisturisers and serums, whilst helping make-up to sit more evenly.
name: of New York Brow Shaper - Leopard Orange/Plain Orange (Set of 2)

product_description:
The NUXE 24 Hour Moisturising Body Lotion has been specially formulated to hydrate dry, wanting skin. Melting quickly in, the lotion restores suppleness and softness to leave skin feeling silky and replenished.
Enriched with Orange and Almond Blossom Petals, it provides 24 hour hydration. Expect satin soft and comfortable skin.
name: Body Lotion for Dry Skin (400ml)

product_description:
使用 Bliss Blood Orange + White Pepper Body Butter 50ml，强效滋养皮肤。 本品带有带辛辣、鸡尾酒气味，自然恢复皮肤活力，滋润干燥皮肤，使其柔软、光滑和丰润。
本品富含锁水玻璃酸钠以及具有软化功能的椰子油和平复肌肤的维生素C，能够深层，实现强效补水。

使用说明：

沐浴后大面积涂抹。
name: Blood Orange + White Pepper Body Butter 50ml

product_description:
Refresh and revitalise dull, lacklustre skin with the Rebalancing Home Spa Salt Scrub from PUPA. Expertly formulated with a delicate blend of Polynesian Red Salt and Tiarè Flower Extract, the natural exfoliator effortlessly sweeps away dirt and impurities while penetrating skin tissue for a firming effect, minimising the appearance of lumps and bumps.
Experience a subtle tingling sensation as the advanced formula releases Active Oxygen, optimising the delivery of essential nutrients for maximum benefits and effectively creating the appearance of a smoother, more sculpted silhouette.
Recreate a relaxing, spa-like ritual from the comfort of your own home and achieve skin that feels velvety-smooth and replenished with a luminous glow.
name: Home Spa Salt Scrub - Rebalancing 350g

product_description:
Gentlemen's Tonic面部Gift Set包含三种可以舒缓、滋润和净化肤色的创新产品，是一款完美的礼物。 用面部磨砂膏去除死皮细胞和污垢，用洁面乳维持酸碱平衡，用滋润霜使肌肤保持一定的水润水平，该套装将使肌肤靓丽而丝绸般柔软。 K.D.
 Gentlemen's Tonic去角质磨砂膏 100ml
用Gentlemen's Tonic去角质磨砂膏清洁您的肌肤，使其清新焕发。 该保湿配方可以软化和护理您的肌肤而竹粒子去角质的功能可以温和地清除污垢和死皮细胞，使您的肌肤容光焕发。
 Gentlemen's Tonic泡沫Cleanser  150ml
Gentlemen's Tonic日常泡沫Cleanser采用高山苔藓和皂树作为超温和清洁剂，可以增强清洗过程，同时保持肌肤的天然酸碱度平衡。 荸荠还可以补充水分，确保肌肤不干燥。
Gentlemen's Tonic 日常 Moisturiser 100ml
用Gentlemen's Tonic日常Moisturiser滋养和舒缓您的肌肤。 这款奢华润肤乳适合所有肌肤类型，但特别适合干性或敏感型皮肤的男性，它可以深层补湿以恢复肌肤活力、保护肌肤。
name: Tonic面部Gift Set

product_description:
Relax and unwind with this works' Sleep To Go. Combining two aromatherapeutic solutions for a good night's sleep, the set inspires feelings of calm and prepares you for a deep and restful slumber.
deep sleep pillow spray (5ml):
A best-selling natural sleep aid that inspires feelings of calm. Designed to inspire a rejuvenating and deep sleep, the pillow spray is formulated with 100% pure essential oils of Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Chamomile; it releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale any nerves and worries. Spray onto your pillow before bedtime; feel your troubles melt away and enjoy a peaceful slumber. Suitable to use during pregnancy.
deep sleep stress less (5ml):
A natural remedy that inspires a relaxed and deep night's sleep. Formulated to help to calm the senses and counteract physical and mental fatigue, the multi-purpose, aromatherapy blend can be used any time to promote restful sleep. Containing refreshing Eucalyptus, Frankincense and Lavender Essential Oils, it can help to fight infections and ease hypertension, nervous tension and insomnia; perfect for those wanting to clear their mind and improve sleep quality.
name: works Sleep To Go

product_description: Treat your skin and senses to the Il Frutteto Fig and Almond Milk Soap from Nesti Dante. Crafted in Florence using traditional methods and natural ingredients, the vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and rejuvenates, whilst moisturising and soothing to leave skin feeling soft and supple. Housed in decorative packaging, the soap bar makes an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.
name: Dante Il Frutteto Fig and Almond Milk Soap 250g

product_description:
Energise skin with the Nesti Dante Romantica Cherry Blossom and Basil Soap; a fragrant, vegetable soap bar that is hand-crafted in Italy using the saponification method. Arriving wrapped in thick textured paper finished with a decorative floral print, the soap is an ideal gift, or the perfect treat to yourself.
Traditionally made utilising natural, raw ingredients, the soap gently cleanses skin to eliminate traces of dirt and impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. Romancing the senses, the cleansing bar boasts a refreshingly aromatic scent of cherry blossom and basil, which work in synergy to deliver an uplifting fragrance that will invigorate the mind and body.
name: Dante Romantica Cherry Blossom and Basil Soap 250g

product_description:
Revitalise the body with the Darphin Aromatic Seaweed Bath and Shower Gel; an aromatic foam gel that effectively cleanses skin.
The formula can be poured into a running bath, or can be massaged over the body during a shower to eliminate the body of dirt, excess oil and other impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. A blend of six Essential Oils, including Lemongrass, Orange and Lemon envelops skin in an aromatic fragrance.
Skin feels soft and refreshed, whilst boasting an energising scent.
name: Seaweed And Aromatic Bath Gel (500ml)

product_description:
Cleanse and comfort your skin with the yes to Carrots Nourishing Body Wash, a refreshing formula that gently lifts away dirt and impurities whilst protecting and comforting skin.
Fortified with naturally antioxidant organic Carrots and a cocktail of vitamin-rich Melons, the body wash cleanses away grime whilst protecting against free radicals and gently exfoliating to soften and refine the appearance of skin. The body is left feeling smooth, clean, revitalised and naturally nourished.
name: to Carrots Nourishing Body Wash 500ml

product_description: The Archipelago Botanicals Boticario di Havana Soap on a Rope blends a luxurious combination of fragrances including Mandarin, Bergamot Leaf, Neroli, Wild Basil, Crushed Thyme and Coriander to refresh and soothe the skin. The triple-milled, pure vegetable-based soap has been blended with ground coffee beans to gently exfoliate the skin and buff away dry areas, particularly elbows, knees and feet. Fastened with a handcrafted rope, the luxurious soap will leave skin cleansed, soothed and deliciously scented.
name: Botanicals Boticario di Havana Soap on a Rope 148g

product_description: 可用 NAOBAY (Natural And Organic Beauty And You) 的橙汁护手霜护理劳累过度的干燥双手。 这种吸收迅速的配方富含有滋润作用的乳木果油，可发挥最佳水合作用，以便一面使双手变得光滑并且恢复活力，一面护理指甲和甲根皮，却不会有油腻的残留物。 有滋养作用的橙汁、甘菊和芦荟混合物可舒缓皮肤，并防止受到环境侵害因素的侵害，从而使双手焕然一新并得到软化，恢复舒适的感觉。
name: 橙汁护手霜 (100ml)

product_description:
Restore softness and suppleness with Balance Me's Super Toning Body Oil; a 100% natural, spa-inspired formula that delivers multiple benefits to improve skin tone and texture.
Infused with Macadamia and Sweet Almond Oils, the lightweight, non-greasy blend replenishes and hydrates dry skin, whilst Wheat Germs provide anti-ageing properties to help firm and plump.
Its antioxidant-rich cocktail of Juniper, Geranium and Bergamot Essential Oils seek to stimulate circulation and minimise the appearance of cellulite during massaging. Skin is smooth, even and refined.
name: Me Super Toning Body Oil 200ml

product_description:
通过具有滋补功效的有机麝香玫瑰油，富含肌肤护理必需脂肪酸的Weleda Wild Rose Body Wash霜是清洁和滋养干燥或承受压力肌肤的最佳选择。
这款调和沐浴露基于具有丰富滋养功效的玫瑰果油，精致融合散发淡淡香气的大马士革玫瑰有机精油，调制出一款完美产品。 Weleda Wild Rose乳霜Body Wash将在每次使用时为您提供奢华洗浴体验。
使用说明：
name: Wild Rose乳霜Body Wash (200ml)

product_description:
The KORRES Red Grape Sunscreen Body Emulsion SPF50 provides high level protection against sun damage and premature skin ageing, with a selection of age-defying actives and advanced sun filters for a dual-phase treatment.
The hydrating, milk-textured formula rapidly absorbs into skin without feeling oily or greasy, imparting a velvet-smooth texture with maximum protection against harmful UV rays.
A fatty acid-rich blend of Red Grape Oil and Alaria Esculenta extract work in tandem to promote enhanced elasticity and smooth the look of fine lines, while anti-inflammatory Provitamin B5 and naturally-derived Polysaccharides deeply moisturise and nourish while activating collagen synthesis.
The powerful sunscreen leaves skin with an advanced level of protection against UV stress and antioxidant damage, with an enhanced ability to regenerate and retain hydration levels for a visible reduction in premature signs of ageing.
name: Red Grape Sunscreen Body Emulsion SPF50 150ml

product_description: 这款快速吸收的身体乳液结合了猴面包树油和营养丰富的南瓜籽油以及 Green Tea 提取物的微妙香气，可以自然地滋润各种肌肤（即便是最干燥的肌肤）。 - S.C
name: Bees极致Care Body Lotion

product_description:
Balance Me 提亮肤色身体磨砂膏融合了天然活性植物精华与天然配方，这款集三种功效于一身的去角质霜能够温和地去除皮肤角质，令肌肤柔滑亮泽。
100％纯天然，含有丰富的维生素，天然海盐有助于改善肤色，另添加了甜杏仁微粒和椰子油，能够锁住水分并促进肌肤细胞新生。 超级保湿，使肌肤清爽洁净，薄荷油成分令人神清气爽，倍感舒适。 期待细致嫩滑、容光焕发的肌肤。 - K.N
name: Me 提亮肤色身体磨砂膏（150ml）

product_description:
Tend Skin Waterproof Moisturising Lotion is a state-of-the-art moisturising product that has spared no expense to provide the best possible ingredients and formulation.Two major ingredient types that have not yet been used together in a moisturizing product are combined. One type is the Ceramide group of ingredients. The other is an ingredient derived from the "Sweet White Lupin" plant.
Like all Tend Skin products, Waterproof Body Lotion contains no animal derived ingredients and was not tested on animals. You will find that the moisturising effect lasts and lasts. Unconditionally Guaranteed!
name: Skin Waterproof Body Lotion (236ml)

product_description:
利用Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Moisture 配方 Body Care的滋养特性treat您的肌肤，它是一款有淡雅香味的保湿霜，可提供全天保湿。
发挥活性成分和关键组分部件的作用瞬间滋润和软化肌肤，这款乳液具有超强呵护功效，使您的全身感到舒适。 这款有包络作用的配方可改善和突显轮廓，产生持久的效果，同时保持肌肤的柔软性，使之具有柔嫩和舒适的触感。 迅速融入肌肤以舒缓和补充养分。
name: Arden Visible Difference Moisture 配方 Body Care 300ml

product_description:
NEOM Organics Great Day Body and Hand Wash is packed with mineral rich Japanese seaweed and anti-oxidising pomegranate to help you effectively clean and protect your skin.
Perfect for relieving stress and calming the body, the wash features a spearmint fresh scent with lemon, mandarin peel and orange for extra sparkle. -SA
name: Organics Great Day Body and Hand Wash (250ml)

product_description:
可用 Institut Karité Paris 乳木果沐浴露（杏仁蜂蜜）这种有滋润作用的洗液护理皮肤；这是一种不含脂肪酸盐的洗体液，质地细腻，可逐渐液化。
这种沐浴露含有 25% 的乳木果油（这种成分则富含维生素，对皮肤有强效滋养和舒缓作用），可温和地清洗皮肤，因而既能清除污泥和杂质，又能使皮肤滋润、舒适并且受到保护。 这种配方护肤品成分丰富并且有舒缓作用，可形成令人舒适并且有水合作用的保护层，使身体触感极其柔韧并且焕然一新。
富含杏仁和蜂蜜的芳香。
name: Karité Paris 乳木果沐浴露 - 杏仁蜂蜜 (250ml)

product_description:
使用 Ultrasun 家庭型防晒霜两件套（SPF 30，适用于超敏感肌肤）保护您和您家人的皮肤，提供一整天的防晒保护。 
采用防水配方，只需一次涂抹，便可提供全天保护，让您有更多时间享受阳光。 这个两件套组合包含2瓶150毫升的防晒霜，足以为全家人提供防晒保护。
经过专门配制，不含油、乳化剂和香料；这款可用于超敏感肌肤的 Ultrasun 家庭型防晒霜两件套（SPF 30）非常适合儿童娇嫩的肌肤，防止阳光造成的痱子等不适反应。 它还可以为胫骨、鼻子和肩膀等更脆弱的皮肤区域提供额外保护。
name: 家庭型防晒霜两件套 SPF 30 - 超敏感（2×150ml）

product_description:
Attend to skin and uncleansed pores with the Erno Laszlo White Marble Sheet Mask, designed to offer a relaxing at-home treatment for the face. Imbued with delicate calming notes, and made in a refined formula ready to combat the production of melanin, the dual action of this salve cleanses as well as restores, providing all-over comfort and relief.
Containing clarifying Yuzu Fruit Extract, for a balanced complexion, as well as anti-oxidants performing against colour loss, this fundamental mask helps soothe, refine and rehydrate the skin, offering a balanced, even tone that lends a natural, replenished look. C.R
name: Laszlo White Marble Sheet Mask

product_description:
Achieve that ‘pregnancy glow’ with the Mama Mio Second Trimester Butter Bundle. Combining a trio of bestselling Mama Mio products, the bundle is designed to treat and nourish skin during the second trimester of pregnancy, when hormones can cause skin to become prone to sensitivity and dryness. Host to a moisturising body butter, soothing breast cream and a refreshing facial wash, each product within the bundle is suitable for use whilst pregnant and will leave skin thoroughly nourished.
The Tummy Rub Butter (120g)
Help protect your skin against pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Butter. Enriched with Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids, the butter contributes towards skin's strength and elasticity, whilst organic Shea Butter provides a barrier to lock in moisture. Specially formulated with organic Rose Hip oil, which works to prevent and reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, the luxurious butter works to hydrate skin, while Argan Oil helps nourish.
Pregnancy Boob Tube (100ml)
The Pregnancy Boob Tube bust cream soothes skin to leave it with a healthy glow. Enriched with organic Omega oils, Boob Tube hydrates by providing antioxidants to strengthen and help reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Specially formulated with unique Green Cabbage Leaf extract, its new and improved formula makes it pregnancy and breastfeeding safe.
Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash (100ml)
Gently cleanse skin with the foaming Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash. Specially formulated with Tea Tree oil and Green Tea Leaf, the wash helps keep skin hydrated and provides powerful antioxidants that shield skin from free radical damage and environmental stresses. The luxurious formula contains a blend of natural, Coconut-derived cleansers enriched with organic Omegas and Vitamins to nourish skin. Experience skin that is full of moisture with a boost in radiance for a brighter complexion.
name: Mio Second Trimester Butter Bundle (Worth £76)

product_description:
作为道德生活最喜爱奖（ Ethical Living Favourite ）获得者，Weleda沙棘Hand Cream为干燥双手提供强效护理。 宝贵沙棘油和芝麻油的组合可支持肌肤的天然功能，有助于令双手保持柔软。
Weleda沙棘Hand Cream所含的维生素和不饱和脂肪酸有助于防止双手脱水；干燥双手获得柔化，更加柔嫩、光滑。 其精油成分带来清爽水果香气，可迅速渗透肌肤，不留油腻薄膜。 日常使用时，这款精华霜可帮助双手恢复天然柔软。 适合素食主义者。 
使用说明：
name: Cream（50ml）

product_description:
Transport your senses to Yorkshire's iconic ‘Rhubarb Triangle' with the Delicious Rhubarb & Rose Body Lotion from Molton Brown.
Fortified with the brand's signature Skin-Pampering Complex, the lightweight, quick-absorbing lotion moisturises and conditions skin, whilst imparting a delicious fragrance of sweet Rose, zesty Yuzu Fruit and bitter Rhubarb.
Your body feels sumptuously soft, smooth and perfectly pampered from top to toe. Housed in a convenient pump bottle decorated with a metallic cap and tonal grosgrain bow.
name: Brown Delicious Rhubarb & Rose Body Lotion

product_description:
Brighten and refine your skin with Natural Spa Factory Organic Sweet Orange, Ground Argan Oil and Jojoba Body Polish, a gentle exfoliator that delicately buffs away dead cells to reveal smoother, more radiant skin.
Infused with Argan Shell and Orange Zest, the foaming polish naturally sloughs away dulling dead skin cells and performs a smoothing effect to promote a younger-looking body. Its refreshing dose of Bergamot and Jojoba and Argan Oils moisturise, soften and protect the skin to leave the body feeling smooth, radiant and renewed.
name: Spa Factory Organic Sweet Orange, Ground Argan Oil and Jojoba Body Polish

product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Portofino' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts a luxurious fragrance of Water Rose and Marine Lily to relax the senses.
name: Dante Dolce Vivere Portofino Soap 250g

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Prevage Body全效抗衰老保湿霜不仅仅起到滋润作用。 发挥有临床疗效的抗氧化剂和三肽复合物的益处，它可以完全满足您身体对抗衰老护肤品的需要。
消费者测试的结果表明，Elizabeth Arden Prevage Body全效抗衰老保湿霜的使用者中，85%的人感到有轻微伤痕、妊娠纹和凹凸不平的肌肤得到了改善，67％的使用者还感到老年斑和肌肤变色的迹象得到缓解。 一款高性能的保湿霜，采用艾地苯醌，及经临床证明有效的、最强大的抗氧化剂和三肽复合物，以减少身体衰老的明显迹象，令肌肤更光滑、紧致和发生完全转变。
使用说明：
name: Arden Prevage Body全效抗衰老保湿霜

product_description:
Scaramouche & Fandango 是一个打造优质男性美容产品的品牌。其 Men's Skin Twin Pack 产品会让您感觉全身焕然一新。 该套装在英国生产，包括两款产品，非常适用于旅途中的男士。 E.N. 
Shampoo (200ml)
使用解毒牛油果油和黑藜洗发水，深层清洁秀发。 这款洗发水采用必需的氨基酸专门配制而成，可渗透和强化秀发角质层，同时去除多余油脂和污垢，令秀发恢复清新与活力。Keravis 蛋白可保护秀发免遭日常污染，呈现健康靓丽的秀发。
Body Wash (200ml)
使用巴西木瓜沐浴露，唤醒感官。 其清洁配方富含糖类和矿物质，能滋润肌肤，让您清新一整天。 这款沐浴露富含抗氧化维生素 C，赋予肌肤活力并保护其免受环境压力的伤害，呈现更青春水润肌肤。
name: & Fandango Men's Shower Twin Pack

product_description:
Pamper aching feet with the Infused Pedi-Buffer from Spongellé; a luxurious sponge exfoliator to massage, cleanse and moisturise dry skin for a soft, silky finish.
Multi-functional and reusable for up to 30 washes, the innovative buffer is enriched with a revitalising fragrance, perfectly balancing effervescent Mandarin with hints of freshly cut Mint and Eucalyptus. The textured side sweeps away rough patches and callouses, with healing extracts of Arnica, Sea Kelp and Peppermint helping to soothe away aches and strains. Feet feel perfectly polished with spa-like pedicure results.
name: Infused Pedi-Buffer - Mandarin Mint

product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Sachajuan Spicy Citrus Body Wash; a lightweight, invigorating formula that infuses skin with a stimulating Coriander and Jasmine fragrance.
Utilising the brand's Earth Silk Technology, derived from a patented manufacturing process of Swedish cultivated Oats, the body wash creates a luxe lather to effortlessly eliminate impurities without over-drying skin. Ideal for bath or shower, you can expect smooth, supple and hydrated skin from top to toe.
name: Body Wash 300ml - Spicy Citrus

product_description:
Revitalise skin with the HoMedics Radiance Microdermabrasion; a salon-grade treatment to transform your skincare regime and improve overall skin texture from the comfort of your own home.
The handheld microdermabrasion device features a diamond tip to deliver powerful mechanical exfoliation, buffing away the top layer of dead skin cells to reveal a smoother, firmer feeling surface, with visible results in as little as 3 weeks.
Delivering a gentle vacuum-like massage, it stimulates cellular renewal to promote a more even and refined complexion, with four speed settings to provide customisable treatment levels to suit all skin types.
Each treatment only takes 5 minutes, and the device can be used 1-3 times a week for optimum results. Skin appears rejuvenated and replenished, with visibly diminished wrinkles, blackheads and scarring for an overall healthier and younger looking visage.
name: Radiance Microdermabrasion

product_description:
Alpha-H年齡延遲手和指甲護理霜 
深層補給雙手的水份，軟化過早衰老的手部肌膚，令肌膚年輕如初，透亮白淨。豐富但不油膩的質地，品質一流，瞬間吸收並綻放清新的柑橘芳香，10% 的乙醇酸提取物（取自澳大利亞甘蔗）卓效去除死皮細胞，軟化粗糙肌膚，淡隱因日曬和肌膚衰老引起的色素沉積。蘊含的必需脂肪酸（取自鱷梨油和荷荷巴油）可卓效調理和軟化手部肌膚及其角質層。 
 使用說明： 
取少許本品，於指尖和手腕間輕柔按摩，包括甲床，調理和淡隱角質層。 也可塗抹於手肘和膝蓋。 
 主要成分：
name: H 年龄延迟手和指甲护理霜 100ml

product_description:
JASON 椰子油手及身体护理乳液 可被肌肤快速吸收，缓解极干性皮肤、从头到脚软化抚平肌肤。
本品属轻盈乳液，含调节性椰子油及牛油果油等成分。可为肌肤补水、深度滋润肌肤。令肌肤舒适娇嫩。
name: 舒缓椰子油 手及身体护理乳液227g

product_description:
Cleanse the body without unnecessary fuss using the Cowshed Bullocks Bracing Bath & Shower Gel; a gentle yet effective body wash with an uplifting citrus fragrance designed for men.
The cleansing formula can be applied directly to skin during showering, or can be poured under running water to deliver an invigorating and refreshing soak. Comfortably massaging over the body, the shower gel is enriched with Petitgrain, which cleanses and purifies skin, whilst Grapefruit seeks to deliver a toned appearance.
Packed with essential oils, the Bracing Bath & Shower Gel guarantees to leave skin clean and calm, whilst smelling distinctly masculine.
name: Bullocks Bracing Bath & Shower Gel

product_description:
使用傑森醒膚柑橘沐浴露(900ml) 清潔滋潤肌膚。檸檬萃取物和橘皮油搭配維他命E 和維他命原B5，給您帶來清爽醒膚體驗，令肌膚乾淨清新，重現活力。 - KR 
 不含對羥基苯甲酸酯、月桂基/月桂醇聚醚硫酸酯或鄰苯二甲酸酯。 
 使用說明：
name: 杰森醒肤柑橘沐浴露 (900ml)

product_description: 混合了天然舒緩原料白睡蓮和深層保濕物質錦葵，而洋甘菊和山金車能舒緩疲勞疼痛肌肉。具有天然的玫瑰萃取物的美妙芬芳，特別適合媽媽使用。
name: Boo 卓越舒缓泡澡液 (250ml)

product_description:
Treat hardworking hands to the nourishing properties of Borghese Splendide Mani Smoothing Hand Cream, an intensive hand treatment that smoothens and relieves dry, chapped skin.
Promoting long-lasting comfort, the hand therapy expertly hydrates and protects with its dose of antioxidant Vitamin E and moisture-binding Hyaluronic Acid, and softens cuticles for a healthy-looking manicure. Hands feel soft, supple and silky.
name: Splendide Mani Smoothing Hand Cream (207ml)

product_description:
大豆麦卢卡蜂蜜咖啡豆身体磨砂膏可有效护理您的肌肤；其奢华的肌肤再生配方中蕴含有有机冷压可可油，可使您从头到脚的全身肌肤得到充分补水、祛角质和软化。
这款温和的身体磨砂膏利用罗布斯塔咖啡豆刺激血流，可最大程度地减少脂肪团和淡化妊辰纹，与此同时有机可可豆和维他命 E 可提供抗氧化保护作用，以修复和恢复肌肤。 非常适合湿疹和牛皮癣，其喜马拉雅山粉色岩盐和德麦拉拉蔗糖可祛除死皮细胞，有助于清除黑头粉刺和疹子，使肌肤更加光滑细嫩。
name: 220g——麦卢卡蜂蜜

product_description:
Take an aromatic journey through the hills of Florentine with Nesti Dante's Dei Colli Fiorentini Broom Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting a passionatie fragrance. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.
name: Dante Dei Colli Fiorentini Broom Soap 250g

product_description:
Energise skin with the Nesti Dante Romantica Lily and Narcissus Soap; a fragrant, vegetable soap bar that is hand-crafted in Italy using the saponification method. Arriving wrapped in thick textured paper finished with a decorative floral print, the soap is an ideal gift, or the perfect treat to yourself.
Traditionally made utilising natural, raw ingredients, the soap gently cleanses skin to eliminate traces of dirt and impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. Romancing the senses, the cleansing bar boasts captivating and seductive scent of lily and narcissus, which work in synergy to deliver an uplifting fragrance that will invigorate the mind and body.
name: Dante Romantica Lily and Narcissus Soap 250g

product_description:
ARK Invigorating Scrub combines a natural blend of mint, multi-fruit acids and loofah particles to create a high-performing scrub that removes dead cells and derbis.
Working to help you to achieve smoother skin and stimulate circulation, the scrub removes dryness and flaky patches to improve the appearance of your skin. -SA
name: - Invigorating Body Scrub (200ml)

product_description:
Experience an ultra-relaxing soak with the Perfect Night's Sleep Bath & Shower Drops from NEOM’s Scent To Sleep™ collection. Designed to deliver therapeutic benefits to the mind and body, the bath and shower drops leave skin smooth and comfortable, whilst boasting a calming scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of English Lavender, Sweet Basil and Jasmine, the formula envelops skin in a relaxing aroma that encourages a good night’s sleep. Complete with Vitamins A and E, alongside skin-loving Safflower oil, expect to unwind and de-stress.
name: 皇家奢华薰衣草茉莉安神沐浴精油

product_description: Manuka Health's Propolis and MGO™400+ Manuka Honey Toothpaste with Tea Tree Oil helps to maintain healthy teeth and gums, leaving the mouth feeling refreshed. The pleasant, menthol formula combines BIO30™ New Zealand Propolis, high grade MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey and Tea Tree Oil with natural plant extracts, resulting in gentle cleansing and effective oral hygiene.  The essential oils and herbs provide a great taste and leave teeth feeling fresh and clean.
name: Health Propolis and MGO 400 Manuka Honey Toothpaste with Tea Tree Oil 100g

product_description:
Discover the benefits of Olive Oil for your skin with the Garnier Body Ultimate Blends Mythic Olive Nourisher Gift Pack. Host to a duo of nourishing skincare products, the gift set boasts a luxurious body lotion and body oil, both enriched with Olive Oil and guaranteeing to leave skin touchably soft, smooth and well cared for.
Ultimate Blends Mythic Olive Nourishing Lotion (250ml)
Meet the needs of dry skin with the Mythic Olive Nourishing Lotion. The lightweight lotion melts quickly and easily into skin, allowing you to get dressed immediately after. Suitable for daily use, the lotion envelops skin in floral and vanilla notes and leaves the body smooth and soft with a supple appearance.
Ultimate Blends Mythic Olive Nourishing Oil (150ml)
Achieve touchably soft skin with the Mythic Olive Nourishing Oil. Luxuriously silky, the oil formula boasts a nourishing blend that absorbs quickly and does not leave a greasy residue. Enriched with extra virgin olive oil, the formula is tailor made for dry skin types and will leave the body feeling nourished, soft and smooth.
name: Body Ultimate Blends Mythic Olive Nourisher Gift Pack

product_description:
Indulge skin with the AromaWorks Nurture Hand Lotion, a softening blend of 12 BioActive ingredients and essential oils that perfectly combine to moisturise and soothe.
Featuring an uplifting fresh aroma of crisp May Chang, sweet Roman Chamomile and delicate Sandalwood, the hand lotion works to intensively hydrate dry and chapped skin whilst working to reduce inflammation and soreness. Hands are left feeling nourished and smooth with a refreshing scent.
name: Nurture Hand Lotion 100ml

product_description:
Repair dry and sensitive skin with the Deeply Nourishing Body Cream from Thalgo. Melting into the skin quickly, without leaving a greasy residue, the cream is designed to provide a comforting feel to skin.
The body cream is the first intensive treatment that boasts Cold Cream Marine, which delivers nourishment and gently yet effectively provides a soothing feel to dry and sensitive skin. Enriched with a blend of Wild Rose Oil, Cocoa and Cupuaçu butters, the rich and creamy formula leaves skin feeling comforted and enveloped in a refreshing aroma, which combines peach, green leaves and white musk.
name: Deeply Nourishing Body Cream

product_description:
Used in conjunction with your Iluminage TOUCH, the Iluminage TOUCH Quartz Cartridge - 300,000 Flashes is a replaceable cartridge that slots easily into your TOUCH hair removal device for continued use. 
The replaceable cartridge contains 300,000 pulses and simply snaps onto your Iluminage TOUCH. Long-lasting, the cartridge removes fair hair from the surface of your skin with innovative elōs technology.
name: 300,000 Pulse Elos Replacement Cartridge

product_description:

利用独有调和工艺方法精心混合大马士革蔷薇与葵花籽油，将该混合物加热至体温37℃，令皮肤平衡特性转移至该精油中。 肌肤将彻底焕发活力，协调均衡和获得改善。 E.N.

Working tirelessly for 35 minutes, the whitening treatment utilises Sodium Percarbonate, which seeks to eliminate the appearance of stains and whiten teeth an average of 3.6 shades from the first use*. Within a week, teeth should be visibly whiter by a minimum of 7 shades.
